h4.p: [03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0001^ea^^a^M2.0001^ea^ ārāmapokkharaṇīuyyānacetiyaṭṭhānādīsu. ^b^Ussannā^eb^ti bahulā. Asokakaṇikārakoviḷārakumbhīrājarukkhehi sammissatāya taṃ campakavanaṃ ^b^nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍita^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na campakarukkhānaṃyeva nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumatāyāti vadanti. ^b^Bhagavā kusumagandhasugandhe campakavane viharatī^eb^ti iminā na māpanakāle eva tasmiṃ nagare campakarukkhā ussannā, atha kho aparabhāgepīti dasseti. ‘‘Pañcasatamattehi aḍḍhateḷasehī’’ti evaṃ ^b^adassitaparicchedena^eb^. Hatthino cāreti sikkhāpetīti hatthācariyo hatthīnaṃ sikkhāpako, tassa puttoti āha ^b^‘‘hatthācariyassa putto’’^eb^ti. Tadā bhagavā tesaṃ pasādajananatthaṃ attano buddhānubhāvaṃ aniguhitvāva nisinnoti dassento ^b^‘‘chabbaṇṇānaṃ ghanabuddharasmīna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Bhagavato ceva gāravenā^eb^ti bhagavato garubhāvena, bhagavati gāravenāti vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^Niccaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0002^ea^^b^na hotī^eb^ti abhiṇhaṃ na hoti, kadācideva hotīti attho. Abhiṇhaniccatā hi idha adhippetā, na kūṭaṭṭhaniccatā. Loke kiñci vimhayāvahaṃ disvā hatthavikārampi karonti, aṅguliṃ vā phoṭayanti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0002^ea^^b^‘‘accharaṃ paharituṃ yutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta^eb^nti ayaṃ niruttinayo yebhuyyena upādāya ruḷhīvasena vuttoti veditabbo. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘yepi te, bho gotama, ahesuṃ atītamaddhāna’’ntiādi vuttaṃ, kiñci akattabbampi kariyamānaṃ dukkarabhāvena vimhayāvahaṃ hoti, tathā kiñci kattabbaṃ, purimaṃ garahacchariyaṃ, pacchimaṃ pasaṃsacchariyaṃ, tadubhayaṃ suttapadaso dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sammā paṭipādito^eb^ti sammāpaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhapito. Esā paṭipadā paramāti ^b^etaparamaṃ,^eb^ bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesoyaṃ yathā ‘‘visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī’’ti (a. ni. 4.70). Ayañhettha attho – bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho paṭipadāya tumhehi paṭipādito, atītepi kāle buddhā etaparamaṃyeva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sammā paṭipādesuṃ, anāgatepi kāle etaparamaṃyeva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sammā paṭipādessantīti paribbājako nayaggāhena diṭṭhena adiṭṭhaṃ anuminanto sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya samasamaṃ katvā dasseti, evaṃ dassento ca tesaṃ sudhammatañca tathā dasseti evāti veditabbo, buddhasubuddhatā pana nesaṃ sarūpeneva dassitāti. ^b^Na ito bhiyyo^eb^ti iminā pāḷiyaṃ etaparamaṃyevāti avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dasseti sīlapadaṭṭhānattā samādhissa, samādhipadaṭṭhānattā ca paññāya sīlepi ca abhisamācārikapubbakattā ādibrahmacariyakassa vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ābhisamācārikavattaṃ ādiṃ katvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pucchānusandhiādīsu anantogadhattā ^b^‘‘pāṭiekko anusandhī’’^eb^ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Upasantakāraṇa^eb^nti upasantabhāvakāraṇaṃ. Tañhi ariyānaṃyeva visayo, tatthāpi ca buddhānaṃ eva anavasesato visayoti imamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca dassetuṃ ^b^na hi tva^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ñātatthacariyā kākajātakādivasena veditabbā, lokatthacariyā taṃtaṃpāramipūraṇavasena, buddhatthacariyā mahābodhijātakādivasena. ^b^Acchariyaṃ bho gotamā^eb^tiādinā kandarakena kataṃ pasādapavedanaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Yepi te^eb^tiādinā tena vuttamatthaṃ paccanubhāsantena bhagavatā sampaṭicchitanti caritattā āha – ^b^‘‘santi hi kandarakāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhī’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0003^ea^. Yo hi kandarakena bhikkhusaṅghassa upasantabhāvo kittito, taṃ vibhajitvā dassentopi tena apucchitoyeva attano ajjhāsayena bhagavā ^b^‘‘santi hī’’^eb^tiādinā desanaṃ ārabhi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavato kira etadahosī’’^eb^^a^V2.0003^ea^ tiādi. ^b^Kappetvā^eb^ti aññathā santameva attānaṃ aññathā vidhāya. ^b^Pakappetvā^eb^ti sanidassanavasena gahetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kuhakabhāvenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānā^eb^ti kāmaṃ avisesena sekkhā vuccanti, te pana adhigatamaggavasena ‘‘pūrayamānā’’ti na vattabbā kiccassa niṭṭhitattā. Maggo hi ekacittakkhaṇikoti āha ^b^‘‘uparimaggassa vipassanāya upasantā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ito muttā^eb^ti maggenāgatūpasamato muttā. Kalyāṇaputhujjane sandhāya vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi upasantā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Satatasīlā^eb^ti avicchinnasīlā. Sātisayo hi etesaṃ sīlassa akhaṇḍādibhāvo. Suparisuddhasīlatāvasena santatā vutti etesanti ^b^santatavuttino^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. Evaṃ sīlavuttivasena ‘‘santatavuttino’’ti padassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni jīvitavuttivasena dassento ^b^‘‘santatajīvikāvāti attho’’^eb^ti āha. Sāsanassa jīvitavutti sīlasannissitā evāti āha ^b^‘‘tasmi’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]Nipayati visoseti rāgādisaṃkilesaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ nipātīti ^b^nipako,^eb^ paññavā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paññavanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paññāya ṭhatvā jīvikākappanaṃ^eb^ nāma buddhapaṭikuṭṭhamicchājīvaṃ pahāya sammājīvena jīvananti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathā ekacco’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.14) ^b^taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.14) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Rathavinītapaṭipadādayo tesu tesu suttesu vuttanayena veditabbā. Ito aññattha mahāgopālakasuttādīsu (ma. ni. 1.346 ādayo) lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānā kathitāti āha – ^b^‘‘idha pana lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā’’^eb^ti, satipaṭṭhānasuttepi (dī. ni. 2.373-374; ma. ni. 1.106 ādayo) vomissakāva kathitāti. ^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti ettakāya desanāya.

[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kārakabhāva^eb^nti ^a^M2.0004^ea^ paṭipattiyaṃ paṭipajjanakabhāvaṃ. Mayampi nāma gihī bahukiccā samānā kālena kālaṃ satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā viharāma, kimaṅgaṃ pana vivekavāsinoti attano kārakabhāvaṃ pavedento evaṃ ^b^bhikkhusaṅghañca ukkhipati^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayañhettha adhippāyo’’^eb^tiādi. Nānārammaṇesu aparāparaṃ uppajjamānānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ ghanajaṭitasaṅkhātākārena pavatti kilesagahanena gahanatā, tenāha ‘‘anto jaṭā bahi jaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.23, 192). Manussānaṃ ajjhāsayagahaṇena sāṭheyyampīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘kasaṭasāṭheyyesupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. Yathā sappimadhuphāṇitādīsu kacavarabhāvo, ^a^V2.0004^ea^ so kasaṭoti vuccati, evaṃ santāne aparisuddho saṃkilesabhāvo kasaṭanti āha ^b^‘‘aparisuddhaṭṭhena kasaṭatā’’^eb^ti. Attani asantaguṇasambhāvanaṃ ^b^kerāṭiyaṭṭho. Jānātī^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ ahitaṃ na sevitabbaṃ, idaṃ hitaṃ sevitabba’’nti vicāreti deseti. Vicāraṇatthopi hi hoti jānāti-saddo yathā ‘‘āyasmā jānātī’’ti. ^b^Sabbāpi…pe… adhippetā^eb^ ‘‘pasupālakā’’tiādīsu viya. Idha antara-saddo ‘‘vijjantarikāyā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.149) viya khaṇatthoti āha ^b^‘‘yattakena khaṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti hatthinā. ^b^Tānī^eb^ti sāṭheyyādīni.

[03]Atthato kāyacittujukatāpaṭipakkhabhūtāva lobhasahagatacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesāti tāni pavattiākārena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^yassā^eb^ti pāṇabhūtassa assassa vā hatthino vā. ^b^Ṭhassāmī^eb^ti tattheva sappaṭibhaye ṭhāne gantvā ṭhassāmīti na hoti. Imassa sāṭheyyatāya pākaṭakaraṇaṃ vañcanādhippāyabhāvato. Tathā hi catūsu ṭhānesu ^b^‘‘vañcetvā’’^eb^ icceva vuttaṃ, niguhanto pana tattheva gantvā tiṭṭheyya. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassā^eb^ti āgatamaggameva nivattitvā gantukāmassa. Leṇḍavissajjanādīsu kālantarāpekkhābhāvaṃ ^b^‘‘tathā’’^eb^ti iminā upasaṃharati.

[03]^b^Antojātakā^eb^ti attano dāsiyā kucchimhi jātā. ^b^Dhanakkītā^eb^ti dhanaṃ datvā dāsabhāvena gahitā. ^b^Karamarānītā^eb^ti dāsabhāvena karamaraggāhagahitā. ^b^Dāsabya^eb^nti dāsabhāvaṃ. ^b^Pessā^eb^ti adāsā eva hutvā veyyāvaccakarā. ^b^Imaṃ vissajjetvā^eb^ti imaṃ attano hatthagataṃ vissajjetvā. ^b^Imaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0005^ea^^b^gaṇhantā^eb^ti imaṃ tassa hatthagataṃ gaṇhantā. Sammukhato aññathā parammukhakāle kāyavācāsamudācāradassaneneva cittassa nesaṃ aññathā ṭhitabhāvo niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhī^eb^ti etthāpi anantare vuttanayeneva anusandhiyojanā veditabbā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Catuttho hitapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti yojanā. Puggalasīsena puggalapaṭipattiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘puggale pahāyā’’^eb^ti āha. Paṭipatti hi idha pahātabbā, na puggalā. Yathā assaddhādipuggalaparivajjanena saddhindriyādibhāvanā ijjhanti, evaṃ micchāpaṭipannapuggalaparivajjanena micchāpaṭipadā vajjitabbāti āha – ^b^‘‘purime tayo puggale pahāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Catutthapuggalassā^eb^ti imasmiṃ catukke vuttacatutthapuggalassa ^b^hitapaṭipattiyaṃyeva paṭipādemi^eb^ pavattemīti ^b^dassento. Santā^eb^ti samaṃ vināsaṃ nirodhaṃ pattāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘niruddhā santāti vuttā’’^eb^ti. Puna ^b^santā^eb^ti bhāvanāvasena kilesapariḷāhavigamato santāti ^a^V2.0005^ea^ ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘nibbutā’’^eb^ti. Santāti ānetvā yojanā. ^b^Santo have^eb^ti ettha samabhāvakarena sādhubhāvassa visesapaccayabhūtena paṇḍiccena samannāgatā ariyā ‘‘santo’’ti vuttāti āha – ^b^‘‘santo have…pe… paṇḍitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā (a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.198) attabhāvo, idha pana yo paro na hoti, so attā, taṃ ^b^attānaṃ. Para^eb^nti attato aññaṃ. ^b^Chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā^eb^ jighacchāhetutāya. ^b^Anto tāpanakilesāna^eb^nti attano santāne attapariḷāhajananasantappanakilesānaṃ. ^b^Cittaṃ ārādhetī^eb^ti cittaṃ pasādeti, sampahaṃsetīti attho. Yasmā pana tathābhūto cittaṃ sampādento ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhanto nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cittaṃ sampādetī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkhaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ jegucchaṃ etassāti dukkhapaṭikkūlo taṃ ^b^dukkhapaṭikkūlaṃ^eb^. Visesanavisesitabbatā hi kāmacārā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dukkhassa visesitabbataṃ sandhāya bāhiratthasamāsaṃ anādiyitvā ^b^‘‘dukkhassa paṭikkūla’’^eb^nti attho vutto. Yena hi bhāgena purisassa dukkhaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ, tena dukkhassa purisopīti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘paccanīkasaṇṭhita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catūhi^eb^^a^M2.0006^ea^^b^kāraṇehī^eb^ti dhātukusalatādīhi catūhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Kammaṃ karotī^eb^ti yogakammaṃ karoti. Yasmā sambuddhā paresaṃ maggaphalādhigamāya ussāhajātā, tattha nirantaraṃ yuttappayuttā eva honti, te paṭicca tesaṃ antarāyo na hotiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘na pana buddhe paṭiccā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kiriyaparihāniyā^eb^ desakassa tasseva vā puggalassa tajjapayogābhāvato. ‘‘Desakassa vā’’ti idaṃ sāvakānaṃ vasena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Mahatā atthenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^attha^eb^-saddo ānisaṃsapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘dvīhi ānisaṃsehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pasādaṃ paṭilabhati^eb^ ‘‘arahanto’’tiādinā saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā sutattā. ^b^Abhinavo nayo udapādi^eb^ santatasīlatādivasena anattantapatādivasena, sopi taṃ sutvā dāsādīsu savisesaṃ lajjī dayāpanno hitānukampī hutvā sekkhapaṭipadaṃ sīlaṃ sādhento anukkamena satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribrūheti. Tenāha bhagavā ^b^‘‘mahatā atthena saṃyutto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paresaṃ hananaghātanādinā rodāpanato ^b^luddo,^eb^ tathā vighātakabhāvena kāyacittānaṃ vidāraṇato ^b^dāruṇo,^eb^ viruddhavādatāya ^b^kakkhaḷo,^eb^ bandhanāgāre niyutto ^b^bandhanāgāriko^eb^.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khattiyābhisekenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0006^ea^ khattiyānaṃ kattabbābhisekena. ^b^Santhāgāra^eb^nti santhāravasena kataṃ agāraṃ yaññāvāṭaṃ. ^b^Sappitelenā^eb^ti sappimayena telena, yamakasnehena hi tadā kāyaṃ abbhañjati. Vacchabhāvaṃ taritvā ṭhito vacchataro. ^b^Parikkhepakaraṇatthāyā^eb^ti vanamālāhi saddhiṃ dabbhehi vediyā parikkhepanatthāya. ^b^Yaññabhūmiya^eb^nti avasesayaññaṭṭhāne. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kandarakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avidūre^eb^ti ^a^M2.0007^ea^^a^V2.0007^ea^ iminā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘vesāliya’’nti idaṃ samīpe bhummavacananti dasseti. ^b^Sārappattakulagaṇanāyā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.11.16) mahāsāramahappattakulagaṇanāya. ^b^Dasame ṭhāne^eb^ti aññe aññeti dasagaṇanaṭṭhāne. Aṭṭhakanagare jāto bhavo ^b^aṭṭhakanāgaro. Kukkuṭārāmo^eb^ti pāṭaliputte kukkuṭārāmo, na kosambiyaṃ.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pakatatthaniddeso ta-saddoti tassa ‘‘bhagavatā’’tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato adhigato supākaṭo ca, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento ^b^‘‘yo so…pe… abhisambuddho’’^eb^ti āha. Satipi ñāṇadassana-saddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena tesaṃ visayavisese pavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavisesavasena vijjāttayavasena vijjāabhiññānāvaraṇañāṇavasena sabbaññutañāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento ^b^‘‘tesaṃ tesa’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^āsayānusayaṃ jānatā^eb^ āsayānusayañāṇena ^b^sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā^eb^ sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇehi. ^b^Pubbenivāsādīhī^eb^ti pubbenivāsāsavakkhayañāṇehi. ^b^Paṭivedhapaññāyā^eb^ti ariyamaggapaññāya. ^b^Desanāpaññāya passatā^eb^ti desetabbadhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ bodhaneyyapuggalānañca āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiādibhedaṃ dhammadesanāpaññāya yāthāvato passatā. ^b^Arīna^eb^nti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā, sāsanassa vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhanameva vā, ^b^kesivinayasutta^eb^ñcettha nidassanaṃ.

[03]Tathā ṭhānāṭṭhānādivibhāgaṃ ^b^jānatā^eb^ yathākammūpagasatte ^b^passatā,^eb^ savāsanānaṃ āsavānaṃ khīṇattā ^b^arahatā,^eb^ abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhiññeyyādito aviparītāvabodhato ^b^sammāsambuddhena^eb^. Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya ^b^jānatā,^eb^ kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya ^b^passatā,^eb^ davādīnaṃ abhāvasādhikāya ^a^M2.0008^ea^ pahānasampadāya ^b^arahatā,^eb^ chandādīnaṃ ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya ^b^sammāsambuddhenā^eb^ti evaṃ dasabalāṭṭhārasāaveṇikabuddhadhammavasenapi yojanā kātabbā.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhisaṅkhata^eb^nti ^a^V2.0008^ea^ attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhūyya kataṃ, svassa katabhāvo uppādanena veditabbo, na uppannassa paṭisaṅkharaṇenāti āha ^b^‘‘uppādita’’^eb^nti. Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita’’nti vuttanti ‘‘cetayitaṃ pakappita’’nti atthamāha. ^b^Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita^eb^nti ca jhānassa pātubhāvadassanamukhena viddhaṃsanabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti yañhi ahutvā sambhavati, taṃ hutvā paṭiveti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ‘abhisaṅkhata’ntiādi. ^b^Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhito^eb^ti samathadhamme ṭhitattā samāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādayo pajahanto anukkamena taṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pāpetā hutvā vipassanādhamme ṭhito. Samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ nandanaṭṭhena ^b^nandī^eb^ti. Tattha sukhumā apekkhā vuttā, yā ‘‘nikantī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ yathārutavasena ca imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati. ^b^Samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabbo^eb^ti anāgāmiphalaṃ nibbattetvā tadatthāya samathavipassanāpi anibbattetvā kevalaṃ tattha chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati. Kasmā? Tesu samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu chandarāgamattena anāgāminā laddhabbassa aladdhānāgāmiphalena laddhabbattā tathā sati tena anāgāmiphalampi laddhabbameva nāma hoti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭividdhaṃ bhavissatī’’^eb^ti. Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva ^b^attharaso. Aññāpi kāci sugatiyo^eb^ti vinipātike sandhāyāha. ^b^Aññāpi kāci duggatiyo^eb^ti asurakāyamāha.

[03]^b^Samathadhurameva dhuraṃ^eb^ samathayānikassa vasena desanāya āgatattā. Mahāmālukyovāde ‘‘vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāra’’nti pādakajjhānaṃ katvā ‘‘so yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṃ vedanāgata’’ntiādinā vipassanaṃ vitthāretvā ‘‘so tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ ^a^M2.0009^ea^ pāpuṇātī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.133) āgatattā ^b^‘‘mahāmālukyovāde vipassanāva dhura’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.373 ādayo; ma. ni. 1.106 ādayo) sabbatthakameva tikkhatarāya vipassanāya āgatattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vipassanuttaraṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāyagatāsatisutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.153-154) ānāpānajjhānādivasena savisesaṃ samathavipassanāya āgatattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samathuttaraṃ kathita’’^eb^nti.

[03]Appaṃ yācitena bahuṃ dentena uḷārapurisena viya ^b^ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena ‘‘ayampi ekadhammo’’ti^eb^^a^V2.0009^ea^^b^kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā^eb^ pucchāvasena ^b^ekadhammo nāma jāto^eb^ paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanañāyena. ^b^Ekavīsati pabbāni^eb^ tehi bodhiyamānāya paṭipadāya ekarūpattā ^b^paṭipadāvasena ekadhammo nāma jāto^eb^ti. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ aṭṭhakanāgarasutte. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammānaṃ saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattatāya tattha sāvakānaṃ dukkaranti na catutthāruppavasenettha desanā āgatāti catunnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ, heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āruppānañca vasena ^b^ekādasa. Pucchāvasenā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi nu kho, bhante ānanda, tena…pe… sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto’’ti (ma. ni. 2.18) evaṃ pavattapucchāvasena. ^b^Amatuppattiyatthenā^eb^ti amatabhāvassa uppattihetutāya, sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasampi amatādhigamapaṭipattiyāti attho, evamettha aggaphalabhūmi anāgāmiphalabhūmīti dveva bhūmiyo sarūpato āgatā, nānantariyatāya pana heṭṭhimāpi dve bhūmiyo atthato āgatā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañca satāni aggho etassāti ^b^pañcasataṃ^eb^. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Aṭṭhakanāgarasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Santhāgāra^eb^nti ^a^V2.0010^ea^ atthānusāsanāgāraṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘uyyogakālādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena maṅgalamahādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Santhambhantī^eb^ti vissamanti, parissamaṃ vinodentīti attho. ^b^Sahā^eb^ti sannivesavasena ^a^M2.0010^ea^ ekajjhaṃ. ^b^Saha atthānusāsanaṃ agāra^eb^nti etasmiṃ atthe ttha-kārassa ntha-kāraṃ katvā santhāgāranti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Santharantī^eb^ti sammantanavasena tiṭṭhanti.

[03]^b^Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissatī^eb^ti buddhavacanassa āgamanasīsena ariyaphaladhammānampi āgamanaṃ vuttameva, tiyāmarattiṃ tattha vasantānaṃ phalasamāpattivaḷañjanaṃ hotīti. Tasmiñca bhikkhusaṅghe kalyāṇaputhujjanā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentā hontīti ce? Ariyamaggadhammānaṃ tattha āgamanaṃ hotiyeva.

[03]^b^Allagomayenā^eb^ti acchena allagomayarasena. ^b^Opuñchāpetvā^eb^ti vilimpitvā. ^b^Catujjātiyagandhehī^eb^ti tagarakuṅkumayavanapupphatamālapattāni pisitvā katagandhehi ^b^nānāvaṇṇe^eb^ti nīlādivasena nānāvaṇṇe, na bhittivisesavasena. Bhittivisesavasena pana nānāsaṇṭhānarūpameva. ^b^Mahāpiṭṭhikakojavake^eb^ti hatthipiṭṭhīsu attharitabbatāya mahāpiṭṭhikāti laddhasamaññe kojaveti vadanti. Kuttake pana sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^hatthattharaṇā^eb^ hatthirūpavicittā. ^b^Assattharakasīhattharakā^eb^dayopi assasīharūpādivicittā eva attharakā, ^b^cittattharakaṃ^eb^ nānārūpehi ceva nānāvidhamālākammādīhi ca vicittaṃ attharakaṃ.

[03]^b^Upadhāna^eb^nti apassayanaṃ ^b^upadahitvā^eb^ti apassayayoggabhāvena ṭhapetvā gandhehi katamālā ^b^gandhadāmaṃ,^eb^ tamālapattādīhi kataṃ ^b^pattadāmaṃ^eb^. Ādi-saddena hiṅgulatakkolajātiphalajātipupphādīhi katadāmaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pallaṅkākārena katapīṭhaṃ ^b^pallaṅkapīṭhaṃ,^eb^ tīsu passesu, ekapasse eva vā saupassayaṃ ^b^apassayapīṭhaṃ,^eb^ anapassayaṃ ^b^muṇḍapīṭhaṃ yojanāvaṭṭe^eb^ti yojanaparikkhepe.

[03]^b^Saṃvidhāyā^eb^ti antaravāsakassa koṇapadesañca itarapadesañca samaṃ katvā vidhāya. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kattariyā padumaṃ kantanto viyā’’^eb^ti ^b^timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento^eb^ti ettha ca yasmā buddhānaṃ rūpasampadā viya ākappasampadāpi paramukkaṃsagatā, tasmā tadā bhagavā evaṃ sobhatīti ^a^V2.0011^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇapāmaṅgenā’’^eb^tiādimāha, tattha ^b^asamena buddhavesenā^eb^tiādinā ^a^M2.0011^ea^ tadā bhagavā buddhānubhāvassa niguhaṇe kāraṇābhāvato tattha sannipatitadevamanussanāgayakkhagandhabbādīnaṃ pasādajananatthaṃ attano sabhāvapakatikiriyāyeva kapilavatthuṃ pāvisīti dasseti. Buddhānaṃ kāyappabhā nāma pakatiyā asītihatthamattameva padesaṃ pharatīti āha – ^b^‘‘asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesī’’^eb^ti nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassarānaṃ vasena ^b^chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo^eb^.

[03]^b^Sabbapāliphullo^eb^ti mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā phullo vikasito. ^b^Paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitāna^eb^ntiādi parikappūpamā. ^b^Yathā taṃ…pe… alaṅkataṃ^eb^ añño virocati, evaṃ virocittha, samatiṃsāya pāramitāhi abhisaṅkhatattā evaṃ virocitthāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Pañcavīsatiyā nadīna^eb^nti gaṅgādīnaṃ candabhāgāpariyosānānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā mahānadīnaṃ. ^b^Sambhijjā^eb^ti sambhedaṃ missībhāvaṃ patvā ^b^mukhadvāre^eb^ti samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
[03]^b^Devamanussanāgasupaṇṇagandhabbayakkhādīnaṃ akkhīnī^eb^ti cetaṃ parikappanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahassenā^eb^ti padasahassena, bhāṇavārappamāṇena ganthenāti attho.

[03]^b^Kampayanto vasundhara^eb^nti attano guṇavisesehi pathavīkampaṃ uppādento, evaṃbhūtopi ^b^aheṭhayanto pāṇāni^eb^. Sabbadakkhiṇattā buddhānaṃ ^b^dakkhiṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ uddharanto. Samaṃ samphusate bhūmiṃ^eb^ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya. Yadipi bhūmiṃ samaṃ phusati, ^b^rajasānupalippati^eb^ sukhumattā chaviyā. ^b^Ninnaṭṭhānaṃ unnamatī^eb^tiādi buddhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādasaṅkhātassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭilābhassa nissandaphalaṃ. ^b^Nātidūre uddharatī^eb^ti atidūre ṭhapetuṃ na uddharati. ^b^Naccāsanne ca nikkhipa^eb^nti accāsanne ca ṭhāne anikkhipanto niyyāti. ^b^Hāsayanto sadevake^eb^ loke tosayanto. Catūhi pādehi caratīti ^b^catucārī^eb^.

[03]Buddhānubhāvassa pakāsanavasena gatattā ^b^vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa^eb^. Sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā kathiyamāne ^b^dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ^eb^. Kasmā? ^b^Aparimāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā^eb^ bhagavanto, buddhaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanā jānantassa yathādhammasaṃvaṇṇanaṃyeva anupavisatīti.

[03]^b^Dukūlacumbaṭakenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0012^ea^ ganthitvā gahitadukūlavatthena, ^b^nāgavikkantacaraṇo^eb^ti hatthināgasadisapadanikkhepo. ^b^Satapuññalakkhaṇo^eb^ti anekasatapuññanimmitamahāpurisalakkhaṇo ^b^maṇiverocano yathā^eb^ti ativiya virocamāno maṇi viya verocano nāma eko maṇivisesoti keci ^b^mahāsālovā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0012^ea^ mahanto sālarukkho viya, koviḷārādimahārukkho viya vā ^b^padumo kokanado yathā^eb^ti kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ mahāpadumaṃ viya, vikasamānapadumaṃ viya vā.

[03]^b^Ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viyā^eb^tiādi tassā pakiṇṇakakathāya aññesaṃ dukkarabhāvadassanañceva suṇantānaṃ accantasukhāvahabhāvadassanañca ^b^pathavījaṃ ākaḍḍhento viyā^eb^ti nāḷiyantaṃ yojetvā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale pappaṭakojaṃ uddhaṃmukhaṃ katvā ākaḍḍhento viya ^b^yojanika^eb^nti yojanappamāṇaṃ ^b^madhubhaṇḍa^eb^nti madhupaṭalaṃ.

[03]^b^Mahanta^eb^nti uḷāraṃ. ^b^Sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hotī^eb^ti sabbameva paccayajātaṃ āvāsadāyakena dinnameva hoti. Tathāhi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassapi chāyūdakasampannaṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nhāyitvā paṭissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti. Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi kilamati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nisinnassa visabhāgasantati vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati patiṭṭhāti, vaṇṇadhātu āharitvā pakkhittā viya hoti, bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭako vijjhati, khāṇu paharati, sarīsapādiparissayo ceva corabhayañca uppajjati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nipannassa pana sabbe parissayā na honti, ajjhayantassa dhammapītisukhaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa upasamasukhaṃ uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato, bahi vicarantassa ca kāye sedā muccanti, akkhīni phandanti, senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe mañcapīṭhādīni na paññāyanti, muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti, dvāravātapānamañcapīṭhādīni paññāyanti, etasmimpi ca āvāse vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbaṃ dānaṃ dinnameva hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhūmaṭṭhaka…pe… na sakkā^eb^ti ayamattho ^b^mahāsudassanavatthunā^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.241 ādayo) dīpetabbo.

[03]^b^Sīta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0013^ea^ (sārattha. ṭī. cūḷavagga 3.295; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.4.243) ajjhattadhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhautuvipariṇāmavasena vā uppajjanakasītaṃ. ^b^Uṇha^eb^nti aggisantāpaṃ. Tassa pana davadāhādīsu sambhavo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Paṭihantī^eb^ti paṭibāhati. Yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ bādhanāni na honti, evaṃ karoti. Sītuṇhabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Vāḷamigānī^eb^ti sīhabyagghādivāḷamige. Guttasenāsanañhi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā na honti ^a^V2.0013^ea^. ^b^Sarīsape^eb^ti ye keci sarantā gacchante dīghajātike. ^b^Makase^eb^ti nidassanametaṃ, ḍaṃsādīnaṃ eteneva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sisire^eb^ti sītakālavasena sattāhavaddalikādivasena ca uppanne sisirasamphasse. ^b^Vuṭṭhiyo^eb^ti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Vātātapo ghoro^eb^ti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ummūlabhañjanavasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajārajādibhedo vāto ceva gimhapariḷāhasamayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriyātapo ca. ^b^Paṭihaññatī^eb^ti paṭibāhīyati. ^b^Leṇattha^eb^nti nānārammaṇato cittaṃ nivattetvā paṭisallānārāmatthaṃ. ^b^Sukhattha^eb^nti vuttaparissayābhāvena phāsuvihāratthaṃ. ^b^Jhāyitu^eb^nti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanijjhāyituṃ. ^b^Vipassitu^eb^nti aniccādito sabbasaṅkhāre sammasituṃ.

[03]^b^Vihāre^eb^ti paṭissaye. ^b^Kāraye^eb^ti kārāpeyya. ^b^Ramme^eb^ti manorame nivāsasukhe. ^b^Vāsayettha bahussute^eb^ti kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya. Te nivāsento pana ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti, evaṃ ^b^annañca pānañca vatthasenāsanāni ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu^eb^ ajjhāsayasampannesu kammaphalānaṃ ratanattayaguṇānañca saddahanena ^b^vippasannena cetasā^eb^.

[03]Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ^b^ ‘‘te tassā’’^eb^ti gāthamāha. Tattha ^b^te^eb^ti bahussutā ^b^tassā^eb^ti upāsakassa. ^b^Dhammaṃ desentī^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭadukkhapanudanaṃ dhammaṃ desenti. ^b^Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyā^eb^ti so puggalo yaṃ saddhammaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sammāpaṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamena anāsavo hutvā parinibbāyati.

[03]Pūjāsakkāravaseneva ^a^M2.0014^ea^ paṭhamayāmo khepito, bhagavato desanāya appāvaseso majjhimayāmo gatoti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘bahudeva ratti’’nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sandassesī^eb^ti ānisaṃsaṃ dassesi, āvāsadānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ sutvā tato paraṃ, ‘‘mahārāja, itipi sīlaṃ, itipi samādhi, itipi paññā’’ti sīlādiguṇe tesaṃ sammā dassesi, hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhato pakāsesi. ^b^Samādapesī^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ sīlaṃ samādātabbaṃ, sīle patiṭṭhitena evaṃ samādhi, evaṃ paññā bhāvetabbā’’ti yathā te sīlādiguṇe ādiyanti, tathā gaṇhāpesi. ^b^Samuttejesī^eb^ti yathā samādinnaṃ sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hoti, samathavipassanā ca bhāviyamānā yathā suṭṭhu visodhitā uparivisesāvahā honti, evaṃ cittaṃ samuttejesi nisāmanavasena vodāpesi. ^b^Sampahaṃsesī^eb^ti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ṭhitasīlādiguṇehi sampati laddhaguṇānisaṃsehi ^a^V2.0014^ea^ ceva upari laddhabbaphalavisesehi ca uparicittaṃ sammā pahaṃsesi, laddhassāsavasena suṭṭhu tosesi. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo.
[03]Samudāyavacanopi asītimahāthera-saddo tadekadesepi niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘asītimahātheresu vijjamānesū’’^eb^ti. Ānandattheropi hi antogadho evāti. ^b^Sākiyamaṇḍale^eb^ti sākiyarājasamūhe.

[03]Paṭipadāya niyuttattā ^b^pāṭipado^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘paṭipannako’’^eb^ti. Sikkhanasīlatādinā ^b^sekho,^eb^ odhiso samitapāpatāya ^b^samaṇo^eb^. Sekho pāṭipado paṭipajjanapuggalādhiṭṭhānena paṭipadādesanaṃ niyamento paṭipadāya puggalaṃ niyameti nāmāti ^b^‘‘paṭipadāya puggalaṃ niyametvā dassetī’’^eb^ti. Sekhappaṭipadā sāsane ^b^maṅgalapaṭipadā^eb^ sammadeva asevitabbaparivajjanena sevitabbasamādānena ukkaṃsavatthūsu ca bhāvato asekhadhammapāripūriyā āvahattā ca ^b^vaḍḍhamānakapaṭipadā^eb^. ^b^Akilamantāva sallakkhessantī^eb^ti idaṃ tadā tesaṃ asekhabhūmiadhigamāya ayogyatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Akilamantāvā^eb^ti iminā paṭisambhidāppattassapi anadhigatamaggasaññāpanā bhāriyāti dasseti. ^b^Osaṭā^eb^ti anuppaviṭṭhā. ^b^Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitameva hoti^eb^ tassa sīlakathābāhullato sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Tīhi piṭakehīti^eb^ karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tena taṃtaṃpiṭakānaṃ tassā tassā sikkhāya sādhakatamabhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Piṭṭhivāto^eb^^a^M2.0015^ea^^b^uppajjati^eb^ upādinnakasarīrassa tathārūpattā saṅkhārānañca aniccatāya dukkhānubandhattā. ^b^Akāraṇaṃ vā eta^eb^nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘pahotī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi^eb^ sakyarājūnaṃ ajjhāsayavasena. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘satthāpi tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nipajjītī’’ti. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘piṭṭhi me āgilāyatī’’ti idaṃ kathanti āha ^b^‘‘upādinnakasarīrañca nāmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena…pe… sampanno’’tiādīsu (vibha. 511) samannāgatattho sampanna-saddo, idha pana pāripūriatthoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇasīloti attho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yo pana sampannasīloyeva, so paripuṇṇasīlo. Parisuddhañhi sīlaṃ ‘‘paripuṇṇa’’nti vuccati, na sabalaṃ kammāsaṃ vā. ^b^Sundaradhammehī^eb^ti sobhanadhammehi. Yasmiṃ santāne uppannā tassa sobhanabhāvato. Tehi sappurisabhāvasādhanato ^b^sappurisānaṃ^eb^ dhammehi.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iminā^eb^^a^V2.0015^ea^^b^ettakena ṭhānenā^eb^ti ‘‘idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako’’ti ārabhitvā yāva ‘‘akasiralābhī’’ti padaṃ iminā ettakena uddesapadena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Paṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti uddesapaṭipāṭiyā. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ kathañca, mahānāmā’’tiādinā idāni vuccamānena dassitākārena āha.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hirīyatī^eb^ti lajjīyati pīḷīyati. Yasmā hirī pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇā, tasmā ^b^‘‘jigucchatīti attho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ottappatī^eb^ti uttappati. Pāputrāsalakkhaṇañhi ottappaṃ. ^b^Paggahitavīriyo^eb^ti saṅkocaṃ anāpannavīriyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anosakkitamānaso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pahānatthāyā^eb^ti samucchindanatthāya. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadā nāma adhigamo evāti āha ^b^‘‘paṭilābhatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satinepakkenā^eb^ti satiyā nepakkena tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana nepakkaṃ nāma paññāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘satiyā ca nipakabhāvena cā’’^eb^ti attho vutto, evaṃ sati añño niddiṭṭho nāma hoti. ^b^Satimā^eb^ti ca imināva visesā sati gahitā, parato ‘‘cirakatampi ^a^M2.0016^ea^ cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā’’ti satikiccameva niddiṭṭhaṃ, na paññākiccaṃ, tasmā ^b^satinepakkenā^eb^ti satiyā nepakkabhāvenāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Teneva hi paccayavisesavasena aññadhammanirapekkho satiyā balavabhāvo. Tathā hi ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi ajjhayanasammasanāni sambhavanti.

[03]^b^Cetiyaṅgaṇavattādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bodhiyaṅgaṇavattādīni saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Asītimahāvattapaṭipattipūraṇa^eb^nti ettha asītivattapaṭipattipūraṇaṃ mahāvattapaṭipattipūraṇanti vattapaṭipattipūraṇa-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha ^b^mahāvattāni^eb^ (vibha. mūlaṭī. 406) nāma vattakhandhake (cūḷava. 356 ādayo) vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikaṃ gamikaṃ anumodanaṃ bhattaggaṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ āraññikaṃ senāsanaṃ jantāgharaṃ vaccakuṭi upajjhāyaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ ācariyaṃ antevāsikavattanti cuddasa. Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāle pārivāsikādikāle ca caritabbāni asīti khuddakavattāni sabbāsu avatthāsu na caritabbāni, tasmā mahāvattesu, aggahitāni. Tattha ‘‘pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī’’ti ārabhitvā ‘‘na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe… na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba’’nti (cūḷava. 81) vuttāni pakabhatte caritabbavattāvasānāni chasaṭṭhi, tato paraṃ ‘‘na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena mānattārahena mānattacārikena abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vattabba’’ntiādīni (cūḷava. 82) pakatatte caritabbehi anaññattā visuṃ visuṃ agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu ^a^V2.0016^ea^ caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitabbāni pañcāti ekasattativattāni, ukkhepaniyakammakatavattesu vattapaññāpanavasena vuttaṃ – ‘‘na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ…pe… nhāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba’’nti (cūḷava. 51) idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ, ‘‘na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitabbo’’tiādīni ca dasāti evametāni dvāsīti. Etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāni kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsīti, evaṃ appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanupagaṃ na hotīti idha ‘‘asīti’’cceva vuttaṃ. Aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese ‘‘dvāsīti khandhakavattānī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Sakkaccaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0017^ea^^b^uddisanaṃ sakkaccaṃ uddisāpana^eb^nti paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃ-saddo yojetabbo. ^b^Uddisanaṃ^eb^ uddesaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Dhammosāraṇaṃ^eb^ dhammassa uccāraṇaṃ. ^b^Dhammadesanā^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Ādimhi sīlaṃ deseyya, majjhe jhānaṃ vipassanaṃ;
[22]Pariyosāne ca nibbānaṃ, esā kathikasaṇṭhitī’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.190; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.4.246) –

[07]^b^Evaṃ^eb^ kathitalakkhaṇā dhammakathā. Upagantvā nisinnassa yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa pabbajitassa vā taṅkhaṇānurūpā dhammī kathā ^b^upanisinnakathā^eb^. Bhattānumodanakathā ^b^anumodaniyā. Saritā^eb^ti ettha na kevalaṃ cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ saraṇamanussaraṇamattaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho tathāpavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ pariggahamukhena pavattavipassanācāre satisambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpananti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ kāyena cirakate’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sakimpi saraṇenā^eb^ti ekavāraṃ saraṇena. ^b^Punappunaṃ saraṇenā^eb^ti anu anu saraṇena. Satisambojjhaṅgampi vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vosaggapariṇāmiñca katvā saranto tattha tattha javanavāre saraṇajavanavāre parittajavanavasena ^b^anussaritāti veditabbā^eb^.

[03]Gatiatthā dhātusaddā buddhiatthā hontīti āha –^b^ ‘‘udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ samatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Missakanayenāyaṃ desanā āgatāti āha – ^b^‘‘vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena cā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanāpaññāya cevā’’^eb^tiādi. Vipassanāpaññāya nibbedhikapariyāyato. Sā ca kho padesikāti nippadesikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Dukkhakkhayagāminibhāvepi eseva nayo. ^b^Sammā^eb^ti yāthāvato. Akuppadhammatāya ^a^V2.0017^ea^ hi maggapaññā khepitakhepanāya na puna kiccaṃ atthīti upāyena ñāyena yā pavatti sā evāti āha – ^b^‘‘hetunā nayenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ Adhikaṃ ceto abhiceto, mahaggatacittaṃ, tassa pana adhikatā kāmacchandādipaṭipakkhavigamena visiṭṭhabhāvappatti, tannissitāni ^b^ābhicetasikāni^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhicittaṃ seṭṭhacittaṃ sitāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāna^eb^nti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve phāsuvihārabhūtānaṃ. Tehi ^a^M2.0018^ea^ pana samaṅgitakkhaṇe yasmā vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ apītijaṃ satipārisuddhiñāṇasukhañca paṭilabhati vindati, tasmā āha – ^b^‘‘appitappitakkhaṇe sukhapaṭilābhahetūna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitā^eb^ti iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha, ‘‘nikāmalābhī’’ti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānā paccavekkhaṇavasiyo ca vuttā evāti veditabbā. ^b^Nidukkhalābhī^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ jhānānaṃ sukhapaṭipadākhippābhiññataṃ dasseti, ^b^vipulalābhī^eb^ti iminā paguṇataṃ tappamāṇadassitabhāvadīpanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paguṇabhāvenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samāpajjituṃ sakkoti^eb^ samāpajjanavasībhāvatāya sādhitattā. ^b^Samādhipāripanthikadhamme^eb^ti vasībhāvassa paccanīkadhamme. Jhānādhigamassa pana paccanīkadhammā pageva vikkhambhitā, aññathā jhānādhigamo eva na siyā. ^b^Akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti kicchena vikkhambheti visodheti, kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandādīnaṃ aññesaṃ samādhipāripanthikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ visodhananti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vipassanāhitāya uparūparivisesāvahattā vaḍḍhamānāya pubbabhāgasīlādi^b^paṭipadāya^eb^. Sā eva pubbabhāgapaṭipadā yathābhāvitatāya avassaṃ bhāvinaṃ visesaṃ pariggahitattā aṇḍaṃ viyāti aṇḍaṃ, kilesehi adūsitatāya apūti aṇḍaṃ etassāti apuccaṇḍo, vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhitapuggalo, tassa bhāvo ^b^apuccaṇḍatā. Vipassanādiñāṇappabhedāyā^eb^ti pubbenivāsañāṇādiñāṇapabhedāya. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti cetokhilasutte (ma. ni. 1.185) ‘‘sa kho so, bhikkhave, evaṃ ussoḷhipannarasaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidāyā’’ti āgatattā ^b^ussoḷhipannarasehi aṅgehi samannāgatabhāvoti evaṃ yaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ āgataṃ,^eb^ taṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ idha imasmiṃ sekhasutte yojetvā veditabbanti sambandho.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahaggatādibhāvena heṭṭhimānaṃ jhānānaṃ anurūpampi attano visesena te uttaritvā atikkamitvāna ṭhitanti ^b^anuttaraṃ,^eb^ tenāha – ^b^‘‘paṭhamādijjhānehi asadisaṃ uttama’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dutiyādīsupi^eb^^a^V2.0018^ea^ abhinibbhidāsu. Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yathā attano visayapaṭicchādakaṃ kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamantameva ^a^M2.0019^ea^ uppajjati, evaṃ attano visaye kañci visesaṃ karontameva uppajjatīti āha – ^b^‘‘pubbenivāsañāṇena paṭhamaṃ jāyatī’’^eb^ti, sesañāṇadvayepi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Caraṇasmi^eb^nti paccatte bhummavacananti āha ^b^‘‘caraṇaṃ nāma hotīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ agatapubbadisāgamane tesaṃ sādhakatamabhāvato.

[03]^b^Aṭṭha ñāṇānī^eb^ti idha āgatāni ca anāgatāni ca ^b^ambaṭṭhasuttā^eb^dīsu (dī. ni. 1.254 ādayo) āgatāni gahetvā vadati. ^b^Vinivijjhitvā^eb^ti pubbenivāsapaṭicchādakādikilesatamaṃ bhinditvā padāletvā.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sanaṅkumārenā^eb^ti sanantanakumārena. Tadeva hi tassa sanantanakumārataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cirakālato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^So attabhāvo^eb^ti yena attabhāvena manussapathe jhānaṃ nibbattesi, so kumārattabhāvo, tasmā brahmabhūtopi tādisena kumārattabhāvena carati.

[03]Janitasmiṃ-saddo eva i-kārassa e-kāraṃ katvā ^b^‘‘janetasmi’’^eb^nti vutto, ^b^janitasmi^eb^nti ca janasminti attho veditabbo. ^b^Janitasmi^eb^nti sāmaññaggahaṇepi yattha catuvaṇṇasamaññā, tattheva manussaloke. ^b^Khattiyo seṭṭho^eb^ti lokasamaññāpi manussalokeyeva, na devakāye brahmakāye vāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye gottapaṭisārino’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭisarantī^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ gotamo, ahaṃ kassapo’’ti pati pati attano gottaṃ anusaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.

[03]^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘sādhu sādhu ānandā’’ti ettakena sādhukāradānena. ^b^Jinabhāsitaṃ nāma jāta^eb^ntiādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā therabhāsitaṃ buddhabhāsitameva nāma jātaṃ. ‘‘Kimpanidaṃ suttaṃ satthudesanānuvidhānato jinabhāsitaṃ, udāhu sādhukāradānamattenā’’ti evarūpā codanā idha anokāsā therassa desanāya bhagavato desanānuvidhānahetukattā sādhukāradānassāti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sekhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṅgā ^a^M2.0020^ea^ nāma ^a^V2.0019^ea^ janapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhivasena aṅgātveva vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgāyeva so janapado’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahiyā panassa uttarena yā āpo^eb^ti mahiyā nadiyā yā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti. ^b^Tāsaṃ avidūrattā^eb^ so janapado ^b^uttarāpoti vuccati^eb^. Sā pana mahī katthaci katthaci bhijjitvā gatāti āha ^b^‘‘kataramahiyā uttarena yā āpo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tassā mahiyā āgamanato paṭṭhāya ^b^ayaṃ āvibhāvakathā^eb^. Yasmā (a. ni. ṭī. 3.8.19) lokiyā jambudīpo himavā tattha patiṭṭhitasamuddadahapabbatanadiyoti etesu yaṃ yaṃ na manussagocaraṃ, tattha sayaṃ sammūḷhā aññepi sammohayanti, tattha tattha sammohavidhamanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ kira jambudīpo’’^eb^tiādimāraddhaṃ. ^b^Dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo^eb^ āyāmato ca vitthārato cāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Udakena ajjhotthaṭo^eb^ tadupabhogisattānaṃ puññakkhayena.

[03]Sundaradassanaṃ kūṭanti ^b^sudassanakūṭaṃ,^eb^ yaṃ loke ‘‘hemakūṭa’’nti vuccati. ^b^Mūlagandho^eb^ kāḷānusāriyādi. ^b^Sāragandho^eb^ candanādi. ^b^Pheggugandho^eb^ salalādi. ^b^Tacagandho^eb^ lavaṅgādi. ^b^Papaṭikagandho^eb^ kabitthādi. ^b^Rasagandho^eb^ sajjādi, ^b^pattagandho^eb^ tamālahiriverādi. ^b^Pupphagandho^eb^ nāgakuṅkumādi. ^b^Phalagandho^eb^ jātiphalādi. ^b^Gandhagandho^eb^ sabbesaṃ gandhānaṃ gandho. Yassa hi rukkhassa sabbesampi mūlādīnaṃ gandho atthi, so idha gandho nāma. Tassa gandhassa gandho gandhagandho. Sabbāni puthulato paññāsayojanāni, āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevāti vadanti.

[03]^b^Manoharasilātalānī^eb^ti otaraṇatthāya manuññasopānasilātalāni. ^b^Supaṭiyattānī^eb^ti tadupabhogisattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammānubhāvena suṭṭhu paṭiyattāni suppavattitāni honti. Macchakacchapādayo udakaṃ malinaṃ karonti, tadabhāvato ^b^phalikasadisanimmaludakāni^eb^. Tiriyato dīghaṃ uggatakūṭanti ^b^‘‘tiracchānapabbata’’^eb^nti āha.

[03]Āpaṇāni ^a^M2.0021^ea^ eva vohārassa mukhabhūtānīti āha ^b^‘‘āpaṇamukhasahassānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vibhattānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0020^ea^ vavatthitāni aññamaññāsambhinnāni. ^b^Vasanaṭṭhāna^eb^nti attano yathāphāsukaṃ vasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Āsati etthāti ^b^āsanaṃ,^eb^ nisīditabbaṭṭhānāni.

[03]Asāruppaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakassa chādanato channaṃ ^b^anucchavikaṃ,^eb^ tadeva ajjhāsayasampattiṃ patirūpeti pakāsetīti ^b^patirūpaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nappatirūpa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāraṇavevacanānī^eb^ti ñāpakakāraṇavevacanāni. Ñāpakañhi kāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Atthaṃ ākaroti pakāsetīti ^b^ākāro,^eb^ tameva līnaṃ guḷhaṃ atthaṃ gametīti ^b^liṅgaṃ,^eb^ so tena nimīyatīti ^b^nimitta^eb^nti vuccati. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘dīghadasavattha…pe… nimittāti vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Te^eb^ti ākārādayo. ^b^Tathā hi pana me^eb^tiādinā potaliyo gahapati ‘‘paribbājakaniyāmena ahaṃ jīvāmi, tasmā gahapati na homīti vadati. ^b^Ovadanto^eb^ti anusāsanto. ^b^Upavadanto^eb^ti paribhāsanto.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gedhabhūto lobho^eb^ti gijjhanasabhāvo lobho. Agijjhanalakkhaṇo na lobho, ^b^anindābhūtaṃ aghaṭṭana^eb^nti nindāya paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ paresaṃ aghaṭṭanaṃ. ^b^Nindāghaṭṭanā^eb^ti nindāvasena paresaṃ ghaṭṭanā akkosanā. ^b^Byavahāravohāropī^eb^ti kayavikkayalakkhaṇo sabyohāropi dānaggahaṇaṃ vohāro. ‘‘Datto tisso’’ tiādinā voharaṇaṃ paññāpananti ^b^paññatti vohāro^eb^. Yathādhippetassa atthassa voharaṇaṃ kathanaṃ bodhananti ^b^vacanaṃ vohāro^eb^. Yāthāvato ayāthāvato ca voharati etenāti ^b^vohāro, cetanā. Ayamidhādhippeto^eb^ti ayaṃ cetanālakkhaṇo vohāro idha imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto, so ca kho sāvajjova samucchedassa icchitattā. Idāni catubbidhassapi vohārassa idha sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Gihīti cetanā natthī^eb^ti ahaṃ gihīti cetanāpavatti natthi. ^b^Gihīti vacanaṃ natthī^eb^ti gihīti attano paresañca vacanappavatti natthi. ^b^Gihīti paṇṇatti natthī^eb^ti gihīti samaññā natthi. ^b^Gihīti byavahāro natthī^eb^ti samudācāro natthi.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāṇātipātova saṃyojanaṃ^eb^. Kasmā? Bandhanabhāvena pavattanato nissarituṃ appadānato. Pāṇātipātassa atthitāya so puggalo ^a^M2.0022^ea^ ‘‘pāṇātipātī’’ti vuccatīti āha – ^b^‘‘pāṇātipātassa…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. Yañhi yassa atthi, tena so apadissatīti. ^b^Bahutāyā^eb^ti acakkhukādibhedena bahubhāvato. Pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkho ^b^apāṇātipāto^eb^. So pana atthato kāyadvāriko sīlasaṃvaroti āha ^b^‘‘kāyikasīlasaṃvarenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attāpi maṃ upavadeyyā^eb^tiādi pāṇātipāte ādīnavadassanaṃ. Ādīnavadassino hi tato oramaṇaṃ. ^b^Desanāvasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0021^ea^ aññattha sutte abhidhamme ca dasasu saṃyojanesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu desanāvasena apariyāpannampi ^b^saṃyojanantipi nīvaraṇanti^eb^pi idha ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^. Kasmā? Tadatthasambhavato. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘vaṭṭabandhanaṭṭhena hitappaṭicchādanaṭṭhena cā’’^eb^ti, pāṇātipāto hi apāṇātipātapaccayaṃ hitaṃ paṭicchādentova uppajjatīti. ^b^Eko avijjāsavo^eb^ti idaṃ sahajātavasena vuttaṃ, upanissayavasena pana itaresampi āsavānaṃ yathārahaṃ sambhavo veditabbo. Pāṇātipātī hi puggalo ‘‘tappaccayaṃ atthaṃ karissāmī’’ti kāme pattheti. Diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, bhavavisesaṃ paccāsīsati. Tattha uppannaṃ vihanati bādhatīti ^b^vighāto,^eb^ dukkhaṃ, pariḷāhanaṃ anatthuppādavasena upatāpanaṃ ^b^pariḷāho,^eb^ ayametesaṃ viseso. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu vāresu. ^b^Iminā upāyenā^eb^ti atidesena pana pariggahito attho parato āgamissatīti.

[03]^b^34-40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmiṃ pade^eb^ti etena sattasupi vāresu tathā āgataṃ padaṃ sāmaññato gahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā’’^eb^tiādi. Rosanaṃ kāyikaṃ vācasikañcāti tappaṭipakkho arosopi tathā duvidhoti āha ^b^‘‘kāyikavācasikasaṃvarenā’’^eb^ti. Yathā abhijjhā lobho, anabhijjhā alobho, evaṃ ^b^akodhūpāyāso^eb^ abyāpādo, saṃvare sukhanti ^b^saṃvaro^eb^ti daṭṭhabbo, anatilobho pana satisaṃvare, anatimāno ñāṇasaṃvare saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imesu pana padesu evaṃ sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbāti sambandho.

[03]^b^Evaṃ āsavuppatti veditabbā^eb^ti ettha vuttassapi ekajjhaṃ vuccamānattā ^b^‘‘puna ayaṃ saṅkhepavinicchayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Asammohatthaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇassa. ^b^Purimesu tāva catūsu^eb^ vāresu ^b^viramituṃ na sakkomīti vattabbaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Attāpi maṃ upavadeyyā’’ti etassa padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^‘‘na sakkomī’’^eb^ti, ‘‘anuvijjāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyu’’nti etassa padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^‘‘na sakkotī’’ti^eb^^a^M2.0023^ea^^b^vattabbaṃ,^eb^ iminā nayena pacchimesupi catūsu yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā. ^b^Atimāne bhavāsavāvijjāsavā^eb^ti vuttaṃ mānena saha diṭṭhiyā anuppajjanato, atimāno pana kāmarāgenapi uppajjatevāti ‘‘atimāne kāmāsavāvijjāsavā’’ti vattabbaṃ siyā, svāyaṃ nayo vuttanayattā suviññeyyoti na dassito. ^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathitaṃ^eb^ ādito catūhi chaṭṭhena vāti pañcahi vārehi, sesehi tīhi ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno paṭisaṅkhāpahānaṃ,^eb^ sabbehipi pana bhikkhubhāve ṭhitassa ^b^gihivohārasamucchedo kathito^eb^. Tattha sabbattha vattaṃ ‘‘idañcidañca mayhaṃ kātuṃ nappatirūpa’’nti paṭisaṅkhānavasena akaraṇaṃ pajahanañca paṭisaṅkhāpahānaṃ.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upasumbheyyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0022^ea^ ettha ^b^upa^eb^-saddo samīpattho, sumbhanaṃ vikkhepanaṃ. Teneva ^b^tamena^eb^nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha – ^b^‘‘tassa samīpe khipeyyā’’^eb^ti, tassa kukkurassa samīpe aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ khipeyyāti attho. ^b^Nimmaṃsattā kaṅkalanti vuccatī^eb^ti iminā vigatamaṃsāya aṭṭhikaṅkalikāya uraṭṭhimhi vā piṭṭhikaṇṭake vā sīsaṭṭhimhi vā kaṅkala-saddo niruḷhoti dasseti. ^b^Sunikkanta^eb^nti nillikhitaṃ katvāva nibbisesaṃ likhitaṃ.

[03]Ekattupaṭṭhānassa ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā ^b^ekattā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catutthajhānupekkhā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā panassa ārammaṇampi ekasabhāvameva, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Lokāmisasaṅkhātā^eb^ti apariññātavatthunā lokena āmasitabbato, loke vā āmisoti saṅkhaṃ gatāya vasena kāmaguṇānaṃ kāmabhāvo ca āmisabhāvo ca, so eva nippariyāyato āmisanti vattabbataṃ arahati. ^b^Kāmaguṇāmisā^eb^ti kāmaguṇe chandarāgā. ^b^Gahaṇaṭṭhena^eb^ bhusaṃ ādānaṭṭhena.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ḍayanaṃ ākāsena gamananti āha ^b^‘‘uppatitvā gaccheyyā’’^eb^ti. Gijjhādīnaṃ vāsipharasu na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘mukhatuṇḍakena ḍasantā taccheyyu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vissajjeyyu^eb^nti ettha ‘‘vissajjana’’nti ākaḍḍhanaṃ adhippetaṃ anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ, ākaḍḍhanañca anubandhitvā pātananti āha ^b^‘‘maṃsapesiṃ nakhehi kaḍḍhitvā pāteyyu’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Purisassa ^a^M2.0024^ea^ ārohanayogyaṃ ^b^poriseyyaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sampannaṃ sundaraṃ phalamassāti ^b^sampannaphalaṃ. Phalūpapanna^eb^nti phalehi upetanti āha ^b^‘‘bahuphala’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suvidūravidūre^eb^ti ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedato suṭṭhu vidūrabhūte eva vidūre ^b^ahaṃ^eb^ ṭhito. Kassaci nāma atthassapi ajānanato na ājānantīti ^b^anājānīyā^eb^ti kattusādhanamassa dassento ^b^ajānanake^eb^ti ajānantabhojanasīsena tesaṃ dātabbapaccaye vadati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Potaliyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kumārena ^a^V2.0023^ea^ bhato posāpitoti kumārabhato, kumārabhato eva ^b^komārabhacco^eb^ yathā ‘‘bhisakkameva bhesajja’’nti.

[03]^b^Ārabhantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ārabha^eb^-saddo kāmaṃ kāmāyūhanayaññuṭṭhāpanāapattiāpajjanaviññāpanādīsupi āgato, idha pana hiṃsane icchitabboti āha – ^b^‘‘ārabhantīti ghātentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uddisitvā kata^eb^nti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.8.12; sārattha. ṭī. mahāvagga 3.294) attānaṃ uddisitvā māraṇavasena kataṃ nibbattitaṃ. ^b^Paṭiccakamma^eb^nti ettha ^b^kamma^eb^-saddo kammasādhano atītakālikoti āha – ^b^‘‘attānaṃ paṭicca kata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nimittakammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘paṭicca kammaṃ phusatī’’tiādīsu (jā. 1.4.75) viya. ^b^Nimittakammassā^eb^ti nimittabhāvena laddhabbakammassa, na karaṇakārāpanavasena. ^b^Paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘buddhaṃ etassa atthīti buddho’’ti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti nigaṇṭhānaṃ. Aññepi brāhmaṇādayo taṃladdhikā attheva.

[03]^b^Kāraṇa^eb^nti ettha yutti adhippetā, sā eva ca dhammato anapetattā ‘‘dhammo’’ti vuttāti āha – ^b^‘‘kāraṇaṃ nāma tikoṭiparisuddhamacchamaṃsaparibhogo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anukāraṇaṃ nāma mahājanassa tathā byākaraṇaṃ^eb^ yuttiyā dhammassa anurūpabhāvato maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbanti anuññātaṃ tatheva kathananti katvā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ‘‘jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjatī’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^neva kāraṇaṃ hoti^eb^^a^M2.0025^ea^ sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato sati ca ayuttiyaṃ adhammoti katvā. ^b^Tathā byākaraṇa^eb^nti ‘‘jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjatī’’ti kathanaṃ yuttiyā dhammassa ananurūpabhāvato ^b^na anukāraṇaṃ hoti. Parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā^eb^ti pare titthiyā ‘jāna’ntiādinā dhammaṃ kathenti vadanti, tena kāraṇabhūtena sakāraṇo hutvā. Tehi tathā vattabbo eva ^b^hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā anuvādo vā^eb^ ‘‘maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabba’’nti pavattā tumhākaṃ kathā vā parato parehi tathā pavattitā tassā anukathā vā. ^b^Viññūhi garahitabbakāraṇa^eb^nti titthiyā tāva tiṭṭhantu, tato aññehi paṇḍitehi garahitabbakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Koci na āgacchatī^eb^ti garahitabbataṃ na āpajjatīti attho. ^b^Abhibhavitvā ācikkhantī^eb^ti abhibhuyya madditvā kathenti, abhibhūtena akkosantīti attho.

[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāraṇehī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0024^ea^ paribhogacittassa avisuddhatāhetūhi. Bhikkhū uddissakataṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Tādisamaṃsañhi paribhogānārahattā cittāvisuddhiyā kāraṇaṃ cittasaṃkilesāvahato. Idāni diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhādīsū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkita^eb^nti ‘‘diṭṭhaṃ suta’’nti imaṃ ubhayaṃ anissāya – ‘‘kiṃ nu kho imaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa vadhitvā sampādita’’nti kevalameva parisaṅkitaṃ. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhako^eb^ti sabbesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ parisaṅkitānaṃ saṅgaṇhanako.

[03]^b^Maṅgalādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āhunapāhunādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Nibbematikā hontī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ parisaṅkitābhāvamāha. ^b^Itaresa^eb^nti ajānantānaṃ ^b^vaṭṭati,^eb^ jānato evettha āpatti hoti. ^b^Teyevā^eb^ti ye uddissa kataṃ, teyeva.

[03]Uddissakatamaṃsaparibhogato akappiyamaṃsaparibhogassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘akappiyamaṃsaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Purimasmiṃ sacittakā āpatti, itarasmiṃ acittakā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘akappiyamaṃsaṃ ajānitvā bhuttassapi āpattiyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paribhoga^eb^nti paribhuñjitabbanti vadāmīti attho.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tādisassā^eb^ti tikoṭiparisuddhassa macchamaṃsassa paribhoge. ^b^Mettāvihārinopī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^-saddena amettāvihārinopi. Mettāvihārino paribhoge sikhāppattā anavajjatāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘idha, jīvaka, bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0026^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Aniyametvā^eb^ti avisesetvā sāmaññato. Yasmā bhagavatā – ‘‘yato kho, vaccha, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hotī’’tiādinā mahāvacchagottasutte (ma. ni. 2.194) attā aniyametvā vutto. Tathā hi vacchagotto – ‘‘tiṭṭhatu bhavaṃ gotamo, atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekabhikkhupi sāvako āsavānaṃ khayā…pe… upasampajja viharatī’’ti āha, ‘‘idha, bhāradvāja, bhikkhu aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharatī’’tiādinā caṅkīsutte (ma. ni. 2.430) attā aniyametvā vutto. Tathā hi tattha parato – ‘‘yaṃ kho pana ayamāyasmā dhammaṃ deseti, gambhīro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo, na so dhammo sudesanīyo luddenā’’tiādinā desanā āgatā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavatā hi mahāvacchagottasutte, caṅkīsutte imasmiṃ sutteti tīsu ṭhānesu attānaṃyeva sandhāya desanā katā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Maṃsūpasecanova adhippeto^eb^ macchamaṃsasahitassa āhārassa paribhogabhāvato macchamaṃsassa ca idha adhippetattā.

[03]^b^Agathito^eb^^a^V2.0025^ea^ appaṭibaddho. ^b^Taṇhāmucchanāyā^eb^ti taṇhāyanavasena mucchāpattiyā. ^b^Anajjhopanno^eb^ taṇhāya abhibhavitvā na ajjhotthaṭo, gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā na saṇṭhitoti attho. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ ālumpitvā’’^eb^tiādi. Idha ādīnavo āhārassa paṭikūlabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘ekarattivāsenā’’^eb^tiādi. Ayamattho āhāraparibhogoti atthasaṃyojanaparicchedikā ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 3.182; ma. ni. 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ. ni. 4.120) pavattā āhārapaṭibaddhachandarāganissaraṇabhūtā paññā assa atthīti ^b^nissaraṇapañño. Idamattha^eb^nti etamatthāya. ^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti ‘‘brahmāti ca mettāvihārino samaññā’’ti avatvā ye dhammā mettāvihārassa paṭipakkhabhūtā, tattha sāvasesaṃ pahāsi brahmā, anavasesaṃ pahāsi bhagavāti sace te idaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ, evaṃ sante tava idaṃ yathāvuttavacanaṃ anujānāmi, na mettāvihāritāsāmaññamattatoti attho.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Pāṭiyekko^eb^^a^M2.0027^ea^^b^anusandhī’’^eb^ti vatvā visuṃ anusandhibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvāraṃ thaketī^eb^ti macchamaṃsaparibhogānuññāya aññesaṃ vacanadvāraṃ pidahati, codanāpathaṃ nirundhati. Kathaṃ ^b^sattānuddayaṃ dasseti^eb^? Sattānuddayamukhena bāhirakānaṃ macchamaṃsaparibhogapaṭikkhepo tayidaṃ micchā, tikoṭiparisuddhasseva macchamaṃsassa paribhogo bhagavatā anuññāto. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – ‘tīhi kho ahaṃ, jīvaka, ṭhānehi maṃsaṃ paribhoganti vadāmī’tiādi (ma. ni. 2.52). ^b^Vinaye^eb^pi (pārā. 409; cūḷava. 343) vuttaṃ – ‘‘tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ, devadatta, macchamaṃsaṃ mayā anuññāta’’nti. Tikoṭiparisuddhañca bhuñjantānaṃ sattesu anuddayā niccalā. ^b^‘‘Sattānuddayaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Paṭhamena kāraṇenā^eb^ti desanāvasenapi payogavasenapi paṭhamena parūpaghātahetunā. ^b^Kaḍḍhito^eb^ so pāṇo. ^b^Galena pavedhentenā^eb^ti yottagalena karaṇena asayhamānena. ^b^Bahupuññameva hoti^eb^ āsādanāpekkhāya abhāvato, hitajjhāsayattā vāti adhippāyo. ^b^Esāhaṃ, bhante^eb^tiādi kasmā vuttaṃ, saraṇagamanavaseneva gahitasaraṇoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘aya’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ogāhanto^eb^tiādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā suttaṃ anussaranto atthaṃ upadhārento. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Jīvakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāvāraṃ ^a^V2.0026^ea^ pārupatīti pāvāriko, idaṃ tassa kulasamudāgataṃ nāmaṃ, so pana mahaddhano mahābhogo nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dussapāvārikaseṭṭhino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dīghattā^eb^ dīghatamattā. So kira pamāṇato upavacchayato diyaḍḍharatanaṃ atikkamma ṭhito. ^b^Evaṃladdhanāmo^eb^ti ‘‘dīghatapassī’’ti laddhasamañño. ^b^Bāhirāyatane^eb^ti titthiyasamaye ^b^piṇḍapātoti vohāro natthi,^eb^ tasmā sāsanavohārena ^b^‘‘piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto’’^eb^ti vuttanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Dassetī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0028^ea^ deseti. ^b^Ṭhapetī^eb^ti aññamaññasaṅkarato vavatthapeti. ^b^Kiriyāyā^eb^ti karaṇena. ^b^Pavattiyā^eb^ti pavattanena. ^b^Daṇḍāni paññapetī^eb^ti ettha kasmā bhagavatā āditova tathā na pucchitanti? Yasmā sā tasmiṃ atthe sabhāvanirutti na hoti, sāsane loke samayantaresu ca tādiso samudācāro natthi, kevalaṃ pana tasseva nigaṇṭhassāyaṃ koṭṭhālakasadiso samudācāroti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kammāni paññapeti’’^eb^ iccevāha. ^b^Acittaka^eb^nti cittarahitaṃ, cittena asamuṭṭhāpitanti attho. Kathaṃ pana tadubhayassa cittena vinā sambhavoti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanamāha ^b^‘‘yathā kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paṭivibhattāna^eb^nti atthato bhinnānaṃ. ^b^Paṭivisiṭṭhāna^eb^nti visesanapadavasena saddatopi bhinnānaṃ. ^b^Vacanaṃ patiṭṭhapetukāmo^eb^ti dīghatapassino yathāvuttavacanaṃ patiṭṭhapetukāmo. Tasmiñhi patiṭṭhāpite tenappasaṅgena āgato, upāli gahapati tasmiṃ padese dhammaṃ disvā sāsane abhippasīdissati.

[03]Kathā eva upari vādāropanassa vatthubhāvato ^b^kathāvatthu^eb^. ^b^Kathāyaṃ patiṭṭhapesī^eb^ti kathāvatthusmiṃ, tadatthe vā patiṭṭhapesi. Yathā taṃ vādāropanabhayena na avajānāti, evaṃ tassaṃ kathāyaṃ, tasmiṃ vā atthe dīghatapassiṃ yāvatatiyaṃ vāde patiṭṭhapesi. ^b^Vāda^eb^nti dosaṃ.

[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni cetanāsampayuttadhammampi gahetvā kāyakammādivasena saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāmā^eb^tiādi ‘‘kammassa kiriyāyā’’ti pāḷiyaṃ akusalakammassa adhigatattā vuttaṃ, pubbe pana ^b^aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanā^eb^tiādi sāvajjaṃ anavajjañca sāmaññato ekajjhaṃ katvā dassitaṃ. Kasmā panettha cetanā na gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ sutte kammaṃ dhura’’^eb^nti. Kāyakammādibhedaṃ kammameva ^a^V2.0027^ea^^b^dhuraṃ^eb^ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ, na cetanāmattameva. ^b^Evamāgatepī^eb^ti kammānīti evaṃ nāmena āgatepi cetanā dhuraṃ, tattha cetanaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vuttanti adhippāyo. Kathaṃ pana tattha kammanti vā kammānīti vā āgate tesaṃ cetanāya dhurabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘yattha katthaci…pe… labhatī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^yattha katthacī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kismiñci dvāre. ^b^Sā vuttāvā^eb^ti sā cetanā vuttāva, yā kāyasaṅkhārādipariyāyena (yassa kassaci kammassa kāyadvārādīsu pavattāpanacetanā) sampayuttadhammāpi ^a^M2.0029^ea^ tadaggena lokiyāpi lokuttarāpi kammameva, abhijjhādayo pana cetanāpakkhikāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Mahanta^eb^nti kaṭukaphalaṃ. ^b^Na kilamati^eb^ sappāṭihāriyattā paṭiññāya. Idāni tesaṃ sappāṭihāriyataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadi akusalaṃ patvā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati, atha kasmā bhagavā idha akusalaṃ manokammaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ kathesīti āha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne’’^eb^tiādi. Yāvatatiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpanamattena ^b^gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiñci atthanipphattiṃ apassantopī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nivāsaṭṭhānabhūto bālako etissā atthīti ^b^bālakinī^eb^. Satthupaṭiññātatāya nigaṇṭhānaṃ mahāti sambhāvitattā ^b^mahānigaṇṭho^eb^.

[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āvaṭṭeti purimākārato nivatteti attano vase vatteti etāyāti ^b^āvaṭṭanī,^eb^ māyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āvaṭṭetvā gahaṇamāya’’^eb^nti. Satthupaṭiññānaṃ buddhadassane cittameva na uppajjati, ayamettha dhammatā. Sace pana so taṃ paṭiññaṃ appahāya buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ upagaccheyya, sattadhā muddhā phaleyya, tasmā bhagavā ‘‘mā ayaṃ bālo vinassī’’tiāditova yathā sammukhībhāvaṃ na labhati, tathā karoti. Svāyamattho ^b^pāthikaputtasamāgamena^eb^ dīpetabbo. Dassanasampattiniyāmamāha ^b^‘‘tathāgataṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Āgamā nu kho idha^eb^ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ.
[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vacīsacce patiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti yathāpaṭiññātāya paṭiññāya ṭhatvā.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sītodake amatā pāṇā pānakāle pana maranti, tepi tena sītodakaparibhogena māritā honti, tasmā tapassinā nāma sabbena sabbaṃ sītodakaṃ na paribhuñjitabbanti tesaṃ laddhi. Pākatikaṃ vā udakaṃ sattoti purātanānaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ laddhi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattasaññāya sītodakaṃ paṭikkhipantī’’^eb^ti. Tesaṃ taṃ adhunātananigaṇṭhānaṃ vādena virujjhati. Te hi pathavīādinavapadatthato ^a^V2.0028^ea^ aññameva jīvitaṃ paṭijānanti. Cittena sītodakaṃ pātukāmo paribhuñjitukāmo hoti roge ṭhatvāpi sattānaṃ cittassa tathā na vitatatā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tenassa manodaṇḍo tattheva bhijjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sītodakaṃ pātuṃ paribhuñjituñca icchanena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa nigaṇṭhassa. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tathācittuppādane eva. ^b^Bhijjati^eb^ saṃvarassa vikopitattā. Tathābhūto so nigaṇṭho sītodakaṃ ^a^M2.0030^ea^ ce labheyya, katipayaṃ kālaṃ jīveyya, alābhena pana parisussamānakaṇṭhoṭṭhatālujivhāādiko sabbaso paridāhābhibhūto mareyya. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘sītodakaṃ alabhamāno kālaṃ kareyyā’’^eb^ti. Kasmā? Yasmā sītodakaṃ pivāya sannissitacittassa maraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘manodaṇḍo pana bhinnopi cutimpi ākaḍḍhatī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana tathābhūtacittassa nigaṇṭhassa manosattesu nāma devesu upapatti hotīti titthiyānaṃ laddhi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘manodaṇḍo pana bhinnopi paṭisandhimpi ākaḍḍhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itī^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘idhāssa nigaṇṭho’’tiādiākārena. ^b^Na^eb^nti upāliṃ gahapatiṃ. ^b^Mahantoti vadāpesi^eb^ ‘‘manopaṭibaddho kālaṅkarotī’’ti vadantoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Upāsakassā^eb^ti upālissa gahapatissa. ^b^Mucchāvasenā^eb^tiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca manodaṇḍassa mahantataṃ vibhāveti. ^b^Cittasantatippavattimattenevā^eb^ti vinā kāyadaṇḍena vacīdaṇḍena ca kevalaṃ cittasantatippavattimattena. ^b^Bhijjitvāpī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pi^eb^-saddena abhijjitvāpi. ^b^Aniyyānikā^eb^ti appāṭihīrā, ayuttāti attho. ^b^Sallakkhesi^eb^ upāsakoti vibhattiṃ vipariṇāmetvā yojanā. ^b^Pañhapaṭibhānānī^eb^ti ñātuṃ icchite atthe uppajjanakapaṭibhānāni.

[03]‘‘Manopaṭibaddho kālaṃ karotī’’ti vadantena atthato manodaṇḍassa taduttarabhāvo paṭiññāto hotīti āha ^b^‘‘idāni manodaṇḍo mahantoti idaṃ vacana’’^eb^nti. Tathā ceva vuttaṃ – ‘‘manodaṇḍova balavā mahantoti vadāpesī’’ti.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāṇātipātādito yamanaṃ yāmo, catubbidho yāmo catuyāmo, catuyāmasaṅkhātena saṃvarena saṃvuto ^b^cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yāma-saddo koṭṭhāsapariyāyoti ^b^‘‘iminā catukoṭṭhāsenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Piyajātikaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ rāgavasena bālehi bhāvanīyattā ‘‘bhāvita’’nti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘bhāvitanti pañca kāmaguṇā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yo sabbaṃ pāpaṃ āsavañca vāretīti sabbavārī, tassa navasu padatthesu sattamo padattho, tena sabbavārinā pāpaṃ vāritvā ṭhitoti ^b^sabbavārivārito^eb^^a^M2.0031^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbena pāpavāraṇena vāritapāpo’’^eb^ti. ^a^V2.0029^ea^ Tato eva sabbassa vāritabbassa āsavassa dhunanato ^b^sabbavāridhuto^eb^. Vāritabbassa nivāraṇavasena sabbavārino phuṭo phusitoti ^b^sabbavāriphuṭo. Saṅghāta^eb^nti sahasā hananaṃ, asañcetanikavadhanti attho. ^b^Katarasmiṃ koṭṭhāse^eb^ti tīsu daṇḍakoṭṭhāsesu katarakoṭṭhāse.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khaliyati samādiyatīti ^b^khalaṃ,^eb^ rāsīti āha – ^b^‘‘ekaṃ maṃsakhalanti ekaṃ maṃsarāsi’’^eb^nti. Vijjādharaiddhiyā ^b^iddhimā^eb^. Sā pana iddhi yasmā ānubhāvasampannasseva ijjhati, na yassa kassaci. Tasmā āha ^b^‘‘ānubhāvasampanno’’^eb^ti. Vijjānubhāvavaseneva ^b^ānubhāvasampanno. Citte vasībhāvappatto^eb^ ānubhāvāya eva vijjāya paguṇabhāvāpādanena. Etena vasībhāvaṃ lokiyasamaññāvasena bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ paññapetukāmo evamāha. Lokikā hi ‘‘bhāvanāmayaiddhiyā iddhimā cetovasībhāvappatto parūpaghātaṃ karotī’’ti maññanti. Tathā hi te isayo paresaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti, isīnaṃ ānubhāvaṃ kittenti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissatīti.
[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Araññameva hutvā^eb^ti sabbaso araññameva hutvā. Araññabhāvena ^b^araññaṃ jātaṃ,^eb^ na nāmamattena. ^b^Isīnaṃ atthāyā^eb^ti isīnaṃ āsādanatthāya.

[03]^b^Godhāvarītīrato^eb^ nātidūre. ^b^Usūyamāno^eb^ti ‘‘na maṃ esa jano parivāretī’’ti usūyaṃ karonto. ^b^Kiliṭṭho vatā^eb^ti paṅkadantarajasiratādīhi kiliṭṭhasarīro. ^b^Anañjitamaṇḍito^eb^ti anañjitakkhiko sabbena, sabbaṃ amaṇḍito ca. Tasmiṃ kāle ‘‘kālasseva akkhīnaṃ añjanaṃ maṅgala’’nti manussānaṃ laddhi, tasmā anañjanaṃ visuṃ gahitaṃ.

[03]^b^Rājā tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘vedesu īdisaṃ āgataṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ, bhante’’ti rājā tassa purohitassa vacanaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Usumajātahadayo^eb^ti uttattahadayo. Nāsikānaṃ appahonte ^b^mukhena assasanto^eb^.

[03]Vijitajayehi āgantvā nakkhattayuttaṃ āgamentehi nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^jayakhandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Udakavuṭṭhipātanādi tasmiṃ pāpakamme asamaṅgibhūtānampi samanuññatāya ^a^M2.0032^ea^ antokaraṇatthaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Katabhaṇḍavuṭṭhī^eb^ti ābharaṇavassaṃ. Mahājano samanuñño jātoti yojanā. ^b^Mātuposakarāmo^eb^ti mātari sammāpaṭipanno rāmo nāma eko puriso. ^b^Asamaṅgibhūtāna^eb^nti asamanuññānaṃ.
[03]^b^Avakiriyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0030^ea^ asussūsataṃ paṭicca. ^b^Phuliṅgānī^eb^ti aggikaṇāni. ^b^Patanti kāye^eb^ti kāye ito cito nipatanti. Ete kira nirayaṃ vivaritvā mahājanassa dassenti.

[03]^b^Yathāphāsukaṭṭhāna^eb^nti mayaṃ kañcipi desaṃ uddissa na gacchāma, yattha pana vasantassa pabbajitassa phāsu hoti, taṃ yathāphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmāti adhippāyo. ^b^Saṅghā^eb^ti saṃhatā. ^b^Gaṇā^eb^ti taṃtaṃseṇibhāvena gaṇitabbatāya gaṇā. ^b^Gaṇībhūtā^eb^ti ekajjhāsayā hutvā rāsibhūtā. ^b^Adinnādāna^eb^ntiādīsupi niraye paccitvā manussalokaṃ āgatassa vipākāvasesenāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Paggaṇhissāmī^eb^ti sambhāvanaṃ uppādessāmi. ^b^Nesaṃ kattabba^eb^nti cintesīti yojanā. Kiṃ cintesi? Āghātaṃ uppādetvā anatthakaraṇūpāyaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so dhammakathāpariyosāne’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nāgabalapicchillādīna^eb^nti nāgabalasāsapāṅkolatelakaṇikāraniyyāsādīnaṃ cikkhallānaṃ. ^b^Viheṭhayiṃsu^eb^ nirayādikathāhi ghaṭṭentā. ^b^Chadvārārammaṇe^eb^ti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ ārammaṇabhūte rūpādivisaye.

[03]^b^Nava vuṭṭhiyo^eb^ti udakavuṭṭhi sumanapupphavuṭṭhi māsakavuṭṭhi kahāpaṇavuṭṭhi ābharaṇavuṭṭhi āvudhavuṭṭhi aṅgāravuṭṭhi pāsāṇavuṭṭhi vālikāvuṭṭhīti imā nava vuṭṭhiyo. ^b^Avañcayī^eb^ti sakkāraṃ karonto viya hutvā asakkāraṃ karonto anatthacaraṇena vañcayi. ^b^Adūsake^eb^ti anaparādhe.

[03]‘‘Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā brāhmaṇakaññā’’ti jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu (jā. aṭṭha. 4.15ṃātaṅgajātakavaṇṇanā) āgataṃ, idha pana ‘‘seṭṭhidhītā’’ti. ^b^Vāreyyatthāyā^eb^ti āvāhatthāya, ^b^assā^eb^ti pesitapuggalassa. Tādisena nīcakulasaṃvattaniyena kammunā laddhokāsena ^b^caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbatto^eb^.

[03]^b^Cammagehe^eb^ti ^a^M2.0033^ea^ cammena chādite gehe. ^b^Mātaṅgotvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi^eb^ jātisamudāgataṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ghaṇṭaṃ. ^b^Vādento^eb^ tālanena saddaṃ karonto. ^b^Mahāpathaṃ paṭipajji^eb^ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehadvārasamīpena.
[03]Tassā veyyāvaccakarā ceva ^b^upaṭṭhākamanussā^eb^ paṭibaddhā ca ^b^surāsoṇḍādayo^eb^ jāṇukapparādīhi sukoṭṭitaṃ koṭṭitabhāvena mucchaṃ āpannattā ^b^matoti saññāya chaḍḍesuṃ^eb^.

[03]Atha bodhisatto ^a^V2.0031^ea^ āyuavasesassa atthitāya mandamande vāte vāyante cirena saññaṃ paṭilabhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāpuriso’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Gehaṅgaṇe^eb^ti gehassa mahādvārato bahi vivaṭaṅgaṇe. ^b^Patito^eb^ti pātaṃ katvā icchitatthanipphattiṃ antaraṃ katvā anuppavesena nipanno. ^b^Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhamaṅgalikākāraṇena.
[03]^b^Yasa^eb^nti vibhavaṃ kittisaddañca. ^b^Canda^eb^nti candamaṇḍalaṃ, candavimānanti attho. ^b^Ucchiṭṭhagehe^eb^ti parehi paribhuttagehe. ^b^Maṇḍape^eb^ti nagaramajjhe mahāmaṇḍape.

[03]^b^Khīramaṇimūla^eb^nti khīramūlaṃ, pādesu baddhamaṇimūlañca. ^b^Yāvatā vācuggatā pariyattī^eb^ti yattako manussavacīdvārato uggato nikkhanto pavatto, yaṃkiñci vacīmayanti attho. ^b^Ākāsaṅgaṇe^eb^ti vivaṭaṅgaṇe.

[03]^b^Dummavāsī^eb^ti dhūmo dhūsaro, anañjitāmaṇḍitoti adhippāyo. ^b^Otallako^eb^ti nihīnajjhāsayo, appānubhāvoti attho. ^b^Paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe^eb^ti yāva galavāṭakā pārupitvā. ^b^Ko re tuva^eb^nti are ko nāma tvaṃ.

[03]^b^Pakata^eb^nti paṭiyattaṃ nānappakārato abhisaṅkhataṃ. ^b^Uttiṭṭhapiṇḍa^eb^nti antaragharaṃ upagamma ṭhatvā laddhabbapiṇḍaṃ, bhikkhāhāranti attho. ^b^Labhata^eb^nti lacchatu. ^b^Sapāko^eb^ti mahāsatto jātivasena yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ āvikaroti.
[03]^b^Atthatthitaṃ saddahato^eb^ti samparāyikassa atthassa atthibhāvaṃ saddahantassa. ^b^Apehī^eb^ti apagaccha. ^b^Etto^eb^ti imasmā ṭhānā. ^b^Jammā^eb^ti lāmaka.

[03]^b^Anūpakhette^eb^ti ^a^M2.0034^ea^ ajaṅgale udakasampanne khette phalavisesaṃ paccāsīsantā. ^b^Etāya saddhāya dadāhi dāna^eb^nti ninnaṃ thalañca pūrento megho viya guṇavante nigguṇe ca dānaṃ dehi, evaṃ dento ca ^b^appeva ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyeti. Dakkhiṇeyye^eb^ti sīlādiguṇasamannāgate.
[03]^b^Tānī^eb^ti te brāhmaṇā. ^b^Veṇupadarenā^eb^ti veḷuvilīvena.
[03]^b^Giriṃ nakhena^eb^^a^V2.0032^ea^^b^khaṇasī^eb^ti pabbataṃ attano nakhena khaṇanto viya ahosi. ^b^Ayo^eb^ti kālalohaṃ. ^b^Padahasī^eb^ti abhibhavasi, attano sarīrena abhibhavanto viya ahosi.

[03]^b^Āvedhita^eb^nti calitaṃ viparivattetvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Piṭṭhito^eb^ti piṭṭhipassena. ^b^Bāhuṃ pasāreti akammaneyya^eb^nti akammakkhamaṃ bāhudvayaṃ thaddhaṃ sukkhadaṇḍakaṃ viya kevalaṃ pasāreti, na samiñjeti, ^b^setāni akkhīni^eb^ parivattanena kaṇhamaṇḍalassa adissanato.
[03]^b^Jīvita^eb^nti jīvanaṃ.
[03]^b^Vehāyasa^eb^nti ākāse. ^b^Pathaddhuno^eb^ti pathabhūtaddhuno viya.

[03]^b^Saññampi na karotī^eb^ti ‘‘ime kulappasutā’’ti saññāmattampi na karoti. ^b^Dantakaṭṭhakucchiṭṭhaka^eb^nti khāditadantakaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Etasseva upari patissati^eb^ appaduṭṭhapadosabhāvato, mahāsattassa tadā ukkaṃsagatakhettabhāvato. ^b^Iddhivisayo nāma acinteyyo,^eb^ tasmā kathaṃ sūriyassa uggantuṃ nādāsīti na cintetabbaṃ. ^b^Aruṇuggaṃ na paññāyatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ padese aruṇapabhā na paññāyati, andhakāro eva hoti.

[03]^b^Yakkhāvaṭṭo nu kho ayaṃ^eb^ kālavipariyāyo. ^b^Mahāpañña^eb^nti mahantānaṃ paññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. ^b^Janapadassa mukhaṃ passathā^eb^ti imassa janapadavāsino janassa upaddavena maṅkubhūtaṃ mukhaṃ passatha.

[03]^b^Etassa kathā etasseva upari patissatī^eb^ti yāhi tena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāsamāpattivihāraparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadāhi susaṅkhatasantāne mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte ariyūpavādakammābhisapasaṅkhātā pharusavācā pavattitā, sā abhisapi tassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedaniyakammaṃ hutvā ^a^M2.0035^ea^ sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti, sattame divase vipaccanasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ, khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampatti paṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjati ahosikammabhāvato. Ayañhi ariyūpavādapāpassa diṭṭhadhammavedaniyassa dhammatā, tena vuttaṃ ‘etassa kathā etasseva upari patissatī’tiādi. Mahāsatto pana taṃ tassa upari patituṃ na adāsi, upāyena mocesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^cariyāpiṭake^eb^ (cariyā. 2.64) –
[21]‘‘Yaṃ so ^a^V2.0033^ea^ tadā maṃ abhisapi, kupito duṭṭhamānaso;
[22]Tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayi’’nti.

[03]Yañhi tattha sattame divase bodhisattena sūriyuggamananivāraṇaṃ kataṃ, ayamettha yogoti adhippeto. Yogena hi ubbaḷhā sarājikā parisā nagaravāsino negamā ceva jānapadā ca bodhisattassa santikaṃ tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ. So ca bodhisattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesi. Yaṃ panassa matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ, tassa ca sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ manussānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ. Aññathā hi – ‘‘ime pabbajitā samānā cittassa vase vattanti, na pana cittaṃ attano vase vattāpentī’’ti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ, tadassa tesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘athassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Lohakūṭavassa^eb^nti ayaguḷavassaṃ. Tadā hi ratanamattāni diyaḍḍharatanamattānipi tikhiṇaṃsāni ayaguḷamaṇḍalāni ito cito ca nipatantā manussānaṃ sarīrāni khaṇḍakhaṇḍakāni akaṃsu. ^b^Kalalavassa^eb^nti tanukakaddamapaṭalakaddamaṃ. ^b^Upahaccā^eb^ti āghāṭetvā. ^b^Tadeva^eb^ majjhāraññaṃ.
[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuviccakāra^eb^nti anuviccakaraṇaṃ. Kāraṇehi dvīhi aniyyānikasāsane ṭhitānaṃ attano sāvakattaṃ upagate paggahaniggahāni dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupubbiṃ katha^eb^nti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.75-76; a. ni. ṭī. 3.8.12) anupubbiyā anupubbaṃ kathetabbakathaṃ, kā pana sā? Dānādikathā. ^b^Dānakathā^eb^ tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca āditova kathitā ^a^M2.0036^ea^. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggahaṇavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato, kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogayasasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ ^b^sīlakathā^eb^ kathitā. Tañca sīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phalanti dassanatthaṃ, imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītacariyabhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītatarādibhedabhinnā aparimeyyā bhogabhavasampattiyoti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ ^b^saggakathā^eb^. Svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho sabbadā anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ ^b^maggo,^eb^ maggañca kathentena ^a^V2.0034^ea^ tadadhigamūpāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ^b^ādīnavo.^eb^ Hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ ^b^okāro^eb^ lāmakabhāvo, sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha ^b^saṃkileso^eb^. Sabbaso kilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃso^eb^ ca kathetabboti ayamattho ^b^maggantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena dassitoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sukhānaṃ nidāna^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ nibbānasañhitānañcāti sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yañhi kiñci loke bhogasukhaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ dānanidānanti pākaṭo ayamattho. Yaṃ pana jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tassapi dānaṃ upanissayapaccayo hotiyeva. ^b^Sampattīnaṃ mūla^eb^nti yā imā loke padesarajjasirissariyasattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo, yā ca cātumahārājādigatā dibbā sampattiyo, yā vā panaññāpi sampattiyo, tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Bhogāna^eb^nti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena ‘‘bhogo’’nti laddhanāmānaṃ manāpiyarūpādīnaṃ, tannissayānaṃ vā upabhogasukhānaṃ, ^b^patiṭṭhā^eb^ niccalādhiṭṭhānatāya. ^b^Visamagatassā^eb^ti byasanappattassa. ^b^Tāṇa^eb^nti rakkhā tato paripālanato. ^b^Leṇa^eb^nti byasanehi paripātiyamānassa olīyanapadeso. ^b^Gatī^eb^ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Parāyaṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ. ^b^Avassayo^eb^ti vinipatituṃ adento nissayo. ^b^Ārammaṇa^eb^nti olubbhārammaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Ratanamayasīhāsanasadisa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0037^ea^ sabbaratanamayasattaṅgamahāsīhāsanasadisaṃ, mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānato. ^b^Mahāpathavisadisaṃ^eb^ gatagataṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāsambhavato. Yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho, evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave upapattiyā ṭhitiyā ca paccayo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ālambanaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti duggatidukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Samassāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti lobhamacchariyādipaṭisattupaddavato sammadeva assāsanaṭṭhena. ^b^Bhayaparittāṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti dāliddiyabhayato paripālanaṭṭhena. ^b^Maccheramalādīhī^eb^ti maccheralobhadosaissāmicchādiṭṭhivicikicchādi cittamalehi. ^b^Anupalittaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anupakkiliṭṭhatāya. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti maccheramalādīnaṃ. Etesaṃ eva ^b^durāsadaṭṭhena. Asantāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti asantāsahetubhāvena. Yo hi dāyako dānapati, so sampatipi na kutoci santasati, pageva āyatiṃ. ^b^Balavantaṭṭhenā^eb^ti mahābalavatāya. Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti, āyatiṃ pana kāyabalādīhi. ^b^Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘vuḍḍhikāraṇa’’nti abhisammatabhāvena. Vipattito sampattiyā nayanaṃ ^b^khemantabhūmisampāpanaṃ^eb^.

[03]Idāni ^a^V2.0035^ea^ mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^dānaṃ nāmeta^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^attānaṃ niyyādentenā^eb^ti etena dānaphalaṃ sammadeva passantā mahāpurisā attano jīvitampi pariccajanti, tasmā ko nāma viññujātiko bāhire vatthumhi saṅgaṃ kareyyāti ovādaṃ deti. Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo, tā sabbā dānatoyeva pavattantīti dassento ^b^‘‘dānañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha sakkamārabrahmasampattiyo attahitāya eva, cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya ca parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato vuttā. Etā lokiyā, imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sāvakapāramīñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tāsupi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamameva dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Eteneva tassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.

[03]Dānañca nāma hitajjhāsayena, pūjāvasena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako purisapuggalo paresaṃ santakaṃ harissatīti ^a^M2.0038^ea^ aṭṭhānametanti āha – ^b^‘‘dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro natthi^eb^ sobhāvisesāvahattā sīlassa. ^b^Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī’’tiādikā (dha. pa. 55; mi. pa. 4.1.1) gāthā – ‘‘gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’tiādikā (jā. 2.17.55) jātakagāthāyo ca āharitvā vattabbā, sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca dassanīyabhāvāvahañca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlālaṅkārena hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Ayaṃ saggo labbhatī^eb^ti idaṃ majjhimehi chandādīhi samādānasīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenāha sakko devarājā –
[21]‘‘Hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati;
[22]Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī’’ti. (jā. 1.8.75; 2.22.429; dī. ni. ṭī. 2.75-76);
[03]^b^Iṭṭho^eb^ti sukho. ^b^Kanto^eb^ti kamanīyo. ^b^Manāpo^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanako. Taṃ pana tassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niccamettha kīḷā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Doso^eb^ti aniccatādinā appassādādinā ca dūsitabhāvo, yato te viññūnaṃ cittaṃ nārādhenti ^a^V2.0036^ea^. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattetīti ^b^ādīnavo,^eb^ paramakapaṇatā. Tathā ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. ^b^Lāmakabhāvo^eb^ti aseṭṭhehi sevitabbo, seṭṭhehi na sevitabbo nihīnabhāvo. ^b^Saṃkilissana^eb^nti vibādhakatā upatāpatā ca.

[03]^b^Nekkhamme ānisaṃsa^eb^nti ettha yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato tattakā nekkhamme ānisaṃsā. Apica – ‘‘nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi, nikkhantaṃ byāpādasaññāyā’’tiādinā (sārattha. ṭī. mahāvagga 3.26; dī. ni. ṭī. 2.75-76) nayena ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi,^eb^ pabbajjāya jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi. ^b^Kallacitta^eb^nti heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacittaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā assaddhiyādayo cittassa rogabhūtā ^a^M2.0039^ea^, tadā te vigatā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘arogacitta’’^eb^nti. Diṭṭhimānādikilesavigamena ^b^muducittaṃ^eb^. Kāmacchandādivigamena ^b^vinīvaraṇacittaṃ^eb^. Sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uḷārapītipāmojjayogena ^b^udaggacittaṃ^eb^. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā ^b^pasannacittaṃ^eb^. Yadā bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā ^b^kallacitta^eb^nti kāmacchandavigamena arogacittaṃ. ^b^Muducitta^eb^nti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akathinacittaṃ. ^b^Vinīvaraṇacitta^eb^nti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacittaṃ. ^b^Udaggacitta^eb^nti thinamiddhavigamena sampaggahitavasena alīnacittaṃ. ^b^Pasannacitta^eb^nti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacittanti evamettha sesapadānaṃ attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Seyyathāpī^eb^tiādinā upamāvasena upālissa saṃkilesappahānaṃ ariyamagganipphādanañca dasseti. ^b^Apagatakāḷaka^eb^nti vigatakāḷakaṃ. ^b^Sammadevā^eb^ti suṭṭhu eva. ^b^Rajana^eb^nti nīlapītādiraṅgajātaṃ. Paṭiggaṇheyyāti gaṇheyya pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Tasmiṃyeva āsane^eb^ti tissaṃ eva nisajjāyaṃ. Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhapaṭipadākhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti. ^b^Viraja^eb^nti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena virajaṃ. Anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamena ^b^vītamalaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ maggāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ. ^b^Tassa uppattiākāradassana^eb^nti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘taṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^paṭivijjhanta^eb^nti asammohapaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhantaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccavasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tatridaṃ ^a^V2.0037^ea^ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ – vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, dhovanasilā viya anupubbīkathā, udakaṃ viya saddhā, udake temetvā ūsagomayachārikābharehi kāḷakapadese sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo viya saddhāsinehena temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho. Tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo, tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhadhammo^eb^ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pattadhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti ^a^M2.0040^ea^ tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘viditadhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā panesā viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesanāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pariyogāḷhadhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenassa saccābhisambodhaṃyeva dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāhantaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tiṇṇā vicikicchā^eb^ti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā ^b^tiṇṇavicikicchā. Vigatakathaṃkatho^eb^ti pavattiādīsu ‘‘evaṃ nu kho, kiṃ nu kho’’ti evaṃ pavattikā ^b^vigatā^eb^ samucchinnā ^b^kathaṃkathā^eb^. Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā ^b^vesārajjaṃ^eb^ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ ^b^patto^eb^. Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na tassa paro paccetabbo atthīti ^b^aparappaccayo^eb^.
[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṇḍito^eb^ti paññavā.

[03]^b^72^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tena hi sammā^eb^ti dovārikena saddhiṃ sallapatiyeva, ^b^‘‘etthevā’’^eb^ti tena vuttavacanaṃ sutvāpi tassa atthaṃ asallakkhento. Kasmā? Paridevatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘balavasokena abhibhūto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tenevā^eb^ti yena uttarāsaṅgena āsanaṃ sammajjati, ^b^teneva udare parikkhipanto^eb^ ‘‘māhaṃ satthāraṃ mama sarīrena phusi’’nti antaraṃ karonto uttarāsaṅgena taṃ udare parikkhipanto pariggahetvā. ‘‘Dattapaññatta’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.171) viya datta-saddo ettha bālapariyāyoti ^a^V2.0038^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘jaḷosi jāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upaṭṭhākassa aññathābhāvenā^eb^ti pubbe attano upaṭṭhākassa idāni anupaṭṭhākabhāvena.

[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aviññāṇakaṃ^eb^ dārusākhādimayaṃ. ^b^Bahalabahalaṃ pītāvalepanaṃ raṅgajāta^eb^nti ativiya bahalaṃ pītavaṇṇamañjiṭṭhāadiavalepanarajanaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭṭetvā uppāditacchaviṃ,^eb^ yā ^b^raṅgaṃ pivati. Nillomata^eb^nti punappunaṃ anulimpanena. ^b^Khaṇḍakhaṇḍita^eb^nti khaṇḍakhaṇḍitabhāvaṃ. ^b^Raṅgakkhamo^eb^ rajaniyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāgamattaṃ janetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuyoga^eb^nti codanaṃ. ^b^Vīmaṃsa^eb^nti vicāraṇaṃ. ^b^Thuse koṭṭetvā taṇḍulapariyesanaṃ ^a^M2.0041^ea^ viya kadaliyaṃ sārapariyesanaṃ viya ca^eb^ nigaṇṭhavāde sāravīmaṃsanaṃ. Tato eva ca taṃ vīmaṃsanto ^b^rittako tucchakova hotī^eb^ti. Sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ catusaccavinimuttaṃ natthi, tañca vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ viññūnaṃ pītisomanassameva janeti, atappakañca asecanābhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccakathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yathā yathā^eb^ti yadi khandhamukhena yadi dhātāyatanādīsu aññataramukhena buddhavacanaṃ ogāhissati, tathā tathā gambhīrañāṇānaṃyeva gocarabhāvato gambhīrameva hoti. Yo cettha paṇḍito nipuṇo kataparappavādo paṇidhāya sabbathāmena codanaṃ ārambhati tassa codanā kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ na sakkoti.
