[03]^b^173^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Padasamācāro^eb^ti ^a^V2.0082^ea^ taṃtaṃpaccayabhedadassanāya vigatattā pakārehi daliddasamācāro sithilasamācāroti attho. Yasmā pana tādiso samācāro thiro daḷho nāma na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dubbalasamācāro’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sākhasamācāro’’ti vā pāṭho, tattha tattha lagganaṭṭhena sākhāsadisasīloti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘oḷārikācāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccayesu sāpekkho^eb^ti paccayesu sāpekkhatāya eva hissa oḷārikācāratā veditabbā. Garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patisso, patissavacanabhūtaṃ taṃsabhāgañca yaṃ kiñci gāravanti attho. Saha patissenāti ^b^sappatissena,^eb^ sappatissavena ovādasampaṭicchanena. Patissīyatīti vā patisso, garukātabbo, tena saha patissenāti sabbaṃ pubbe viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sajeṭṭhakenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Serivihāro^eb^ nāma attappadhānavāso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niraṅkusavihārenā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Anupakhajjā^eb^ti anupakaḍḍhitvā. Garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ antaraṃ anāpucchā anupavisitvāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha yo’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ābhisamācārika^eb^nti ^a^M2.0083^ea^ abhisamācāre bhavaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^‘‘vattapaṭipattimattampī’’^eb^ti. Nātikālasseva saṅghassa purato pavisitabbaṃ, na pacchā paṭikkamitabbanti adhippāyena atikāle ca gāmappaveso atidivā paṭikkamanañca nivāritaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na atipāto’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Uddhaccapakatiko^eb^ti vibbhantacitto. ^b^Avacāpalyenā^eb^ti daḷhavātāpahatapallavasadisena lolabhāvena.

[03]^b^Paññavatā^eb^ti iminā bhikkhusāruppesu itikattabbesu upāyapaññā adhippetā, na sutamayapaññā. ^b^Abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo^eb^ti iminā bhāvanāpaññāuttarimanussadhamme yogo pakāsito. ^b^Yogo^eb^ti ca paricayo uggaṇhavasena.

[03]^b^Āruppā^eb^ti iminā catassopi arūpasamāpattiyo gahitā, tā pana catūhi rūpasamāpattīhi vinā na sampajjantīti āha – ^b^‘‘āruppāti ettāvatā aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo vuttā hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kasiṇe^eb^ti dasavidhe kasiṇe. ^b^Ekaṃ parikammakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci ekabhāvanā ^a^V2.0083^ea^ parikammadīpanaṃ khandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paguṇaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ pana taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ hoti, lokiyā uttarimanussadhammā heṭṭhā gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘uttarimanussadhammeti iminā sabbepi lokuttaradhamme dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Neyyapuggalassa vasenā^eb^ti jānitvā vitthāretvā ñātabbapuggalassa vasenāti.
[06]Goliyānisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañca^eb^^a^V2.0084^ea^^b^ānisaṃse^eb^ti appābādhatādike pañca guṇe. Tattha akkhirogakucchirogādīnaṃ abhāvo ^b^appābādhatā^eb^. Sarīre tesaṃ kuppanadukkhassa abhāvo ^b^appātaṅkaṃ^eb^. Sarīrassa uṭṭhānasukhatā ^b^lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Balaṃ^eb^ nāma kāyabalaṃ. ^b^Phāsuvihāro^eb^ iriyāpathasukhatā. ^b^Anupakkhandānī^eb^ti duccajanavasena sattānaṃ anupaviṭṭhāni. ^b^Sañjānissathā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tasmā iti evaṃ ānisaṃsanti attho.

[03]^b^175^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āvāse niyuttāti ^b^āvāsikā^eb^ tassa anativattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibaddhavāsino’’^eb^ti, niyatavāsinoti attho. ^b^Tannibandhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0084^ea^ nibandhaṃ vuccati byāpāro, tattha bandhā pasutā ussukāti tannibandhā. Kathaṃ te tattha nibandhāti āha ^b^‘‘akataṃ senāsana’’^eb^ntiādi. Uppajjanakena kālena pattabbaṃ ^b^kālikaṃ^eb^ so pana kālo anāgato eva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anāgate kāle pattabba’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ettakā vedanā sevitabbā^eb^ti aṭṭhārasapi nekkhammanissitā vedanā sevitabbā, gehassitā ^b^na sevitbbā^eb^.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ kataṃ^eb^ soḷasavidhassapi kiccassa niṭṭhitattā. ^b^Anulomikānī^eb^ti utusukhabhāvena anurūpāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasappāyānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samānaṃ kurumānā^eb^ti omattataṃ adhimattatañca pahāya samakiccataṃ sampādentā.
[03]^b^182^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Te dve hontī^eb^ti te ādito vuttā dve.

[03]Ubhato (a. ni. ṭī. 3.7.14) ubhayathā ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttoti ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^ ekadesasarūpekasesanayena. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pu. pa. aṭṭha. 24) ‘‘dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti. Tattha keci tāva therā – ‘‘samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena, maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti ^a^V2.0085^ea^ vadanti. Aññe therā – ‘‘ayaṃ ubhatobhāgavimutto rūpato muccitvā nāmaṃ nissāya ṭhito puna tato muccanato nāmanissitako’’ti vatvā tassa ca sādhakaṃ –
[21]‘‘Acci yathā vātavegena khittā, (upasivāti bhagavā,)
[27]Atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ;
[26]Evaṃ muni nāmakāyā vimutto,
[22]Atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkha’’nti. (su. ni. 1080; cūḷani. upasīvamāṇavapucchā 11; upasīvamāṇavapucchāniddesa 43) –

[07]Imaṃ suttapadaṃ vatvā ‘‘nāmakāyato ca rūpakāyato ca suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti vadanti. Sutte hi ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino upasivabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā nāmakāyā vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti akkhātoti. Apare pana ‘‘samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ekavāraṃ vimutto, maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttoti evaṃ ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti vadanti. Ettha paṭhamavāde dvīhi bhāgehi vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Dutiyavāde ubhatobhāgato vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Tatiyavāde pana dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Kilesehi vimutto kilesā vā vikkhambhanasamucchedehi kāyadvayato vimuttā assāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dvīhi bhāgehī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Kāmañcettha rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ viya duvaṅgikaṃ āneñjappattanti vuccati. Taṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti rūpakāyato avimuttattā. Tañhi kilesakāyatova vimuttaṃ, na rūpakāyato, tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ arūpa…pe… pañcavidho hotī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Rūpī rūpāni passatī’’tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā – ‘‘yato ca kho, ānanda, bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, ayaṃ vuccati, ānanda, bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti yadipi ^b^mahānidāne^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.129-130) vuttaṃ, taṃ pana ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttanti idha sabbaubhatobhāgavimuttasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pañcavidho hotī’’^eb^ti vatvā ^b^‘‘pāḷi panettha…pe… abhidhamme aṭṭhavimokkhalābhino vasena āgatā’’^eb^ti āha. Idhāpi hi kīṭāgirisutte ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo…pe… ubhatobhāgavimutto’’ti ^a^V2.0086^ea^ arūpasamāpattivasena cattāro ubhatobhāgavimuttā, seṭṭho ca vutto vuttalakkhaṇūpapattito. Yathāvuttesu hi pañcasu purimā cattāro nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.

[03]^b^Katamo ca puggalo^eb^tiādīsu ^b^katamo^eb^ti pucchāvacanaṃ, ^b^puggalo^eb^ti asādhāraṇato pucchitabbavacanaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^Ekacco^eb^ti eko ^a^M2.0086^ea^. ^b^Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatī^eb^ti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharati. ^b^Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ, maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Paññāvimutto^eb^ti visesato paññāya eva vimutto, na tassā patiṭṭhānabhūtena aṭṭhavimokkhasaṅkhātena sātisayena samādhināti paññāvimutto. Yo ariyo anadhigatāṭṭhavimokkhena sabbaso āsavehi vimutto, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Adhigatepi hi rūpajjhānavimokkhe na so sātisayasamādhinissitoti na tassa vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Arūpajjhānesu pana ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti. Tena hi aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena taṃnāmadānasamatthena aṭṭhavimokkhalābhītveva vuccati. Samudāye hi pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissati yathā ‘‘sattisayo’’ti. ^b^Pāḷī^eb^ti abhidhammapāḷi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etissaṃ paññāvimuttikathāyaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavasenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena idhāpi paṭikkhepavaseneva āgatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyena phusitvā viharatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotī^eb^ti phuṭṭhānaṃ anto phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ anantaro kāloti adhippāyo. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikaroti sacchikātabbopāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ ‘‘ekamantaṃ nisīdī’’tiādīsu (pārā. 2) viya. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti, na pana kāyena sacchikato, nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti, tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti ^b^‘‘kāyasakkhī’’^eb^ti vuccati, na tu ‘‘vimutto’’ti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ ^a^V2.0087^ea^ aparikkhīṇattā. Tenāha ^a^M2.0087^ea^ – ^b^‘‘jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī’’^eb^ti. Ayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ, nirodhā vuṭṭhāya aggamaggappattānāgāmino ca vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto viya pañcavidho nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘kāyasakkhimhipi eseva nayo’’ti.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhantaṃ patto^eb^ti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Diṭṭhattā patto’’tipi pāṭho. Etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodhoti ñātaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti maggapaññāya. Paṭhamaphalaṭṭhato yāva aggamaggaṭṭhā, tāva ^b^diṭṭhippatto^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sopi kāyasakkhi viya chabbidho hotī’’^eb^ti. Yathā pana paññāvimutto pañcavidho vutto, evaṃ ayampi sukkhavipassako, catūhi rūpajjhānehi vuṭṭhāya diṭṭhippattabhāvappattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hotīti veditabbo. Saddhāvimuttepi eseva nayo. ^b^Idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito uddhaṃ dukkhanti. ^b^Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhasaccanti yāthāvato pajānāti. Yasmā pana taṇhā dukkhaṃ janeti nibbatteti, tato taṃ dukkhaṃ samudeti, tasmā naṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti^eb^ yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhati appavattiṃ gacchati, tasmā ^b^‘‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti^eb^. Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati, tena ^b^‘‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā’’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti^eb^. Ettāvatā nānakkhaṇe saccavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ. Idāni taṃ ekakkhaṇe dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tathāgatappaveditā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tassattho āgamissati.

[03]^b^Saddhāya vimutto^eb^ti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvo dīpito hoti. ^b^Saddhāvimutto^eb^ti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘sotāpattiphala’’ntiādinā vuttanayena. ^b^Saddahantassā^eb^ti ‘‘ekaṃsato ayaṃ paṭipadā kilesakkhayaṃ āvahati sammāsambuddhena bhāsitattā’’ti evaṃ saddahantassa. Yasmā panassa aniccānupassanādīhi ^a^M2.0088^ea^ niccasaññāpahānavasena bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ passato tattha tattha paccakkhatāpi atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saddahantassa viyā’’^eb^ti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ettha ca ^b^pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā^eb^ti vacanena āgamanīyapaṭipadānānattena saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ paññānānattaṃ hotīti dassitaṃ. ^b^Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ (pu. pa. aṭṭha. 28) ‘‘nesaṃ kilesappahāne ^a^V2.0088^ea^ nānattaṃ natthi, paññāya nānattaṃ atthiyevā’’ti vatvā – ‘‘āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kata’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Paññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ adhimattatāya pubbaṅgamaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ anussaratīti ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammo’’^eb^tiādi. Saddhaṃ anussarati saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetīti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti atidisati. Paññaṃ vāhetīti ^b^paññāvāhī,^eb^ paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddhāvāhi^eb^nti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Ubhatobhāgavimuttādikathā^eb^ti ubhatobhāgavimuttādīsu āgamanato paṭṭhāya vattabbakathā. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti yathāvuttānaṃ ubhatobhāgavimuttādīnaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ kīṭāgirisutte. Nanu ca aṭṭhasamāpattilābhivasena ubhatobhāgavimutto kāyasakkhīādayo ca abhidhamme āgatā, kathamidha arūpajjhānalābhīvaseneva uddhaṭāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Phusitvā^eb^ patvā. ^b^Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī^eb^ti na āsavā paññāya passīyanti, dassanakāraṇā paññāya parikkhīṇā ‘‘disvā paññāya parikkhīṇā’’ti vuttā. Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyā hotīti. ^b^Tathāgatena paveditā^eb^ti bodhimaṇḍe nisīditvā tathāgatena paṭividdhā viditā pacchā paresaṃ pākaṭīkatā. ^b^‘‘Catusaccadhammā’’^eb^ti vatvā tadantogadhattā sīlādīnaṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathita’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti avippaṭisārādipayojanena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pītiādikena atthena. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti sappurisūpanissayādinā kāraṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samādhiādipadaṭṭhānatāya sīlādi ^a^M2.0089^ea^^b^kāraṇe. Ciṇṇacaritattā^eb^ti saddhāciṇṇabhāvena sambodhāvahabhāve. Tattha tattha ^b^vicaritā^eb^ visesena caritā, tesu tena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitāti attho. ^b^Patiṭṭhitā hoti^eb^ maggena āgatattā. ^b^Mattāya^eb^ parittappamāṇena. ^b^Olokanaṃ khamanti,^eb^ paññāya gahetabbataṃ upenti.

[03]^b^Tayo^eb^ti kāyasakkhidiṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttā. ^b^Yathāṭhitova pāḷiattho,^eb^ na tattha kiñci niddhāretvā vattabbaṃ atthīti suttantapariyāyena avuttaṃ vadati. ^b^Tassa maggassā^eb^ti sotāpattimaggassa yaṃ kātabbaṃ, tassa adhigatattā. ^b^Upari pana tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya sevamānā^eb^ anulomasenāsanaṃ, ^b^bhajamānā^eb^ kalyāṇamitte, ^b^samannānayamānā^eb^ indriyāni ^b^anupubbena^eb^ bhāvanāmaggappaṭipāṭiyā ^b^arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti^eb^ maggassa anekacittakkhaṇikatāyāti ayamettha suttapadese pāḷiyā attho.

[03]^b^Imameva^eb^^a^V2.0089^ea^^b^pāḷiṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘katamo ca puggalo saddhānusārī’’ti maggaṭṭhe puggale vatvā ‘‘imassa kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave’’tiādinā tesaṃ vasena anulomasenāsanasevanādīnaṃ vuttattā imameva yathāvuttaṃ pāḷipadesaṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘lokuttaradhammo bahucittakkhaṇiko’’^eb^ti vadati. ^b^So vattabbo^eb^ti so vitaṇḍavādī evaṃ vattabbo. Yadi maggaṭṭhapuggale vatvā anulomikasenāsanasevanādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti maggasamaṅgino eva hutvā te tathā paṭipajjanti, evaṃ sante senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttarūpādivipassanaggahaṇasmiṃ tava matena maggasamaṅgino eva āpajjeyyuṃ, na cetaṃ evaṃ hoti, tasmā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ kiñci mā kathehīti vāretabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yadi aññena cittenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti nānācitteneva senāsanapaṭisevanādike sati. Tattha pāḷiyaṃ yadi lokuttaradhammasamaṅgino eva pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgikālepi lokuttarasamaṅgitaṃ ^b^sace sampaṭicchasi, satthārā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhasi^eb^ suttavirodhadīpanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satthārā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Dhammavicāraṇā nāma tuyhaṃ avisayo, tasmā ^b^yāguṃ pivāhīti uyyojetabbo^eb^.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādikenevā^eb^ti paṭhameneva. ^b^Anupubbasikkhā^eb^ti anupubbeneva pavattasikkhāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘karaṇatthe paccattavacana’’^eb^nti. Saddhā jātā etassāti ^b^saddhājāto,^eb^ agyāhitātipakkhepena jāta-saddassa pacchāvacanaṃ ^a^M2.0090^ea^. Evametanti adhimuccanaṃ ^b^okappaniyasaddhā. Santike nisīdati^eb^ upaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^Sādhukaṃ katvā dhāretī^eb^ti yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ vācuggatakaraṇavasena taṃ paguṇaṃ katvā sāravasena dhāreti. ^b^Chando jāyatī^eb^ti dhammesu nijjhānakkhamesu ime dhamme bhāvanāpaññāya paccakkhato ussāmīti kattukamyatākusalacchando jāyati. ^b^Ussahatī^eb^ti chando uppādamatte aṭṭhatvā tato bhāvanārambhavasena ussahati. ^b^Tulayati^eb^ti sammasanavasena saṅkhāre. ^b^Tīraṇavipassanāya tulayanto^eb^ti tīraṇapariññāya jānitvā upari pahānapariññāya vasena paritulayanto paṭijānanto. ^b^Maggapadhānaṃ padahatī^eb^ti maggalakkhaṇaṃ padhānikaṃ maggaṃ padahati. ^b^Pesitacitto^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto. ^b^Nāmakāyenā^eb^ti maggappaṭipāṭiyā taṃtaṃmaggasampayuttanāmakāyena. ^b^Na pana kiñci āhā^eb^ti dūratāya samānaṃ na kiñci vacanaṃ bhagavā āha te daḷhataraṃ niggaṇhituṃ.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṇena vohārena byākaraṇaṃ ^b^paṇaviyā,^eb^ paṇaviyā abhāvena ^b^opaṇaviyā, na upetī^eb^ti na yujjati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti idaṃ idha adhippetaṃ ^b^paṇo paṇaviyaṃ dassetuṃ^eb^. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā ‘‘mayaṃ kho, āvuso, sāyañceva bhuñjāmā’’ti assajipunabbasukehi vuttaṃ sikkhāya avattanabhāvadīpanavacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^Ukkhipitvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0090^ea^ sīsena gahetvā viya samādāya. ^b^Anudhammo^eb^ti anurūpo sabhāvo, sāvakabhāvassa anucchavikā paṭipatti. ^b^Rohanīya^eb^nti viruḷhibhāvaṃ. Siniyhati ettha, etena vāti sineho, kāraṇaṃ. Taṃ ettha atthīti ^b^sinehavantaṃ,^eb^ pādakanti attho. ^b^Taco ekaṃ aṅga^eb^nti taco vīrapakkhabhāve ekamaṅgaṃ. Padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi tace palujjamānepi taṃnimittaṃ avosānaṃ anāpajjanakasseva vīriyassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu vattabbaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ appatvā na vuṭṭhahissāmīti evaṃ paṭipajjatī’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kīṭāgirisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca bhikkhuvaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0091^ea^^a^M2.0091^ea^ ekapuṇḍarīkasaññite paribbājakārāme. Anāgatapubbo lokiyasamudāhāravasena ^b^‘‘cirassaṃ kho, bhante’’^eb^tiādinā vuccati, ayaṃ panettha āgatapubbataṃ upādāya tathā vutto. Bhagavā hi kesañci vimuttijananatthaṃ, kesañci indriyaparipākatthaṃ, kesañci visesādhigamatthaṃ kadāci titthiyārāmaṃ upagacchati. ^b^Ananuññāya ṭhatvā^eb^ti ananujānitabbe ṭhatvā. ^b^Anujānitabbaṃ siyā^eb^ anaññātassa ñeyyassa abhāvato. Yāvatakañhi ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakañca bhagavato ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Tenevāha – ‘‘na tassa adiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñci, atho aviññātamajānitabba’’ntiādi (mahāni. 156; cūḷani. dhotakamāṇavapucchāniddesa 32; paṭi. ma. 1.121). ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇena hi^eb^ bhagavā ^b^āvajjetvā pajānāti^eb^. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇa’’nti (mi. pa. 4.1.2). Yadi evaṃ ‘‘caraṃ samāhito nāgo, tiṭṭhaṃ nāgo samāhito’’ti (a. ni. 6.43) idaṃ suttapadaṃ kathanti? Vikkhepābhāvadīpanapadametaṃ, na anāvajjanenapi ñāṇānaṃ pavattiparidīpanaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vitthārato vuttameva.

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yāvadevā^eb^ti idaṃ yathāruci pavatti viya aparāparuppattipi icchitabbāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha – ^b^‘‘sakiṃ khīṇānaṃ āsavānaṃ puna khepetabbābhāvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccuppannajānanaguṇa^eb^nti idaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paribhaṇḍañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ anādiyitvā vuttaṃ, tassa pana vasena anāgataṃsañāṇaguṇaṃ dassetīti vattabbaṃ siyā.

[03]^b^Gihiparikkhāresū^eb^ti vatthābharaṇādidhanadhaññādigihiparikkhāresu. Gihiliṅgaṃ pana appamāṇaṃ, tasmā gihibandhanaṃ chinditvā dukkhassantakarā hontiyeva. Sati pana dukkhassantakiriyāya gihiliṅge te na tiṭṭhantiyevāti dassento ^b^‘‘yepī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sukkhāpetvā^eb^ samucchinditvā. Arahattaṃ ^a^V2.0092^ea^ pattadivaseyeva pabbajanaṃ vā parinibbānaṃ vāti ayaṃ nayo na sabbasādhāraṇoti āha ^b^‘‘bhūmadevatā pana tiṭṭhantī’’^eb^ti. Tattha kāraṇavacanaṃ ^a^M2.0092^ea^^b^‘‘nilīyanokāsassa atthitāyā’’^eb^ti. Araññapabbatādipavivekaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^nilīyanokāso. Sesakāmabhave^eb^ti kāmaloke. ^b^Laḷitajanassā^eb^ti ābharaṇālaṅkāranaccagītādivasena vilāsayuttajanassa.

[03]^b^Sopī^eb^ti ‘‘so aññatra ekenā’’ti vutto sopi. Karato na karīyati pāpanti evaṃ ^b^na kiriyaṃ paṭibāhati^eb^. Yadi attānaṃyeva gahetvā katheti, atha kasmā mahāsatto tadā ājīvakapabbajjaṃ upagacchīti āha ^b^‘‘tadā kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tassapī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ aññesaṃ eva pāsaṇḍānaṃ, tassapi. ^b^Vīriyaṃ na hāpesī^eb^ti tapojigucchavādaṃ samādiyitvā ṭhito virāgatthāya taṃ samādiṇṇavattaṃ na pariccaji, satthusāsanaṃ na chaḍḍesi. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kiriyavādī hutvā sagge nibbattatī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Tevijjavacchasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^ Lokassa ^a^V2.0093^ea^ sassatatāpavattipaṭikkhepavasena pavatto vādo ucchedavādo eva hotīti sassataggāhābhāve ucchedaggāhabhāvato puna paribbājakena ‘‘asassato loko’’ti vadantena ucchedaggāho pucchito, bhagavatāpi so eva paṭikkhittoti āha ^b^‘‘dutiye nāhaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiko’’^eb^ti. ^b^Antānantikādivasenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^antānantika^eb^ggahaṇena antavā loko anantavā lokoti imaṃ vādadvayamāha. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra’’ntiādivādacatukkaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, itaraṃ pana dvayaṃ sarūpeneva gahitanti. ^b^Paṭikkhepo veditabbo^eb^ti ‘‘tatiye nāhaṃ antavādiṭṭhiko, catutthe nāhaṃ anantavādiṭṭhiko’’ti evamādinā paṭikkhepo veditabbo. ‘‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’’ti ayampi sassatavādo, so ca kho aparantakappikavasena, ‘‘sassato loko’’ti pana pubbantakappikavasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso. ‘‘Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’’ti ayampi ucchedavādo, so ca kho sattavasena, ‘‘asassato loko’’ti pana sattasaṅkhāravasenāti vadanti.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sappatibhayaṃ ^a^M2.0093^ea^ uppajjanato saha dukkhenāti ^b^sadukkhaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kilesadukkhenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tesaṃyevā^eb^ti kilesadukkhavipākadukkhānaṃyeva. ^b^Saupaghātaka^eb^nti sabādhaṃ. ^b^Saupāyāsa^eb^nti saparissamaṃ saupatāpaṃ sapīḷaṃ. ^b^Sapariḷāha^eb^nti sadarathaṃ.

[03]^b^Kiñci diṭṭhigata^eb^nti imā tāva aṭṭha diṭṭhiyo mā hontu, atthi pana, bho gotama, yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhigataṃ gahitaṃ. Na hi tāya diṭṭhiyā vinā kañci samayaṃ pavattetuṃ yujjatīti adhippāyena pucchati. ^b^Apaviddha^eb^nti samucchedappahānavasena chaḍḍitaṃ. ^b^Paññāya diṭṭha^eb^nti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya bhagavatā paṭividdhaṃ. Yattha uppajjanti, taṃ sattaṃ mathenti sammaddantīti ^b^mathitā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘mathitānanti tesaṃyeva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kañci dhamma^eb^nti rūpadhammaṃ arūpadhammaṃ vā. ^b^Anupādiyitvā^eb^ti aggahetvā.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na upetī^eb^ti saṅkhaṃ na gacchatīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘na yujjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anujānitabbaṃ siyā^eb^ anupādāvimuttassa kañcipi uppattiyā abhāvato. ‘‘Evaṃ vimuttacitto na upapajjatī’’ti kāmañcetaṃ sabhāvapavedanaṃ parinibbānaṃ, eke pana ucchedavādino ‘‘mayampi ‘satto āyatiṃ na upapajjatī’ti vadāma, samaṇo gotamopi tathā vadatī’’ti ucchedabhāveyeva patiṭṭhahissanti, tasmā bhagavā ^a^V2.0094^ea^ ‘‘na upapajjatīti kho vaccha na upetī’’ti āha. ‘‘Upapajjatī’’ti pana vutte sassatameva gaṇheyyāti yojanā. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Appatiṭṭho^eb^ti ucchedavādādivasena patiṭṭhārahito. ^b^Anālambo^eb^ti tesaṃyeva vādānaṃ olambārammaṇassa abhāvena anālambo. ^b^Sukhapavesanaṭṭhāna^eb^nti tesaññeva vādānaṃ sukhapavesanokāsaṃ ^b^mā labhatūti. Ananuññāya ṭhatvā^eb^ti ‘‘na upapajjatī’’tiādinā anujānitabbāya paṭiññāya ṭhānahetu. ^b^Anuññampī^eb^ti anujānitabbampi dutiyapañhaṃ ^b^paṭikkhipi^eb^. Pariyatto pana dhammo atthato paccayākāro evāti āha ^b^‘‘dhammoti paccayākāradhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññattha payogenā^eb^ti imamhā niyyānikasāsanā aññasmiṃ micchāsamaye pavattappayogena, aniyyānikaṃ vividhaṃ micchāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjantenāti attho. ‘‘Aññavādiyakenā’’tipi pāṭho, paccayākārato aññākāradīpakāacariyavādaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhantenāti attho.
[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Appaccayo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0094^ea^ anupādāno, nirindhanoti attho.

[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yena rūpenā^eb^ti yena bhūtupādādibhedena rūpadhammena. ^b^Taṃ rūpaṃ^eb^ tappaṭibaddhasaṃyojanappahānena khīṇāsava-^b^tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ^eb^ anuppattidhammataṃ āpannaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘anuppādadhamma’’ntiādi. Aññesaṃ jānanāya abhāvaguṇatāya ^b^guṇagambhīro^eb^. ‘‘Ettakā guṇā’’ti ^b^pamāṇaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyo^eb^. ‘‘Īdisā etassa guṇā’’ti pariyogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ^b^duppariyogāḷho^eb^ti. ^b^Dujjāno^eb^ti agādhatāya gambhīro ‘‘ettakāni udakaḷhakasatānī’’tiādinā pametuṃ na sakkāti appameyyo, tato eva dujjāno. ^b^Evamevā^eb^nti yathā mahāsamuddo gambhīro appameyyo dujjāno, evameva khīṇāsavopi guṇavasena, tasmā ayaṃ rūpādiṃ gahetvā rūpītiādivohāro bhaveyya, parinibbutassa pana tadabhāvā tathā paññāpetuṃ na sakkā, tato taṃ ārabbha upapajjatītiādi na yujjeyya. Yathā pana vijjamāno eva jātavedo byattena purisena nīyamāno puratthimādidisaṃ gatoti vucceyya, na nibbuto, evaṃ khīṇāsavopīti dassento ^b^‘‘evamevā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Aniccatā^eb^ti ettha aniccatāgahaṇaṃ asāranidassanaṃ. Tena yathā so sālarukkho sākhāpalāsādiasārāpagamena suddho sāre patiṭṭhito, evamayaṃ dhammavinayo sāsavasaṅkhātāsāravigamena lokuttaradhammasāre patiṭṭhitoti dasseti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Aggivacchasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saha ^a^V2.0095^ea^ kathā etassa atthīti ^b^sahakathī,^eb^ ‘‘mayaṃ pucchāvasena tumhe vissajjanavasenā’’ti evaṃ sahapavattakathoti attho. ^b^Etasseva kathitāni,^eb^ tattha paṭhame vijjāttayaṃ desitaṃ, dutiye agginā dassitanti tevijjavacchasuttaṃ aggivacchasuttanti nāmaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sīghaṃ laddhiṃ na vissajjenti,^eb^ yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ niyatoyaṃ vināso anaññasamuppādo, hetusamuppannāpi na cirena nijjhānaṃ khamanti, na lahuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vasātela^eb^^a^M2.0095^ea^^b^…pe… sujjhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pacchimagamanaṃ^eb^ ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā. Yaṭṭhiṃ ālambitvā udakaṃ tarituṃ otaranto puriso ^b^‘‘yaṭṭhiṃ otaritvā udake patamāno’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Kammapathavasena vitthāradesana^eb^nti saṃkhittadesanaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mūlavasena cetthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vitthārasadisā^eb^ti kammapathavasena idha desitadesanāva mūlavasena desitadesanaṃ upādāya vitthārasadisā. ^b^Vitthāradesanā nāma natthī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ ayameva, atha kho sabbāpi buddhānaṃ nippariyāyena ujukena niravasesato vitthāradesanā nāma natthi desanāñāṇassa mahāvisayatāya karaṇasampattiyā ca tajjāya mahānubhāvattā sabbaññutaññāṇassa. Sabbaññutaññāṇasamaṅgitāya hi avasesapaṭisambhidānubhāvitāya aparimitakālasambhatañāṇasambhārasamudāgatāya kadācipi parikkhayānarahāya anaññasādhāraṇāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya pahūtajivhāditadanurūparūpakāyasampattisampadāya vitthāriyamānā bhagavato desanā kathaṃ parimitā paricchinnā bhaveyya, mahākāruṇikatāya pana bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tattha tattha parimitaṃ paricchinnaṃ katvā niṭṭhapeti. Ayañca attho ^b^mahāsīhanādasuttena^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.146 ādayo) dīpetabbo. ^b^Sabbaṃ saṃkhittameva^eb^ attajjhāsayavasena akathetvā bodhaneyyapuggalajjhāsayavasena desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā. Na cettha dhammasāsanavirodho pariyāyaṃ anissāya yathādhammaṃ dhammānaṃ bodhitattā sabbalahuttā cāti.
[03]^b^194^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satta dhammā kāmāvacarā^eb^ sampattasamādānaviratīnaṃ idhādhippetattā.
[03]^b^Aniyametvā^eb^ti ‘‘sammāsambuddho, sāvako’’ti vā niyamaṃ visesena akatvā. ^b^Attānameva…pe… veditabbaṃ,^eb^ tathā hi paribbājako ‘‘tiṭṭhatu bhavaṃ gotamo’’ti āha.
[03]^b^195^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satthāva^eb^^a^V2.0096^ea^^b^arahā hoti^eb^ paṭipattiyā pāripūribhāvato. ^b^Tasmiṃ byākate^eb^ti tasmiṃ ‘‘ekabhikkhupi sāvako’’tiādinā suṭṭhu pañhe kathite.
[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampādako^eb^ti paṭipattisampādako.

[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sekhāya^eb^^a^M2.0096^ea^^b^vijjāyā^eb^ti sekhalakkhaṇappattāya maggapaññāya sātisayaṃ katvā karaṇavasena vuttā, phalapaññā pana tāya pattabbattā kammabhāvena vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhimaphalattayaṃ pattabba’’^eb^nti. Imaṃ panettha aviparītamatthaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyamānaṃ appaṭivijjhanato vitaṇḍavādī ‘‘yāvatakaṃ sekhena pattabbaṃ, anuppattaṃ taṃ mayā’’ti vacanalesaṃ gahetvā ‘‘arahattamaggopi anena pattoyevā’’ti vadati. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānāya gāthāya.

[03]^b^Kilesāni pahāya pañcā^eb^ti pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanasaṅkhāte saṃkilese pahāya pajahitvā, pahānahetu vā. ^b^Paripuṇṇasekho^eb^ti sabbaso vaḍḍhitasekhadhammo. ^b^Aparihānadhammo^eb^ti aparihānasabhāvo. Na hi yassa phātigatehi sīlādidhammehi parihāni atthi, samādhimhi paripūrakāritāya ^b^cetovasippatto^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samāhitindriyo’’^eb^ti. Aparihānadhammattāva ^b^ṭhitatto^eb^.

[03]Anāgāminā hi asekhabhāvāvahā dhammā paripūretabbā, na sekhabhāvāvahāti so ekantaparipuṇṇe sekho vutto. ^b^Etaṃ na buddhavacana^eb^nti ‘‘maggo bahucittakkhaṇiko’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ na buddhavacanaṃ anantarekantavipākadānato, bahukkhattuṃ pavattane payojanābhāvato ca lokuttarakusalassa, ‘‘samādhimānantarikaññamāhu (khu. pā. 6.5; su. ni. 228), na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī’’ti (su. ni. 719) evamādīni suttapadāni etassatthasādhakāni. Orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānena sekkhadhammaparipūribhāvassa vuttatāya ^b^attho^eb^ tava vacanena ^b^virujjhatī^eb^ti. ^b^Assa^eb^ āyasmato vacchassa.

[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiññā vā kāraṇa^eb^nti yañhi taṃ tatra tatra sakkhibhabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi, tassa abhiññā kāraṇaṃ. Atha iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi abhiññā, evaṃ sati ^b^abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Avasāne^eb^ chaṭṭhābhiññāya ^b^pana arahattaṃ^eb^. Ettha ca yasmā paṭhamasutte āsavakkhayo adhippeto, āsavā khīṇā eva, na puna khepetabbā, tasmā tattha ‘‘yāvadevā’’ti na vuttaṃ. Idha phalasamāpatti adhippetā, sā ca punappunaṃ samāpajjīyati, tasmā ‘‘yāvadevā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tato eva hi ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ vā kāraṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi ‘‘kudāssu ^a^V2.0097^ea^ nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi, ^a^M2.0097^ea^ yadariyā etarahi upasampajja viharantī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.465; 3.307) anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā abhiññā nibbattentassa kāraṇaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ na hotīti sādhāraṇavasena naṃ dassento ^b^‘‘arahattassa vipassanā vā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^200^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paricaranti nāma^eb^ vippakatabrahmacariyavāsattā. ^b^Pariciṇṇo hoti^eb^ sāvakena nāma satthu dhamme kattabbā paricariyā sammadeva niṭṭhāpitattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iti…pe… thero evamāhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesaṃ guṇāna^eb^nti tesaṃ asekkhaguṇānaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahāvacchasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khananaṃ ^a^V2.0098^ea^ khataṃ, sūkarassa khataṃ ettha atthīti sūkarakhatā, sūkarassa vā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde paṭhamaṃ khataṃ upādāya ^b^sūkarakhatā,^eb^ tāya. ^b^Evaṃnāmake^eb^ti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake. ^b^Paṃsudhote^eb^ti dhotapaṃsuke. ^b^Otaritvā abhiruhitabba^eb^nti pakatibhūmito anekehi sopānaphalakehi otaritvā puna leṇadvāraṃ katipayehi abhiruhitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ṭhitakovā^eb^ti mātulassa ṭhitattā tattha sagāravasapatissavasena ṭhitakova. Kiñcāpi sabba-saddo avisesato anavasesapariyādāyako, vatthuadhippāyānurodhī pana saddappayogoti tamatthaṃ sandhāya paribbājako ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’^eb^ti āha. Yā loke manussaupapattiyotiādikā upapattiyo, tā anatthasamudāgatā tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato, tasmā samayavādīhi vuccamānā sabbā āyatiṃ uppajjanaupapatti na hoti. Jalabubbuḷakā viya hi ime sattā tattha tattha samaye uppajjitvā bhijjanti, tesaṃ tattha paṭisandhi natthīti assa adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭisandhiyo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Assa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvā^eb^ti yenādhippāyena paribbājako ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti āha, taṃ tassa adhippāyaṃ jānantopi ajānanto viya hutvā tassa ^b^akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassento^eb^ti ^a^M2.0098^ea^ padesasabbaṃ sandhāya tena vuttaṃ, sabbasabbavisayaṃ katvā tattha dosaṃ gaṇhanto. Yathā loke kenaci ‘‘sabbaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ musā’’ti vutte tassa vacanassa sabbantogadhattā musābhāvo āpajjeyya, evaṃ imassapi ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti vadato tathā pavattā diṭṭhipi nakkhamatīti atthato āpannameva hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘esāpi te diṭṭhi nakkhamatī’’ti. Yathā pana kenaci ‘‘sabbaṃ vuttaṃ musā’’ti vutte adhippāyānurodhinī saddappavatti, tassa vacanaṃ muñcitvā tadaññesameva musābhāvo ñāyāgato, evamidhāpi ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti vacanato yassā diṭṭhiyā vasena ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti tena vuttaṃ, taṃ diṭṭhiṃ muñcitvā tadaññameva yathādhippetaṃ sabbaṃ nakkhamatīti ayamattho ñāyāgato, bhagavā pana vādīvaro sukhumāya āṇiyā thūlaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto viya upāyena tassa diṭṭhigataṃ nīharituṃ tassa adhippāyena avatvā saddavasena tāva labbhamānaṃ dosaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yāpi kho te’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘assa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvā akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassento’’ti.

[03]Paribbājako ^a^V2.0099^ea^ pana yaṃ sandhāya ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti mayā vuttaṃ, ‘‘ayaṃ so’’ti yathāvuttadosapariharaṇatthaṃ tasmiṃ atthe vuccamāne esa doso sabbo na hoti, evampi samaṇo gotamo mama vāde dosameva āropeyyāti attano ajjhāsayaṃ niguhitvā yathāvuttadosaṃ pariharitukāmo ^b^‘‘esā me’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^tampassa tādisamevā^eb^ti yaṃ ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti gahitaṃ vatthu, tampi tādisameva bhaveyyāti. Ayañca sabbantogadhadiṭṭhi mayhampi diṭṭhivatthu, taṃ me khameyyavāti. Yasmā pana ‘‘esāpi diṭṭhi tuyhaṃ nakkhamatī’’ti yāpi diṭṭhi vuttā bhavatā gotamena, sāpi mayhaṃ nakkhamati, tasmā sabbaṃ me nakkhamatevāti paribbājakassa adhippāyo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘taṃ pariharāmīti saññāya vadatī’’^eb^ti. Tathā ca vakkhati ^b^‘‘tasmāpi ucchedadiṭṭhi mayhaṃ nakkhamatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Esā me diṭṭhī’’ti yā ṭhitibhūtā diṭṭhi, tāya ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti panettha sabbaggahaṇena gahitattā āha – ^b^‘‘atthato panassa esā diṭṭhi na me khamatīti āpajjatī’’^eb^ti. Ayaṃ dosoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘yassa panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Esā^eb^ti diṭṭhi. ^b^Rucita^eb^nti diṭṭhidassanena abhinivisitvā rocetvā gahitaṃ. ^b^Tena hi diṭṭhiakkhamena arucitena bhavitabbanti^eb^ sati diṭṭhiyā akkhamabhāve tato tāya gahitāya khameyya rucceyya yathā, evaṃ sabbassa akkhamabhāveti ^a^M2.0099^ea^ aparabhāge ^b^sabbaṃ khamati ruccatīti āpajjati. Na panesa taṃ sampaṭicchatī^eb^ti esa ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti evaṃ vadanto ucchedavādī taṃ vuttanayena sabbassa khamanaṃ ruccanaṃ na sampaṭicchati. Ñāyena vuttamatthaṃ kathaṃ na sampaṭicchatīti āha ^b^‘‘kevalaṃ tassāpi ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ucchedameva gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti. Sabbesañhi dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ uppādaṃ aruccitvā taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ ‘‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’’ti vadati, ucchedadiṭṭhikesu ca ucchinnesu kuto ucchedadiṭṭhisabhāvoti.

[03]^b^Tenā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena, yasmā idhekacce sattā īdisaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pajahanakena vā cittena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā pajahanakehi appajahanake niddhāretuṃ bhagavā ‘‘ato…pe… bahutarā’’ti avocāti āha – ^b^‘‘pajahanakesu nissakka’’^eb^nti yathā ‘‘pañcasīlehi pabhāvanā paññavantatarā’’ti. ^b^‘‘Bahū’’^eb^ti vatvā na kevalaṃ bahū, atha kho ativiya bahūti dassento ^b^‘‘bahutarā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^‘‘Bahū hī’’^eb^ti nayidaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ, atha kho paccattavacanaṃ. Kathaṃ hi-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘hi-kāro nipātamatta’’^eb^nti. Anissakkavacanaṃ tāva tassa pajahanakānaṃ bahubhāvato tepi parato ‘‘bahutarā’’ti vuccīyanti. ^b^Mūladassana^eb^nti ye tādisaṃ dassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ upādiyanti, tajjātikameva pacchā gahitadassanaṃ. Vijātiyañhi paṭhamaṃ gahitadassanaṃ appahāya vijātiyassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati viruddhassa abhinivesassa saha anavaṭṭhānato ^a^V2.0100^ea^. Aviruddhaṃ pana mūladassanaṃ avissajjitvā visayādibhedabhinnaṃ aparadassanaṃ gahetuṃ labbhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Tattha kiñcāpi ekaccasassatavādo sassatucchedābhinivesānaṃ vasena yathākkamaṃ sassatucchedaggāhanajātiko, ucchedaggāhena pana sassatābhinivesassa taṃgāhena ca asassatābhinivesassa virujjhanato ubhayatthapi ^b^‘‘ekaccasassataṃ vā gahetuṃ na sakkā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tathā ^b^‘‘sassataṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā na sakkā gahetu’’^eb^nti ca. Mūlasassatañhi paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^Āyatanesupi yojetabba^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ sassatanti gahetvā aparabhāge na kevalaṃ cakkhāyatanameva sassataṃ, sotāyatanampi sassataṃ, ghānāyatanādipi sassatanti gaṇhātītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Āyatanesupī^eb^ti pi-saddena dhātūnaṃ indriyānampi gāho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Idaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0100^ea^ ‘‘mūle sassata’’ntiādinā vuttapaṭhamaggāhassa samānajātiyaṃ aparaggāhaṃ sandhāya.

[03]^b^Dutiyavāre^eb^ paṭhamavāre vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā^eb^ti ‘‘yadi rūpaṃ sassataṃ siyā, nayidaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya. Yasmā ca kho idaṃ rūpaṃ asassataṃ, tasmā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena udayavayavantatāya rūpaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, sassatābhiniveso micchā’’tiādinā tattha sassatavāde ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ disvā. ^b^Oḷārika^eb^nti tasmā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena ayāthāvaggāhatāya rūpaṃ na saṇhaṃ oḷārikameva. Vedanādīnampi aniccādibhāvadassanaṃ rūpavedanāādīnaṃ samānayogakkhamattā. ^b^Vissajjetī^eb^ti pajahati.

[03]^b^Tisso laddhiyo^eb^ti sassatucchedaekaccasassatadiṭṭhiyo. Yasmā sassatadiṭṭhikā vaṭṭe rajjanassa āsannā. Tathā hi te olīyantīti vuccanti, bhavābhavadiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena imesaṃ sattānaṃ saṃsārato sīsukkhipanaṃ natthīti etāva tisso visesato gahetabbā.

[03]^b^Idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānātī^eb^ti ettāvatā sassatadassanassa appasāvajjatākāraṇamāha, ^b^vaṭṭaṃ assādeti, abhinandatī^eb^ti iminā dandhavirāgatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānātī^eb^ti iminā tāsu tāsu gatīsu sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipatīti dasseti, ^b^sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānātī^eb^ti iminā kammaphalaṃ. ^b^Kusalaṃ na karotī^eb^ti iminā kammaṃ, ^b^akusalaṃ karonto na bhāyatī^eb^ti iminā puññāpuññāni sabhāvato jāyantīti dasseti. ^b^Vaṭṭaṃ assādeti abhinandati^eb^ tanninnabhāvato ^a^V2.0101^ea^. ^b^Sīghaṃ laddhiṃ jahituṃ na sakkoti^eb^ vaṭṭupacchedassa aruccanato. Ucchedavādī hi tasmiṃ bhave ucchedaṃ maññati. Tato paraṃ ^b^idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānāti^eb^ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānāti kammaphalavādībhāvato. Yebhuyyena hi ucchedavādī sabhāvaniyatiyadicchābhinivesesu aññatrābhiniveso hoti. ^b^Sīghaṃ dassanaṃ pajahati^eb^ vaṭṭābhiratiyā abhāvato. ^b^Pāramiyo pūretuṃ sakkonto paccekabuddho hutvā,^eb^ lokavohāramatteneva so sammāsambuddho hutvā parinibbāyatīti yojanā. ^b^Asakkonto^eb^ti buddho hotuṃ asakkonto. ^b^Abhinīhāraṃ^eb^^a^M2.0101^ea^^b^katvā^eb^ aggasāvakādibhāvassa abhinīhāraṃ sampādetvā. ^b^Sāvako hutvā^eb^ti aggasāvako mahāsāvako hutvā, tatthāpi tevijjo chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāppatto vā sukkhavipassako eva vā buddhasāvako hutvā parinibbāyati. Sabbamidaṃ ucchedavādino kalyāṇamittanissayena sammattaniyāmokkamane khippavirāgatādassanatthaṃ āgataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^202^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kañjiyenevā^eb^ti āranāḷena. Kañjiyasadisena ucchedadassanena. ^b^Pūrito^eb^ti paripuṇṇajjhāsayo. ^b^So^eb^ti paribbājako. ^b^Appahāyā^eb^ti abhinditvā. ^b^Viggahoti kalaho^eb^ idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti aññamaññaṃ viruddhaggāhoti katvā. ^b^Vivāda^eb^nti viruddhavādaṃ. ^b^Vighāta^eb^nti virodhahetukaṃ cittavighātaṃ. ^b^Vihesa^eb^nti viggahavivādanimittaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca kilamathaṃ. ^b^Ādīnavaṃ disvā^eb^ti etāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ evarūpo ādīnavo, aniyyānikabhāvatāya pana sampati āyatiñca mahādīnavoti evaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā.

[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Esohamasmi, eso me attā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.241; saṃ. ni. 3.8) kāyaṃ anvetīti kāyanvayo, soyeva, tassa vā samūho ^b^kāyanvayatā,^eb^ kāyapaṭibaddho kileso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyaṃ…pe… attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Asammissabhāva^eb^nti asaṅkarato vavatthitabhāvaṃ. Tena tāsaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayānaṃ uppajjitvā vigamaṃ dasseti. Evañhi tāsaṃ kadācipi saṅkaro natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho’’^eb^tiādi. Sarūpaṃ aggahetvā ‘‘aññā vedanā’’ti aniyamena vuttattā tameva vigamaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘anuppannāva honti antarahitā vā’’^eb^ti āha. Sarūpato niyametvā vuccamāne kāci anuppannā vā hoti, kāci antarahitā vāti. ^b^Cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvadassanattha^eb^nti khaṇe khaṇe bhijjamānabhāvadassanatthaṃ.

[03]^b^Na kenaci^eb^^a^V2.0102^ea^^b^saṃvadatī^eb^ti kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ diṭṭhirāgavasena saṃkiliṭṭhacitto na vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sassataṃ gahetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na vivadatī^eb^ti viruddhabhāvo hutvā na vivadati. ^b^Parivattetvā^eb^ti ucchedaṃ gahetvā ekaccasassataṃ gahetvā evaṃ vuttanayena tayopi vādā parivattetvā yojetabbā ^a^M2.0102^ea^. ^b^Tena voharatī^eb^ti tena lokavohārena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvanto satto puriso puggalotiādinā voharati, na pana ito bāhirakā viya abhinivisati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aparāmasanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kañci dhamma^eb^nti rūpādīsu ekaṃ dhammampi. ^b^Parāmāsaggāhena aggaṇhanto^eb^ti ‘‘nicca’’ntiādinā, ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā ca dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasitvā gahaṇena aggaṇhanto.

[03]^b^Katāvī^eb^ti katakicco. ^b^So vadeyyā^eb^ti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāresu sabbaso samucchinnesupi ahaṃ vadāmīti vadeyya. Tattha ^b^aha^eb^nti niyakajjhattasantāne. ^b^Mama^eb^nti tassa santakabhūte vatthusmiṃ lokaniruḷhe. ^b^Samañña^eb^nti tattha sukusalatāya loke samaññā kusalo viditvā. ^b^Vohāramattenā^eb^ti kevalaṃ paccekabuddho hutvā mahābodhipāramiyo pūretuṃ asakkonto sāvako hutvā desavohāramattena na appahīnataṇho viya andhaputhujjano abhinivesanavasena.

[03]^b^206^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sassatādīsū^eb^ti sassatābhinivesādīsu. ^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Sassataṃ abhiññāyā^eb^ti sassatadiṭṭhiṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato nissaraṇato abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^Pahāna^eb^nti accantappahānaṃ samucchedaṃ. ^b^Rūpassa pahāna^eb^nti rūpassa tappaṭibaddhasaññojanappahānena pahānaṃ. ^b^Anuppādanirodhena niruddhehi āsavehi aggahetvāva cittaṃ vimucci^eb^. ‘‘Āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccī’’ti ettha kiñcipi aggahetvā asesetvā. ^b^Soḷasa paññā^eb^ti mahāpaññādikā soḷasa paññā. ^b^Caturaṅgasamannāgato^eb^ti puṇṇauposathadivasatā, kenaci anāmantitameva anekasatānaṃyeva anekasahassānaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ sannipatitatā, sabbesaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampannatā, chaḷabhiññatā cāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatrimāni aṅgānī’’^eb^tiādi. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dīghanakhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve^eb^^a^M2.0103^ea^^b^māgaṇḍiyā^eb^ti dve ^a^V2.0103^ea^ māgaṇḍiyanāmakā. ^b^Devagabbhasadisa^eb^nti devānaṃ vasanaovarakasadisaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake’’ti etaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Na kevalaṃ taṃ divasamevā^eb^ti yaṃ divasaṃ māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññattaṃ, na kevalaṃ taṃ divasameva bhagavā yenaññataro vanasaṇḍo, tenupasaṅkamīti yojanā. ^b^Gāmūpacāre^eb^ti gāmasamīpe. ^b^Saññāṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti saññāṇaṃ katvā viya. Na hi bhagavato tassa saññāṇakaraṇe payojanaṃ atthi.

[03]^b^Samaṇaseyyānurūpa^eb^nti samaṇassa anucchavikā seyyā. Pāsaṃsattho hi ayaṃ rūpa-saddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imaṃ tiṇasanthāraka’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Anākiṇṇo^eb^ti viluḷito aghaṭṭito. Hatthapādasīsehi tattha tattha pahaṭena na calito ^b^abhinno,^eb^ acalitattā eva abhinnaṃ attharaṇaṃ. ^b^Paricchinditvā paññatto viyā^eb^ti ayaṃ chekena cittakārena cintetvā tulikāya paricchinnalekhāya paricchinditvā likhitā cittakataseyyā viya. Bhūnaṃ vuccati vaḍḍhitaṃ, taṃ hantīti ^b^bhūnahuno^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hatavaḍḍhino’’^eb^ti. Taṃ panāyaṃ cakkhādīsu saṃvaravidhānaṃ vaḍḍhihananaṃ maññati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mariyādakārakassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Brūhetabba^eb^nti uḷāravisayūpahārena vaḍḍhetabbaṃ pīṇetabbaṃ. Taṃ pana ananubhūtānubhavanena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘adiṭṭhaṃ dakkhitabba’’^eb^nti. Anubhūtaṃ pana apaṇītaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabba’’^eb^nti. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādī kiresa paribbājako, tasmā ^b^evaṃ chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhiṃ paññapeti^eb^. Yasmā yaṃ channampi cakkhādīnaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto lokassa avaḍḍhitaṃ vināsameva paññapeti, ^b^tasmā so^eb^ sayampi ^b^vaḍḍhihato^eb^ hatavaḍḍhito.

[03]Saṃkilesato ārakattā ^b^ariyo^eb^ niyyānikadhammabhāvato ^b^ñāyo dhammo^eb^. Vajjalesassapi abhāvato ^b^kusalo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parisuddhe kāraṇadhamme anavajje’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uggatassā^eb^ti uccakulīnatādinā uḷārassa. ^b^Mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti mukhena saṃyato hutvā. ^b^Ambajambūādīni gahetvā viya apūrayamāno^eb^ti ambajambūādīni aññamaññavisadisāni viya pūraṇakathānayena yaṃ kiñci akathetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mayā kathitaniyāmenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Phalasamāpattiyā^eb^^a^M2.0104^ea^^a^V2.0104^ea^^b^vuṭṭhito^eb^ti divāvihārato vuṭṭhitoti attho. Divāvihāropi hi ‘‘paṭisallāna’’nti vuccati ‘‘rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī’’tiādīsu (pārā. 18). Bhagavā hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānuttarakālaṃ tesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā divāvihārato vuṭṭhāya tattha gato. Saṃvego nāma sahottappañāṇaṃ, taṃ nibbindanavasenapi hoti, saṃveganissitaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘pītisaṃvegena saṃviggo’’^eb^ti. So pana yasmā purimāvatthāya calanaṃ hoti cittassa, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘calito kampito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tikhiṇasotena purisenā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi^eb^ yathā vineyyadamanakusalo ^b^vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti idaṃ āramitabbabhāvassa bhāvalakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Āramati etthāti ārāmo, rūpaṃ ārāmo etassāti ^b^rūpārāmaṃ,^eb^ tato eva tanninnabhāvena ^b^rūpe ratanti rūparataṃ,^eb^ tena sammo duppattiyā rūpena sammuditanti ^b^rūpasammuditaṃ,^eb^ tadetaṃ tadabhihatajavanakiccaṃ tattha āropetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Danta^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Dantaṃ^eb^ damitaṃ. ^b^Nibbisevana^eb^nti vigatavisukāyikaṃ. ^b^Gutta^eb^nti satiyā guttaṃ. ^b^Rakkhita^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Saṃvuta^eb^nti apanītaṃ pavesanivāraṇena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pihita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppajjanapariḷāha^eb^nti uppajjanakilesapariḷāhaṃ. ^b^Kiṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ assā^eb^ti rūpārammaṇaṃ anubhavitvā samudayādipahānaṃ pariggaṇhitvā parinibbinditvā virajjitvā yo vimutto, tattha kiṃ vuddhihatapariyāyo avassaṃ labhati na labhatīti pucchati. Paribbājako tādise sārabaddhavimuttike vuddhihatoti na vadeyyāti āha ^b^‘‘na kiñci, bho, gotamā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^211^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Te^eb^ti tayā, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^Vassaṃ vāso vassaṃ^eb^ uttarapadalopena, vassituṃ arahatīti ^b^vassiko,^eb^ vassakāle nivāsānucchavikoti attho.

[03]^b^Nātiucco hoti nātinīco^eb^ti gimhiko viya ucco, hemantiko viya nīco na hoti, atha kho tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti nātinīco. ^b^Nātitanūnī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0105^ea^ hemantikassa viya na khuddakāni. ^b^Nātibahūnī^eb^ti gimhikassa viya na atibahūni. ^b^Missakānevā^eb^ti hemantikagimhikesu vuttalakkhaṇavomissakāni. ^b^Uṇhapavesanatthāyā^eb^ti niyūhesu purebhattaṃ pacchābhattañca patitasūriyobhāsavasena uṇhassa abbhantarapavesanatthāya. ^b^Bhittiniyūhāni nīharīyantī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0105^ea^ dakkhiṇapasse bhittīsu niyūhāni nīharitvā karīyanti. ^b^Vipulajālānī^eb^ti puthulachiddāni. ^b^Udakayantānī^eb^ti udakavāhakayantāni.

[03]^b^Nīluppalagacchake katvā^eb^ti vikasitehi nīluppalehi gacchake naḷinike katvā. ^b^Gandhakalala^eb^nti gandhamissakakaddamaṃ. ^b^Yamakabhittī^eb^ti yugaḷabhitti, tassā antare nāḷi, yato udakaṃ abhiruhati. ^b^Lohanāḷi^eb^nti lohamayayantanāḷiṃ. ^b^Jāla^eb^nti tambalohamayaṃ jālaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhā yantaṃ parivattentī^eb^ti heṭṭhābhāge udakayantaṃ gamenti. ^b^Udakaphusite temente vivaṇṇatā māhosī^eb^ti ^b^nīlapaṭaṃ nivāseti. Divākāle^eb^ti divasavelāya. ^b^Ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto viharāmī^eb^ti etena attano phalasamāpattivihāro bhagavatā dassitoti āha – ^b^‘‘tāya ratiyā ramamānoti idaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiṃ sandhāya vutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahā^eb^^b^ca nesaṃ papañco^eb^ti nesaṃ rājūnaṃ mahāpapañco rājiddhivasena sabbadā sampattivisayo ca, anubhavituṃ na labhantīti adhippāyo. ^b^Mante gavesantā vicaranti,^eb^ na bhogasukhaṃ. ^b^Gaṇanā^eb^ nāma acchinnagaṇanā, na vigaṇagaṇanā na paṇagaṇanā. ^b^Āvaṭṭo^eb^ti yathādhigate dibbe kāme pahāya kāmahetu āvaṭṭo nivatto parivattito ^b^bhaveyya. Evaṃ mānusakā kāmā^eb^ti yathā koci kusaggena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ mineyya. Tattha mahāsamudde udakameva mahantaṃ vipulaṃ paṇītañca, evaṃ dibbānaṃ kāmānaṃ samīpe upanidhāya mānusakā kāmā appamattakā oramattakā nihīnā, dibbāva kāmā mahantā vipulā uḷārā paṇītā. ^b^Samadhigayhā^eb^ti sammā adhigamanavasena niggayha dibbampi sukhaṃ hīnaṃ katvā ^b^tiṭṭhati^eb^.

[03]^b^213^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārogyahetukaṃ sukhaṃ assa atthīti ^b^sukhī,^eb^ taṃ panassa rogavigamatovāti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamaṃ dukkhito pacchā sukhito’’^eb^ti. Serī nāma attādhīnavuttīti āha ^b^‘‘serī ekako bhaveyyā’’^eb^ti. Attano vaso ^a^M2.0106^ea^ sayaṃvaso, so etassa atthīti ^b^sayaṃvasī. Aṅgārakapallaṃ viya^eb^ kāmavatthupariḷāhahetuto. ^b^Tacchetvā^eb^ti ghaṭṭetvā, kaṇḍūyitvāti attho.

[03]^b^214^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yena kāyo madhurakajāto hoti, taṃ kira kuṭṭhaṃ chaviṃ vināseti, cammaṃ chiddajātaṃ viya hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘upahatakāyappasādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccalatthā^eb^ti paṭilabhi. Avijjābhibhūtatāya virodhipaccayasamāyogena ^b^paññindriyassa upahatattā^eb^. Āyatiṃ dukkhaphalatāya etarahi ca kilesadukkhabahulatāya kāmānaṃ ^b^dukkhasamphassatā,^eb^ tadubhayasaṃyuttesu tesu ca taṃ asallakkhitvā ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ekantasukhābhiniveso viparītasaññāya, na kevalāya sukhavedanāya sukhāti pavattasaññī.

[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tānī^eb^ti kuṭṭhasarīre vaṇamukhāni. ^b^Asucīnī^eb^ti asubhāni. ^b^Duggandhānī^eb^ti vissagandhāni. ^b^Pūtīnī^eb^ti kuṇapabhūtāni. ^b^Idānī^eb^ti etarahi. Nakhehi vippatacchanāggiparitāpanehi atinippīḷanakāle ^b^pāṇakā…pe… paggharanti,^eb^ tena vedanā tanukā hoti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttanayena vedanāya tanukabhāvato.

[03]Ārogyabhāve dhanalābhādilābhuppattito, asati ca ārogye lābhassa niratthakabhāvato, diṭṭhadhammikādisabbasampattīnaṃ lābhassa nimittabhāvato ca ^b^ārogyaparamā lābhā^eb^. Nibbāne sukhuppattito, asati ca nibbānādhigame tādisassa sukhassa anupalabbhanato, sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā ca sabbaso ca saṃsāradukkhābhāvato, adhigate ca tasmiṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhābhāvato ca ^b^nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Pubbabhāgamaggāna^eb^nti kāyānupassanādibhedabhinnānaṃ ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgiyānaṃ maggānaṃ. Tesañca amatagāmitā nāma tanninnatāvaseneva sacchikiriyāvasenāti āha ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgagamaneneva amatagāmina’’^eb^nti. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgiko^eb^ ariyamaggo ^b^khemo^eb^ sabbaparissayasamugghātanena anupaddutattā, taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ sabbaso anupaddutattā taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ sabbaso anupaddavahetuto ca. ^b^Laddhivasena gahitā^eb^ti sassatavādādīhi kevalaṃ tesaṃ laddhivasena tathā gahitā. ^b^Khemāmatagāmina^eb^nti iminā hi ‘‘khemaṃamatagāmina’’nti vibhattialopena niddeso, attho pana vibhattilopena daṭṭhabboti dasseti.
[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anomajjatī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0107^ea^ anu anu omajjati. Aparāparaṃ hatthaṃ ^b^heṭṭhā otārento majjati^eb^.

[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cheka^eb^nti ghanabhāvena vītaṃ. Ghanamaṭṭhabhāvena sundaraṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sampanna’’^eb^nti. Sādhūhi paramappicchasantuṭṭhehi lāto gahitoti ^b^sāhuḷi. Saṅkāracoḷakaṃ^eb^ niccakāḷakaṃ.

[03]^b^218^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha tattha rujanaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena ^b^rogova bhūto^eb^. Vipassanāñāṇenapi sikhāppattena ārogyaṃ ekadesena passati, nibbānañca vaṭṭapaṭipakkhatoti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanāñāṇañcevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Antarā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0107^ea^ paṭhamuppatti jarāmaraṇānaṃ vemajjhe. ^b^Upahato^eb^ti pittasemhādidosehi dūsitabhāvena kathito. Pittādidose pana bhesajjasevanāya nivattento upahataṃ paṭipākatikaṃ karonto ^b^cakkhūni uppādeti nāma. Vinaṭṭhānī^eb^ti anuppattidhammataṃ āpannāni.
[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbe vutte^eb^ sāhuḷiyacīre. ^b^Vaṭṭe anugatacittenā^eb^ti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anādīnavadassitāya anugāmicittena.

[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammassā^eb^ti nibbānassa. ^b^Anudhamma^eb^nti anurūpaṃ niyyānadhammaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anucchavikaṃ paṭipada’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pañcakkhandhe^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhe dasseti. ‘‘Dīgharattaṃ vata, bho’’tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upādānanirodhāti vivaṭṭaṃ dassento’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Māgaṇḍiyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^ Devena ^a^V2.0108^ea^ vassena kato sobbho devakatasobbho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vasso…pe… rahado’’^eb^ti. ^b^Guhā^eb^ti paṃsuguhā pāsāṇaguhā missakaguhāti tisso guhā. Tattha ^b^paṃsuguhā^eb^ udakamuttaṭṭhāne ahosi ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pana udakena ajjhotthataṃ. ^b^Umaṅgaṃ katvā^eb^ti heṭṭhā suduggaṃ katvā. ^b^Anamataggiyaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0108^ea^^b^paccavekkhitvā^eb^ti ‘‘na kho so sattāvāso sulabharūpo, yo iminā dīghena addhunā anāvuṭṭhapubbo’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.160) idañca taḷākaṃ mayā vutthapubbaṃ bhavissati, tampi ṭhānaṃ so ca attabhāvo apaññattikabhāvaṃ gatoti evaṃ anamataggiyaṃ paccavekkhitvā tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Iminā nayena samuddapabbatadassanādīsupi paccavekkhaṇāvidhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Uccaṃ nadamānāyā^eb^ti uccaṃ katvā saddaṃ karontiyā ^b^kāmassādabhavassādādivatthu^eb^nti ‘‘ayañca ayañca kāmo iṭṭho kanto manāpo, asuko bhavo iṭṭho kanto manāpo, evamayaṃ loko piyehi piyataro’’ti evaṃ kāmassādabhavassādalokassādādisaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ. Duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo mokkhamaggo ca, taṃ niyyānaṃ arahati, niyyāne vā niyuttāti niyyānikā, niyyānaṃ vā phalaṃ etissā atthīti niyyānikā, vacīduccaritādisaṃkilesato niyyātīti vā niyyānīyā, ī-kārassa rassattaṃ ya-kārassa ca ka-kāraṃ katvā niyyānikā, cetanāya saddhiṃ samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato aniyyānikā, tassā bhāvo aniyyānikattaṃ, tasmā ^b^aniyyānikattā. Tiracchānabhūtā^eb^ti tirokaraṇabhūtā. ^b^Gehassitakathā^eb^ti kāmapaṭisaṃyuttakathā. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānabhāve^eb^ti aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttacatusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāve. Saha atthenāti ^b^sātthakaṃ,^eb^ hitapaṭisaṃyuttanti attho. ^b^Visikhā^eb^ti gharasanniveso, visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā ‘‘gāmo āgato’’tiādīsu (sārattha. ṭī. 1.ācariyaparamparakathāvaṇṇanā) viya. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sūrā samatthā’’^eb^ti ^b^‘‘saddhā pasannā’’^eb^ti ca. Kumbhaṭṭhānappadesena kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘kumbhadāsikathā vā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^228^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vohāro viya tesaṃ tathā vohāramattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘brahmacariyavāse’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akatā^eb^ti samena, visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā na vihitā. Katavidho karaṇavidhi natthi ^a^V2.0109^ea^ etesanti ^b^akaṭavidhā^eb^. Padadvayenapi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ anibbattataṃ dasseti. ^b^Iddhiyāpi na nimmitā^eb^ti kassaci iddhimato cetovasippattassa devassa, issarādino vā iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. ^b^Animmātā^eb^ti kassaci animmāpitā. ^b^Rūpādijanakabhāva^eb^nti rūpasaddādīnaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ, rūpādayopi pathaviyādīhi ^a^M2.0109^ea^ appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa adhippāyo. Yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci ca anibbattanakaṃ, evametepīti āha ^b^‘‘pabbatakūṭā viya ṭhitāti kūṭaṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Yamidaṃ bījato aṅkurādi jāyatīti vuccati, taṃ vijjamānameva tato nikkhamati nāvijjamānaṃ, aññathā aññatopi aññassa upaladdhi siyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Evaṃ ṭhitā^eb^ti evaṃ nibbikārā ṭhitā. ^b^Ubhayenapī^eb^ti atthadvayenapīti vadanti. ‘‘Kūṭaṭṭhā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’’ti padadvayenapi. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ. ^b^Ṭhitattā^eb^ti nibbikārābhāvena ṭhitattā. ^b^Na calantī^eb^ti vikāraṃ nāpajjanti. Vikārābhāvato hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā. Aniñjanañca atthato pakatiyā avaṭṭhānamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na vipariṇāmentī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā avipariṇāmadhammattā eva te ^b^aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti^eb^. Sati hi vikāraṃ āpādetabbatāya byābādhakatāpi siyā, tathā anuggahetabbatāya anuggāhakatāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘nāla’’ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Pathavī eva kāyekadesattā ^b^pathavīkāyo. Hantuṃ vā ghātetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthi^eb^ jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārabhāvato, eteneva nesamahantabbatā aghātetabbatā atthato vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattannaṃtveva kāyāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sotuṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthī^eb^ti paccekaṃ nesaṃ savanesu asamatthattā tadekadesādīsupi asamatthataṃ dīpeti. Yadi koci hantā natthi, kathaṃ satthappahāroti āha ^b^‘‘yathā muggarāsiādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hoti,^eb^ hananaghātanādi pana paramatthato nattheva kāyānaṃ avikopanīyabhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Kevalaṃ takkamattena niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ dīpetī^eb^ti etena yasmā takkikā niraṅkusatāya parikappanassa yaṃ kiñci attanā parikappitaṃ sārato maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa takkadiṭṭhiggāhaṃ gaṇhanti, tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthusmiṃ viññūhi vicāraṇā kattabbāti dasseti. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā. ^b^Pañcindriyavasenā^eb^ti pañcarūpindriyavasena. ^b^Kammanti laddhi^eb^ kammabhāvena supākaṭattā. Avaṅkakathātāraṇādikā ^b^dvāsaṭṭhi paṭipadā. Ekasmiṃ kappe^eb^ti ekasmiṃ mahākappe.

[03]^b^Purisabhūmiyo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0110^ea^ padhānapuggalena niddeso, itthīnampetā bhūmiyo icchanteva. ^b^Bhikkhu ca pannako^eb^tiādi tesaṃ pāḷiyeva. Tattha ^b^pannako^eb^ti bhikkhāya vicaraṇakoti vadanti, tesaṃ vā paṭipattiṃ ^a^V2.0110^ea^ paṭipannako. ^b^Jino^eb^ti jiṇṇo, jarāvasena nihīnadhātukoti vadanti, attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito. So kira tathābhūto kassacipi dhammaṃ na katheti, tenāha ^b^‘‘na kiñci āhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Alābhi^eb^nti ‘‘so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhatī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.394) nayena vuttālābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ. Tato eva jighacchādubbalaparetatāya sayanaparāyaṇaṃ ^b^samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati^eb^.

[03]^b^Ājīvavuttisatānī^eb^ti sattānaṃ ājīvabhūtāni jīvikāvuttisatāni. Pasuggahaṇena eḷakajāti gahitā, migaggahaṇena rurugavayādisabbamigajāti. ^b^Bahū devā^eb^ti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena nesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā. Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekacco antarabhedo ^b^‘‘mahāsamayasuttena’’^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.331 ādayo) dīpetabbo. ^b^Mānusāpi anantā^eb^ti dīpadesakulavaṃsājīvādivibhāgavasena mānusāpi anantabhedā. Pisācā eva pesācā, te aparapetādayo ^b^mahantā^eb^ veditabbā.
[03]Chaddantadahamandākiniyo ^b^kuḷīramucalinda^eb^nāmena vadati. ^b^Gaṇṭhikā^eb^ti pabbagaṇṭhikā. ^b^Paṇḍitopi…pe… uddhaṃ na gacchati,^eb^ kasmā? Sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇakālassa niyatabhāvato.

[03]Aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā ^b^paripāceti nāma^eb^ sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā. ^b^Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa^eb^ patvā patvā paripakkabhāvāpādanena ^b^byantiṃ karoti nāma. Suttaguḷe^eb^ti suttavaṭṭiyaṃ. ^b^Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletī^eb^ti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva, na tassa vaddhīti dasseti paricchinnarūpattā.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niyativāde pakkhipanto^eb^ti sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānitvāpi padesaññutāya asampāyamāno tattha attano aññāṇakiriyaṃ pariharituṃ asakkonto ca ‘‘evamesā niyatī’’ti niyativāde pakkhipanto.

[03]^b^230^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammakathāya ^a^M2.0111^ea^ apassayabhūto anussavo etassa atthīti ^b^anussavī,^eb^ tenevassa apassayavādaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anussavanissito’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Savanaṃ saccato^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci anussavaṃ, taṃ savanaṃ saccanti gahetvā ṭhito. ^b^Piṭakasampadāyā^eb^ti ganthasampādanena, tādisaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ katvā taṃ nissāya dhammaṃ katheti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaggapaṇṇāsakāyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mandapañño^eb^ti ^a^V2.0111^ea^ parittapañño. ^b^Momūho^eb^ti sammuyhako. ‘‘Evantipi me no’’tiādinā vividho nānappakāro khepo vācāya paravādānaṃ khīpanaṃ vācāvikkhepo, taṃ ^b^vācāvikkhepaṃ,^eb^ na marati na pacchijjati yathāvutto vādavikkhepo etāyāti amarā, tattha pavattā diṭṭhi amarāvikkhepo, taṃ ^b^amarāvikkhepaṃ. Apariyantavikkhepa^eb^nti ‘‘evampi me no’’tiādinā pucchitassa apariyosāpanavasena vikkhepaṃ. ^b^Ito cito ca sandhāvati^eb^ ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato. ^b^Gāhaṃ na upagacchatī^eb^ti micchāgāhatāya uttaravidhānāya purimapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā gāhaṃ na upagacchati. Amarāsadisāya amarāya vikkhepoti ^b^amarāvikkhepo^eb^.

[03]^b^Idaṃ kusala^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho, iminā pakārenāti attho. Amarāvikkhepiko yathā kusale, evaṃ aññasmiṃ yaṃ kiñci kenaci pucchitaṃ atthaṃ attano aruccanatāya ‘‘evantipi me no’’tiādinā tattha tattha vikkhepaññeva āpajjati, tasmā ‘‘evantipi me no’’tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena vikkhipanākāradassanaṃ. Nanu cettha vikkhepavādino vikkhepapakkhassa ananujānanaṃ vikkhepapakkhe avaṭṭhānaṃ yuttanti? Na, tatthāpi tassa sammūḷhassa paṭikkhepavaseneva vikkhepavādassa pavattanato. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘no’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho paralokattikādīnaṃ paṭisedhanamukhena vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.

[03]Etthāha – ‘‘nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme paralokattikādīni ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho samāno pucchāya vikkhepamattaṃ āpajjati, tassa kathaṃ diṭṭhigatabhāvo. Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitamatthaṃ ajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena ^a^M2.0112^ea^ tassa diṭṭhigatikatā yuttā’’ti? Vuccate – na heva kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā, atha kho micchābhinivesavasena. Sassatābhinivesena micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva hi puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme paralokattikādīni ca yāthāvato appaṭipajjamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena ca vikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti. Atha vā puññapāpānaṃ tabbipākānañca anavabodhena asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇaṃyeva sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā visuṃyeva sā ekā diṭṭhi sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā, indriyabaddhato ca tatiyaṭṭhānabhāve dassito.

[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sannidhikārakaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0112^ea^^b^kāme^eb^ti ettha anindriyabaddhāni adhippetānīti tilataṇḍulādiggahaṇaṃ, tassa lokassa appasādaparihāratthaṃ kadāci taṇḍulanāḷiādisaṅgahaṇakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ājīvakā matā nāmā^eb^ti ime ājīvakā sabbaso sammāpaṭipattirahitā micchā eva ca paṭipajjamānā adhisīlasaṅkhātassa sīlajīvitassa abhāvena matā nāma. ^b^Puttamatā^eb^ti mataputtā. ^b^Samaṇe gotame brahmacariyavāso atthī^eb^ti samaṇaṃ eva gotamaṃ parisuddho suparipuṇṇo takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāvaho brahmacariyavāso atthi. Etenettha dhammasudhammatādidīpanena buddhasubuddhatañca dīpeti, ^b^aññattha natthī^eb^ti iminā bāhirakesu tassa abhāvaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sandakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiññātā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0113^ea^ ediso ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā. Appasaddassa vinīto, appasaddatāya mandabhāṇitāya vinītoti ca ^b^appasaddavinīto^eb^ti vuccamāne aññena vinītabhāvo dīpito hoti, bhagavā pana sayambhuñāṇena sayameva vinīto. Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘appasaddavinīto’’ti na vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hi bhagavā aññena vinīto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^238^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hiyyodivasaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0113^ea^^b^upādāya^eb^ tato āsannāni katipayāni divasāni ^b^purimāni nāma honti, purimānī^eb^ti ca pubbakāni, atītānīti attho. ^b^Tato para^eb^nti yathā vuttātītadivasato anantaraṃ paraṃ purimataraṃ atisayena purimattā. Iti imesu dvīsu pavattito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo, evaṃ santepi yadettha ‘‘purimatara’’nti vuttaṃ, tato pabhuti yaṃ yaṃ oraṃ, taṃ taṃ paraṃ, yaṃ yaṃ paraṃ, taṃ taṃ ‘‘purimatara’’nti vuttaṃ hoti. Kutūhalayuttā sālā ^b^kutūhalasālā^eb^ yathā ‘‘ājaññaratho’’ti. ^b^Ime^eb^ dassanādayo.

[03]^b^Ayathābhūtaguṇehī^eb^ti ayathābhūtaṃ micchādīpitātthamatteneva ugghositaguṇehi ^b^samuggato^eb^ ghosito. Taranti atikkamanti etenāti titthaṃ, aggamaggo. Diṭṭhigatikamaggo pana ayathābhūtopi tesaṃ tathā vitaraṇaṃ upādāya titthanti voharīyatīti taṃ karontā ^b^titthakarā. Osaratī^eb^ti pavisati.

[03]^b^239^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sahita^eb^nti pubbāparāviruddhaṃ. ^b^Na kiñci jāta^eb^nti paṭiññādosahetudosaudāharaṇadosaduṭṭhadosatāya na kiñci jātaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āropito te vādo’’^eb^ti. Vadanti tena paribhāsantīti ^b^vādo^eb^ doso. ^b^Sabhāvakkosenā^eb^ti sabhāvato pavattakoṭṭhāsena.
[03]^b^240^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pīḷeyyā^eb^ti madhubhaṇḍena saha bhājane pīḷetvā dadeyya. ^b^Sabrahmacārīhi sampayojetvā^eb^ti sahadhammikehi viheṭhanapayogaṃ katvā, tenāha ^b^‘‘vivādaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Itarītarenā^eb^ti paṇītato itarena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lāmakalāmakenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^242^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhattakosakenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0114^ea^ kosakabhattena, khuddakasarāvabhattakenāti attho. ^b^Beluvamattabhattāhārā^eb^ti billapamāṇabhattabhojanā. ^b^Oṭṭhavaṭṭiyā^eb^ti mukhavaṭṭiyā. ^b^Sabbākārenevā^eb^ti sabbappakāreneva. ^b^Anappāhāroti na vattabbo^eb^ kadāci appāhāroti katvā. Tattha ativiya aññehi avisayhaṃ appāhārataṃ bhagavato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘padhānabhūmiya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Mayā^eb^ti nissakkavacanaṃ. ^b^Visesatarā^eb^ti tena dhammena visesavantatarā.

[03]Vatasamādānavaseneva ^a^M2.0114^ea^ paṃsukūlaṃ dhārentīti ^b^paṃsukūlikā^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘samādinnapaṃsukūlikaṅgā’’^eb^ti, saddattho pana ^b^‘‘visuddhimagge’’^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.24) vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Piṇḍapātikā sapadānacārino^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tattha tattha satthena chinditattā ^b^satthalūkhāni^eb^. Yaṃ yaṃ sappāyaṃ, tasseva gahaṇaṃ ^b^uccina^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘uccinitvā…pe… thiraṭṭhānameva gahetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Alābulomasānī^eb^ti alābulomāni viya sukhumatarāni cīvarasuttaṃsūni etesaṃ santīti alābulomasāni. ^b^Pātitasāṇapaṃsukūla^eb^nti kaḷevarena saddhiṃ chaḍḍitasāṇamayaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, yaṃ tumbamatte puḷave odhunitvā satthā gaṇhi.

[03]‘‘Yathāpi bhamaro puppha’’ntiādinā (dha. pa. 49) vuttaṃ madhukarabhikkhācāravataṃ ‘‘piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjā’’ti (mahāva. 73, 128) vacanato bhikkhūnaṃ pakatibhūtaṃ vatanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uñchāsake vate ratā’’^eb^ti. Vata-saddo cettha pakativatasaṅkhātaṃ sakavataṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uñchācariyasaṅkhāte bhikkhūnaṃ pakativate’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uccanīcagharadvāraṭṭhāyino^eb^ti mahantakhuddakagehānaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāyino. ^b^Kabaramissakaṃ bhattaṃ saṃharitvā^eb^ti kaṇājakamissakaṃ bhattaṃ sampiṇḍitvā. ^b^Ummārato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti gharummārato paṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^Cīvarānuggahattha^eb^nti cīvarānurakkhaṇatthaṃ. Ettha ca yasmā buddhā nāma sadevake loke anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ, sā cassa puññakkhettatā paramukkaṃsagatā, tasmā sattānaṃ tādisaṃ upakāraṃ ācikkhitvā te ca anuggaṇhantā gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyanti, catupaccayasantose pana ne paramukkaṃsagatā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^244^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sappaccaya^eb^nti sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ hutvā dhammaṃ desetīti ayamettha attho. Codako pana adhippāyaṃ ajānanto ^b^‘‘kiṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro ^b^‘‘no na desetī’’^eb^tiādinā adhippāyaṃ vivarati. ^b^Nidāna^eb^nti cettha ñāpakaṃ uppattikāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca tassa tassa anuppattiyuttassa atthassa paṭipakkhaharaṇato ^b^‘‘sappāṭihāriya’’^eb^nti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘purimassevetaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0115^ea^^b^vevacana’’^eb^nti. Rāgādīnaṃ vā paṭiharaṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ, saha pāṭihāriyenāti ^b^sappāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. Rāgādipaṭisedhavaseneva hi satthā dhammaṃ deseti.

[03]^b^245^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassa^eb^^a^M2.0115^ea^^b^tassa pañhassā^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ pañhaṃ paro abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchati, tassa tassa pañhassa. ^b^Upari āgamanavādapatha^eb^nti vissajjane kate tato upari āgacchanakaṃ vādamaggaṃ. ^b^Visesetvā vadanto^eb^ti vattati, ‘‘bho gotama, vattumarahatī’’ti attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhataṃ kāraṇaṃ attano māraṇatthaṃ āvudhaṃ nidassento viya visesetvā vadanto pahārakena vacanena. ^b^Antarantare^eb^ti mayā vuccamānakathāpabandhassa antarantare. ^b^Dadeyya^eb^ vadeyya. ^b^Evarūpesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti paravādīhi saddhiṃ vādapaṭivādaṭṭhānesu. Te niggahetuṃ mayā desitaṃ suttapadaṃ ānetvā ^b^mamayeva anusāsaniṃ ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti^eb^.

[03]^b^246^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampādemī^eb^ti manorathaṃ sampādemi. ^b^Paripūremī^eb^ti ajjhāsayaṃ paripūremi. ^b^Adhisīle^eb^ti adhike uttamasīle. Sāvakasīlato ca paccekabuddhasīlato ca buddhānaṃ sīlaṃ ^b^adhikaṃ^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaṃ paramukkaṃsato anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhasīlaṃ nāma kathita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ṭhānuppattikapaññā^eb^ti tattha tattha ṭhānaso uppannapaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Avasesā paññā^eb^ti idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatā anāgatā ca yathāvuttañāṇadvayavinimuttā paññā.

[03]^b^247^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Visesādhigamāna^eb^nti satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ adhigandhabbavisesānaṃ. Abhiññā nāma cha abhiññā, tāsu ukkaṭṭhaniddesena chaḷabhiññārahatova aggamaggapaññā idha abhiññāti adhippetā, tassa vosānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāramī paramukkaṃsāti avakaṃsāti ca aggaphalaṃ vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘abhiññā…pe… arahattaṃ pattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Upāyapadhāne^eb^ti ariyaphalādhigamanassa upāyabhūte padhāne. ‘‘Anuppannapāpakānuppādādiatthā’’ti gahitā tatheva honti, taṃ atthaṃ sādhentiyevāti etassa atthassa dīpako sammā-saddoti yathāadhippetatthassa anuppannapāpakānuppādādino upāyabhūte, padhānaupāyabhūteti attho. Sammā-saddassa vā yoniso atthadīpakataṃ sandhāya ‘‘yoniso padhāne’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Chandaṃ janetī^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ uppādeti pavatteti vā. ^b^Vāyamatī^eb^ti payogaparakkamaṃ karoti. ^b^Vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ karoti. ^b^Cittaṃ ukkhipatī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0116^ea^ teneva sahajātavīriyena kosajjapakkhato cittaṃ ukkhipati. ^b^Padahatī^eb^ti sammappadhānabhūtaṃ vīriyaṃ pavatteti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi ^a^V2.0116^ea^ yojetabbāni. ‘‘Padahatī’’ti vā iminā āsevanādīhi saddhiṃ sikhāpattaṃ ussoḷhivīriyaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Vaḍḍhiyā paripūraṇattha^eb^nti yāvatā bhāvanāpāripūriyā paripūraṇatthaṃ. ^b^Yā ṭhitī^eb^ti yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavigamena avaṭṭhiti. ^b^So asammoso^eb^ti so avināso. ^b^Yaṃ vepulla^eb^nti yo sabbaso vipulabhāvo mahantatā. ^b^Bhāvanāpāripūrī^eb^ti bhāvanāya paripūritā. ^b^Atthotipi veditabbaṃ purimapacchimapadānaṃ samānatthabhāvato.^eb^

[03]^b^Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā^eb^taṃtaṃvisesādhigamassa paṭipadāvibhāvanāya āraddhattā. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppajjanena anatthāvahatā nāma natthīti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘uppajjamānā’’^eb^ti vacanaṃ uppannānaṃ rāsantarabhāvena gahitattā. Tathā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjanenāti vuttaṃ – ^b^anuppajjamānā^eb^ti vacanaṃ uppannānaṃ rāsantarabhāvena gahitattā.^b^ Nirujjhamānā^eb^ti paṭipakkhasamāyogena vinassamānā, na khaṇanirodhavasena nirujjhamānā.

[03]^b^Lobhādayo veditabbā,^eb^ ye āraddhavipassakānaṃ uppajjanārahā. ^b^Sakiṃ uppajjitvā^eb^ti sabhāvakathanamattametaṃ. Ekavārameva hi maggo uppajjati. ^b^Nirujjhamāno^eb^ti saraseneva nirujjhamāno. Na hi tassa paṭipakkhasamāyogo nāma atthi. ^b^Phalassā^eb^ti anantarakāleva uppajjanakaphalassa. ^b^Paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhatī^eb^ti iminā maggo sampati āyatiñca ekanteneva atthāvahoti dasseti. ^b^Purimasmimpī^eb^ti ‘‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’’nti etasmiṃ tatiyavārepi. ^b^‘‘Samathavipassanā gahetabbā’’ti vuttaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, ^b^taṃ pana^eb^ maggassa anuppannatāya sabbhāvato, anuppajjamāne ca tasmiṃ vaṭṭānatthasabbhāvatoti maggassapi sādhāraṇabhāvato ^b^na yutta^eb^nti paṭikkhipati. Yadi samathavipassanānampi anuppatti anatthāvahā, maggassa anuppattiyā vattabbaṃ natthīti.

[03]^b^Mahantaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0117^ea^, ^b^gāravaṃ hoti,^eb^ tasmā ‘‘saṅghagāravena yathāruci vandituṃ na labhāmī’’ti saṅghena saha na nikkhami. ^b^Ettakaṃ dhātūnaṃ nidhānaṃ nāma aññatra natthi,^eb^ mahādhātunidhānato hi nīharitvā katipayā dhātuyo tattha tattha cetiye upanītā, idha pana rāmagāmathūpe vinaṭṭhe nāgabhavanaṃ paviṭṭhā doṇamattā dhātuyo upanītā. ^b^Atimandāni no^eb^ti nanu ativiya mandāni.
[03]^b^Saṃvijjitvā^eb^ti ‘‘kathañhi nāma mādiso īdisaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇissatī’’ti saṃvegaṃ janetvā. Īdisaṃ nāma mādisaṃ ārabbha vattabbanti ^b^kiṃ vadatīti^eb^ taṃ vacanaṃ anādiyanto.

[03]Santasamāpattito ^a^V2.0117^ea^ aññaṃ santhambhanakāraṇaṃ balavaṃ natthīti tato parihīno sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ patiṭṭhā kathaṃ bhavissatīti āha ^b^‘‘santāya…pe… na sakkotī’’^eb^ti. Na hi mahārajjuyā chinnāya suttatantū santhambhetuṃ sakkontīti. Samathe dassetvā tena samānagatikā imasmiṃ visaye vipassanāpīti iminā adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā…pe… saṃvattantī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Kāsāva^eb^nti kāsāvavatthaṃ. ^b^Kacchaṃ pīḷetvā nivattha^eb^nti pacchimaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ pīḷento viya daḷhaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ addasaṃsūti yojanā.

[03]^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.394) ‘‘kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’’tiādinā vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavadassanapubbakanekkhammapaṭipattiyā chandarāgaṃ vikkhambhayato samucchindantassa ca ‘‘anuppanno ca kāmāsavo na uppajjatī’’tiādinā heṭṭhā sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanādīsu (ma. ni. 1.15 ādayo; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.15 ādayo) vuttanayena. ^b^Ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddhavipāko^eb^ti tadārammaṇamāha. Anubhavitvā bhavitvā ca vigataṃ ^b^bhūtavigataṃ^eb^. Anubhūtabhūtā hi bhūtatāsāmaññena bhūta-saddena vuttā. Sāmaññameva hi upasaggena visesīyatīti. Anubhūtasaddo ca kammavacanicchāya abhāvato anubhavakavācako daṭṭhabbo. Vipāko ārammaṇe uppajjitvā niruddho bhutvāvigatoti vattabbataṃ arahati, ^a^M2.0118^ea^ vikappagāhavasena rāgādīhi tabbipakkhehi ca akusalaṃ kusalañca kammaṃ ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā vigatanti vattabbataṃ arahati. Yathāvutto pana vipāko kevalaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanavaseneva pavattatīti anubhavitvā vigatattā nippariyāyeneva vutto, tassa ca tathā vuttattā kammaṃ bhavitvā vigatapariyāyena, yaṃ ‘‘uppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā’’ti ettha ‘‘uppanna’’nti gahetvā taṃsadisānaṃ pahānaṃ, vuddhi ca vuttā. Vipaccituṃ okāsakaraṇavasena uppatitaṃ atītakammañca tato uppajjituṃ āraddho anāgato vipāko ca ‘‘okāsakatuppanno’’ti vutto. Yaṃ uppannasaddena vināpi viññāyamānaṃ uppannaṃ sandhāya ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikāna’’ntiādi (a. ni. 10.217, 219) vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tesū^eb^ti vipassanāya bhūmibhūtesu khandhesu. ^b^Anusayitakilesā^eb^ti anusayavasena pavattā appahīnā maggena pahātabbā kilesā adhippetā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atītā…pe… na vattabbā’’^eb^ti. Tesañhi ambarukkhopamāya vattamānāditā na vattabbā maggena pahātabbānaṃ tādisassa vibhāgassa anuppajjanato. ^b^Appahīnāva hontī^eb^ti iminā appahīnaṭṭhena anusayaṭṭhoti dasseti. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0118^ea^^b^bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmā^eb^ti idaṃ tesu khandhesu uppattirahakilesajātaṃ tāya eva uppattirahatāya bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma, tebhūmakabhūmiladdhā nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsū^eb^ti manussadevādiattabhāvasaṅkhātesu upādānakkhandhesu. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ santāne anuppattianāpāditatāya ^b^asamugghātitā^eb^. Ettha ca laddhabhūmikaṃ ^b^bhūmiladdha^eb^nti vuttaṃ aggiāhito viya.

[03]^b^Okāsakatuppanna^eb^-saddepi ca okāso kato etenāti okāso kato etassāti ca atthadvayepi kata-saddassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo. Āhatakhīrarukkho viya nimittaggāhavasena adhiggahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, anāhatakhīrarukkho viya avikkhambhitatāya antogadhakilesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Nimittaggāhakāvikkhambhitakilesā vā puggalā āhatānāhatakhīrarukkhasadisā. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti avikkhambhituppanne viya ‘‘imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantīti na vattabbā. Kasmā? Asamugghātitattā’’ti yojetvā vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vuttaṃ^eb^ paṭisambhidāmagge. Tattha ca maggena pahīnakilesānameva tidhā navattabbataṃ apākaṭaṃ supākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^ajātaphalarukkho^eb^ upamābhāvena ^b^āgato^eb^^a^M2.0119^ea^. Atītādīnaṃ appahīnatā dassanatthampi ^b^‘‘jātaphalarukkhena dīpetabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā acchinne rukkhe nibbattārahāni phalāni chinne anuppajjamānāni na kadāci sasabhāvāni ahesuṃ honti bhavissanti cāti tāni atītādibhāvena na vattabbāni, evaṃ maggena pahīnakilesā ca daṭṭhabbā. Yathā chede asati phalāni uppajjissanti, sati ca nuppajjissantīti chedassa sātthakatā, evaṃ maggabhāvanāya ca sātthakatā yojetabbā.

[03]^b^Tepi pajahatiyeva^eb^ kilesappahāneneva tesampi anuppattidhammatāpādanato. ^b^Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassā^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇassa. ^b^Upādinnānupādinnato^eb^ti upādinnakhandhato ceva kilesato ca. Upapattivasena vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetumāha – ^b^‘‘bhavavasena panā’’^eb^tiādi. Ye sotāpannassa satta bhavā appahīnā, tato pañca ṭhapetvā itare dve ^b^‘‘sugatibhavekadesā’’^eb^ti adhippetā. ^b^Sugatikāmabhavato^eb^ti sugatibhavekadesabhūtakāmabhavato. ^b^Arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato vuṭṭhāti^eb^ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanasamugghātabhāvato. Yadi arahattamaggo eva ariyamaggo siyā, so eva sabbakilese pajaheyya, sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhaheyya. Yasmā pana odhisova kilesā pahīyanti, tasmā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnāvasese kilese so pajahati, iti imaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ sandhāya ^a^V2.0119^ea^^b^‘‘sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevātipi vadantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi so eva ‘‘vajirūpamo’’ti vutto.

[03]Hotu tāva vuttanayena anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādāya, uppannānaṃ uppannasadisānaṃ pahānāya anuppattidhammatāpādanāya maggabhāvanā, ^b^atha maggakkhaṇe kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ^eb^ kusalānaṃ ^b^uppādāya uppannānañca ṭhitiyā bhāvanā hoti^eb^ ekacittakkhaṇikattā tassāti codeti, itaro ‘‘maggappavattiyāyevā’’ti parihāramāha. Maggo hi kāmañcekacittakkhaṇiko, tathārūpo panassa pavattiviseso, yaṃ anuppannā kusalā dhammā sātisayaṃ uppajjanti, uppannā ca savisesaṃ pāripūriṃ pāpuṇanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggo hī’’^eb^tiādi. Kiñcāpi ariyamaggo vattamānakkhaṇe anuppanno nāma na hoti, anuppannapubbataṃ upādāya upacāravasena tathā vuccatīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anāgatapubbaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ayamevā^eb^ti ayaṃ maggassa yathāpaccayapavatti ^a^M2.0120^ea^ eva ^b^ṭhiti nāmā^eb^ti, maggasamaṅgī puggalo maggampi bhāvento eva tassa ^b^ṭhitiyā bhāvetīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^.
[03]^b^Upasamamānaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena kilese upasamentaṃ vattati. Pubbabhāgindriyāni eva vā adhippetāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kilesūpasamatthaṃ vā gacchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^248^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhimuccanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.129; a. ni. ṭī. 3.8.66) adhikaṃ savisesaṃ muccanaṭṭhena, tenāha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho’’^eb^ti. Etena satipi sabbassapi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati, so bhāvanāviseso dīpito. Bhavati hi samānajātiyuttopi bhāvanāvisesena pavattiākāraviseso. Yathā taṃ saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa, tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇe cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ayaṃ panattho^eb^ti ayaṃ adhimuccanattho ^b^pacchimavimokkhe^eb^ nirodhe ^b^natthi^eb^. Kevalo vimuttattho eva tattha labbhati, taṃ sayameva parato vakkhati.

[03]^b^Rūpī^eb^ti yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti. Yena visiṭṭhena rūpena ‘‘rūpī’’ti vucceyya rūpī-saddassa atisayatthadīpanato, tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpanimittaṃ jhānamiva paramatthato rūpībhāvasādhakanti ^a^V2.0120^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ajjhatta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ^eb^ uttarapadalopena. ^b^Rūpānī^eb^ti panettha purimapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nīlakasiṇādīni rūpānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Antoappanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthī^eb^ti iminā pubbābhogavasena adhimutti siyāti dasseti. Evañhettha tathāvattabbatāpatticodanā anavakāsā hoti. Yasmā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimutti siyā, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito. Yasmā pana mettādivasena pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahati, ^a^M2.0121^ea^ te subhato adhimuccitvāva pavattati, tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge (paṭi. ma. 1.212) brahmavihārabhāvanā ‘‘subhavimokkho’’ti vuttā, tayidaṃ ubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbaso^eb^ti anavasesato. Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasiṭṭhoti. ^b^Vissaṭṭhattā^eb^ti yathāparicchinne kāle nirodhitattā. ^b^Uttamo vimokkho nāma^eb^ ariyeheva samāpajjitabbato, ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.

[03]^b^249^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhibhavatīti abhibhu (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.173; a. ni. ṭī. 3.6.61-65) parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ,^eb^ jhānaṃ. Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti^b^ abhibhāyatanaṃ,^eb^ jhānaṃ. Ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato cātipi sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhibhavanakāraṇānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tānī^eb^ti abhibhāyatanasaññitāni jhānāni. Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī,^eb^ na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati. ^b^Taṃ pana^eb^ ajjhatta parikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ^b^asuvisuddhameva hoti,^eb^ na bahiddhā parikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.

[03]^b^Parittānī^eb^ti yathāladdhāni suppasarāvamattāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avaḍḍhitānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parittavasenevā^eb^ti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva ^b^idamabhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ^eb^. Parittatā hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati, na itarassāti ^b^‘‘ñāṇuttariko puggalo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0121^ea^ ettha abhibhavanaṃ samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti āha ^b^‘‘saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saha nimittuppādenā^eb^ti ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Yo ‘‘khippābhiñño’’ti vuccati ^a^M2.0122^ea^, tatopi ñāṇuttarasseva abhibhāyatanabhāvanā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ nimitte. ^b^Appanaṃ pāpetī^eb^ti bhāvanā appanaṃ neti.

[03]Ettha ca keci ‘‘uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti, te upacārajjhāna pakkhikā eva, tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārāsevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Na hi pārivāsikaparikammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā, tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto ‘‘saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī’’ti vutto. ‘‘Saha nimittuppādenā’’ti ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ, adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Na antosamāpattiyaṃ^eb^ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato, samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 204) pana ‘‘iminā panassa pubbabhāgo kathito’’ti vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā ‘‘jhānasaññāyapī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘abhibhava…pe… atthī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Vaḍḍhitappamāṇānī^eb^ti vipulappamāṇānīti attho, na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhitappamāṇānīti tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahantānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā assa atthīti rūpasaññī, na rūpasaññī ^b^arūpasaññī^eb^. Saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Rūpasaññāya anuppādanamevettha ^b^alābhitā.
