[03]^b^464^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ayoniso pavattitaṃ vāṇijjakammaṃ viya apāyabhūtaṃ kasikammaṃ nidassanabhāve ṭhapetvā ayonisomanasikaraṇavasena pavattaṃ gharāvāsakiccaṃ sandhāyāha – ^b^‘‘yathā kasi…pe… evaṃ gharāvāsakammaṭṭhānampī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Brāhmaṇabhatto ahosī^eb^ti so kira bahū brāhmaṇe dhanaṃ datvā yaññaṃ kāresi. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti ‘‘upari upaṭṭhātīti vadehī’’ti brāhmaṇehi attano samayena ācikkhāpitopi yathā upaṭṭhitameva kathetvā kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto, atha brāhmaṇā – ‘‘iminā ^a^V2.0206^ea^ amhākaṃ yaññe doso dinno’’ti kujjhitvā tassa kaḷevaraṃ susānaṃ netuṃ nādaṃsu. Athassa ñātakehi sahasse dinne taṃ sahassaṃ gahetvā gehato nīharituṃ adaṃsu. Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle chattiṃsa itthiyo ‘‘ekā vatthaṃ adāsi, ekā gandhaṃ, ekā sumanamāla’’ntiādinā taṃ taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakkassa devarañño paricārikā hutvā nibbattiṃsu sahassāccharāparivārikā, sakkassa devarañño vejayantarathaṃ pesetvā pakkosāpitena guttilācariyabhūtena mahābodhisattena pucchitā taṃ taṃ attanā kataṃ puññaṃ byākariṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sakalāya guttilavimānakathāya dīpetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vaṇijjakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamāna^eb^nti ettha tassa vipajjamānākāro heṭṭhā vutto. Evaṃ pabbajjakammaṭṭhānampi vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hotīti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Sīlesu aparipūrakārino^eb^tiādi tassa vipajjanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Jhānādisukha^eb^nti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena abhiññāvipassanādisukhassa viya sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ sīlasampadādisukhassa ^a^M2.0206^ea^ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Arahattampi pāpuṇāti^eb^ pageva sekkhaputhujjanasampattiyoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Cāgasīsenā^eb^ti padhānabhūtena cāgena dānena taṃ avassayaṃ katvā. Ettha te ^b^na koci aphāsukabhāvo^eb^ti. ^b^Ujukaṃ katvā^eb^ aviruddhaṃ katvā, sampayojetvāti attho. ^b^Tapacariya^eb^nti aggiparicaraṇaṃ, tapacariyañca brahmacariyaggahaṇā duṭṭhullabhāvato.

[03]^b^466^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajānanabhāva^eb^nti asabbaññubhāvaṃ. Bhagavato pana sabbaññubhāvo sadevake loke jalatale pakkhittatelaṃ viya pattharitvā ṭhito, na me idaṃ patirūpaṃ, tato parivattissāmīti ‘‘brāhmaṇo, bho, gotamā’’tiādimāha. ^b^Paccāharituṃ^eb^ paṭipakkhena apaharituṃ. ^b^Setapokkharasadiso^eb^ti puṇḍarīkapattasadisavaṇṇo. ^b^Suvaṭṭitā^eb^ti vaṭṭabhāvayuttaṭṭhāne suvaṭṭā. ^b^Nāmakaṃyevā^eb^ti nāmamattameva vacanamattameva. Tathābhūtānaṃ bhāvassapi abhāvena nihīnaṃ nāma hoti, nāma-saddo nihīnapariyāyo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘lāmakaṃyevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^467^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Katamā vācā tesaṃ seyyo^eb^ti tesaṃ caṅkiyādīnaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vuccamānavibhāgāsu vācāsu katamā vācā seyyoti. ‘‘Seyyā’’ti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. ^b^Sammutiyā^eb^ti avilaṅghitasādhumariyādāya lokasammutiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokavohārenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mantā^eb^ti mantāsaṅkhātāya paññāya mantetvā jānitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tulayitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthasaṃhita^eb^nti hetusañhitaṃ. Taṃ pana ekaṃsato yuttiyuttaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘kāraṇanissita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āvuto^eb^tiādīsu ādito abhimukhaṃ ñāṇagatiyā vibandhanena ^b^āvuto,^eb^ āvariyena visesato ñāṇagatiyā ^a^V2.0207^ea^ nibandhanena ^b^nivuto,^eb^ evaṃ ^b^ophuṭo^eb^ paliguṇṭhito. ^b^Pariyonaddho^eb^ti samantato onaddho chādito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paliveṭhito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^468^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sace etaṃ kāraṇamatthī^eb^ti ‘‘nissaṭṭhatiṇakaṭṭhupādāno aggi jalatī’’ti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ sace atthi yadi siyā, so aparo tiṇakaṭṭhupādāno aggi yadi bhaveyya. ^b^Sadoso^eb^ sādīnavo saparikkileso. ^b^Parisuddho^eb^ti upakkilesābhāvena sabbaso suddho. ^b^Jāti ādīnaṃ abhāvenā^eb^ti jātipaccayānaṃ kammakilesānaṃ niggamena.
[03]^b^469^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^M2.0207^ea^^b^niccalā tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti tattha pakkhipitabbassa labbhamānattā yathāpaññattaṃ hutvā niccalā akampiyā na tiṭṭhanti. ^b^Taṃ dosaṃ^eb^ taṃ ūnatādosaṃ.

[03]^b^Aññasmiṃ asatī^eb^ti atthabhañjakamusāvāde asati. So hi attano santakassa adātukāmatādivasena pavattassa akammapathappattassa musāvādabhāvassa viparīto añño idha adhippeto. Tathā hi itaro yebhuyyena vaḷañjitabbato voharitabbato ^b^vaḷañjakamusāvādo^eb^ti āha. Na kadāci musāvādīti ^b^dve kathā na kathenti^eb^. Bāhirakānaṃ anavajjatapasammatāyapi nissitoti vattuṃ āha ^b^‘‘sīlavā tapanissitako hoti’’^eb^ti. Vivaṭamukhā mantajjhenamaṇḍitā sabbaso sajjhāyā honti, na itareti āha ^b^‘‘pabbajitā niccaṃ sajjhāyantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^470^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ciraṃ nikkhanto^eb^ti niggato hutvā cirakāle. ^b^Na sabbaso paccakkhā honti^eb^ satisammohato maggānañca aññathā karaṇato. ^b^Cirāyitatta^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ maggo’’ti kathanassa cirāyanaṃ. ^b^Vitthāyitatta^eb^nti asappaṭibhānaṃ. Taṃ pana saupamāha dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Balasampanno^eb^ti kāyabalena samannāgato. Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ avikkhambhitattā ^b^‘‘pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacara’’^eb^nti āha, tesaṃ pana vikkhambhitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacara’’^eb^nti. Tatthāpi visesato appamaññābhāvanā sambhavatīti āha ^b^‘‘tesupī’’^eb^tiādi. Nirīhakattā yathā appamāṇasamaññā labbhati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pamāṇaṃ…pe… vuccatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā āsīdetvā passe ohīyakaṃ katvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāvena na tiṭṭhati. ^b^Laggitu^eb^nti āvarituṃ ^a^V2.0208^ea^. ^b^Ṭhātu^eb^nti patiṭṭhātuṃ. ^b^Pharitvā^eb^ti paṭippharitvā. ^b^Pariyādiyitvā^eb^ti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma vipākuppādabandhanamevāti āha – ^b^‘‘tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Subhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^473^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhippasannā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0209^ea^^a^M2.0208^ea^ abhisamecca pasannā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘aveccappasādavasena pasannā’’^eb^ti. Brāhmaṇī vigatamalamaccheratāya ^b^‘‘tuyhaṃ deyyadhammaṃ ruccanakaṭṭhāne dehī’’^eb^ti āha. Maggeneva hissā macchariyassa pahīnattā buddhapakkhabrāhmaṇapakkhavasena ubhatopakkhikā.

[03]^b^Kiṃsū^eb^ti kinti pucchāvacanaṃ. ^b^Chetvā^eb^ anādiyitvā vināsetvā. ^b^Sukhaṃ setī^eb^ti cittasantāpābhāvena sukhena supati. ^b^Na socatī^eb^ti tato eva sokaṃ nāma vināseti. ^b^Kodha^eb^nti kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhaṃ. ^b^Chetvā^eb^ samucchinditvā. ^b^Sukhaṃ setī^eb^ti kodhapariḷāhena apariḍayhamānattā sukhaṃ supati. Kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā ^b^na socati. Visamūlassā^eb^ti dukkhavipākassa. ^b^Madhuraggassā^eb^ti akkosakassa paccakkosanena, pahārakassa paṭippaharaṇena yaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati, taṃ sandhāyeva ^b^‘‘madhuraggo’’^eb^ti vutto. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne pariyosānaṃ ‘‘agga’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ariyā^eb^ti buddhādayo ariyā.

[03]^b^Pañhaṃ kathesī^eb^ti brāhmaṇo kira cintesi – ‘‘samaṇo gotamo lokapūjito, na sakkā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā santajjetuṃ, ekaṃ saṇhapañhaṃ pucchissāmī’’ti. So ekaṃ pucchāgāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā ‘‘sace asukassa nāma vadhaṃ rocemīti vakkhati, ye tuyhaṃ na ruccanti, te māretukāmosi, lokavadhāya uppanno kiṃ tuyhaṃ samaṇabhāvenāti niggahessāmi. Sace na kassaci vadhaṃ rocemīti vakkhati, atha naṃ tvaṃ rāgādīnampi vadhaṃ na icchasi, tasmā samaṇo hutvā āhiṇḍasīti niggaṇhissāmīti imaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho samaṇo gotamo neva gilituṃ na uggilituṃ sakkhissatī’’ti evaṃ cintetvā imaṃ payhaṃ pucchi. Tassa bhagavā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kathesi. So pañhabyākaraṇena ārādhitacitto pabbajjaṃ yāci. Satthā taṃ pabbājesi, so pabbajjākiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Avabhūtā^eb^ti adhobhūtā. Adhobhāvo sattānaṃ avaḍḍhi avamaṅgalanti āha – ^b^‘‘avaḍḍhibhūtā avamaṅgalabhūtāyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paribhūtā^eb^ti paribhavappattā. ^b^Vijjamānāna^eb^nti pāḷiyaṃ anādare sāmivacananti tadatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vijjamānesū’’^eb^tiāha. Pakaṭṭhaṃ, pavaḍḍhaṃ vā ñāṇanti ^b^paññāṇa^eb^nti bhagavato ñāṇaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^474^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhijānitvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0210^ea^^a^M2.0209^ea^ abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitvā. ^b^Vositavosānā^eb^ti katakaraṇīyatāya sabbaso parisositaniṭṭhā. ^b^Pāramisaṅkhāta^eb^nti paramukkaṃsabhāvato pāramīti saṅkhātaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbadhammānaṃ pārabhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Brahmacariyassā^eb^ti sāsanabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uppādakā janakā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Idamevaṃ bhavissati idameva’’nti takkanaṃ takko, so etassa atthīti ^b^takkī^eb^. Yasmā so taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ tathā tathā takkitvā gaṇhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘takkagāhī’’^eb^ti. Vīmaṃsanasīlo ^b^vīmaṃsī^eb^ paccakkhabhūtamatthaṃ vīmaṃsanabhūtāya paññāya kevalaṃ vīmaṃsanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paññācāraṃ carāpetvā evaṃvādī’’^eb^ti. Yathāvuttatakkīvīmaṃsībhāvena takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ evametanti vatvā.

[03]^b^485^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhitapadhānavata^eb^nti aññattha kismiñci puggale aṭṭhitapadhānavataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhoto gotamassa padhānaṃ ahosi. ^b^Sappurisapadhānavataṃ ahosi^eb^ sappurisapadhānavatādhigatānaṃ etādisānaṃ arahataṃ acchariyapuggalānaṃyeva āveṇikapadhānavataṃ ahosi. ^b^Ajānantova pakāsetī^eb^ti ayaṃ pucchitamatthaṃ sayaṃ paccakkhato ajānanto eva kevalaṃ saddaṃ uppādetvāva pakāsesīti saññāya āha. ^b^Ajānanabhāve sante^eb^ti ime adhidevāti paccakkhato jānane asati. ^b^Paṇḍitena manussenā^eb^ti lokavohārakusalena manussena, tvaṃ pana lokavohārepi akusalo. Vacanatthañhi ajānanto yaṃ kiñci vadati. ^b^Uccena sammata^eb^nti uccaṃ supākaṭaṃ sabbaso taruṇadārakehipi sammataṃ. Ñātametaṃ yadidaṃ atthi devāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘susudārakāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Devā^eb^ti upapattidevā. ^b^Adhidevā nāma^eb^ sammutidevehi adhikadevāti katvā, tadaññe ca manusse adhikabhāve kimeva vattabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
